Amazing and good for teambuilding. First Time experience, thought it might be boring, but those 60 minutes were so intense and thrilling, that there was no time to waste and be bored. Venue is appropriate and staff very friendly. Highly recommendable!
I highly recommend Enigma. This was great fun! Enigma room was interesting and perfect for our group of 4 friends. All worked well and we'd love to do this again in another location.

A ton of fun!!. Did this with my wife in the Enigma room and it was amazing!! We actually had to use our brain and we only made it out with 2 minutes to spare!! I highly recommend MindMaze Prague!!
We would definitely come back!!

So much fun!. Did this with 5 friends and we loved it. Really wasn't expecting the puzzle to come together like it did (won't give anything away). We loved it so much we came back a few days later and tried the other room which was brilliant too! Highly recommend!

Spectacular fun. Visited both of their escape rooms (The Alchemist's Chamber & Enigma) and really loved it. Great ideas, sophisticated spaces, mind-twisting puzzles. The only disadvantage is that they don't have more escape rooms! Would recommend to everyone.

Lots of fun! . Booked for something different to do while celebrating my husbands birthday in Prague. Never done an escape room before but booked it on the strength of other TA reviews. So glad we did, it was a lot of fun! We did the Enigma room. If we'd had more time in Prague we would have gone back to do the Alchemy room as well, we enjoyed it that much. We made it out with just over a minute to spare. The adrenaline was kicking in in the last 5 mins, big cheers and high-fives when we got out! Staff were super friendly and accommodating. Thoroughly recommended.
Fun day out. an amazing day out recommend this to all ages and who loves a challenge! There are different types of games you can play and is good for the money!

Amazing fun . This is my first time with these kind of games and went with a bunch of first-timers. We loved it. Challenging but exciting. The instructions at the beginning were clear and said he would help us if needed. But didn't need him and that added to the thrill of winning. The only time I did feel ripped off for finishing early.

Challenging fun!. 3 friends and I solved the puzzle in the Alchemy room tonight and it was GREAT fun. It was our first time doing any puzzle room like this and we all agreed this was fab! There were enough clues to go around and puzzles to solve that everyone felt like they were really involved at all times, but it wasn't so challenging that we couldn't figure it out! We got the okay to basically tear apart the room in order to find clues (apart from messing with furniture actually screwed to the wall) and that made us feel quite comfortable to dig deep and not worry about "are we allowed to do this?" Overall fantastic. We've already booked the other room-- Enigma-- for this week!

Excellent Escape Room!. We did the Alchemist room.First of all if you had never been in such a room before, it's a must!As an expierienced room escaper I would like to say that this room has a really good and interesting riddles. The operator was very nice and created a unique and mystikal atmosphere. We had a great time! Definitely will recommend and come back for the Enigma room.
Great Fun. This is Great for all groups of people, would love to try the other room on our next visit to Prague.
Awesome . Enigma was very challenging and fun! I recommend everyone who's in Prague to go and check it out, see you next time :)

Nice room!. We choose the alchemist room and it was really nicely decorated.It challenging but not to hard and possible to do for just the 2 of us.The staff was also very nice and proffesional!Would recommend it!

Very fun and entertaining!. It's a very fun and entertaining exercise for your brain. Just go there, preferably in a group of people 2-5 and have some fun. You don't need no special skills or being a brainiac to solve it, just a team work and a willing to escape!

Family visit to Mindmaze. We had a great experience, we have 2 teenagers and they loved it. The staff is friendly and the time you spend solving the clues brings you together. We will come back to Mindmaze on our next trip to Prague.

Only positive emotions!. We were three in the Alchemist's rooms and absolutely loved this! The room is very well organized, staff is welcoming and friendly. Riddles are logical and not that kind of tough, when you don't know even where to start, we felt extremely motivated all the time and excited about every little finding!

Lots of fun. We booked two rooms as we were a family group of 9. We played boys v girls, and had so much fun. The hour passes so quickly as you try to solve the clues. The staff here are very friendly and helpful. A really good experience.
We had so much fun!. I was in Prague over Easter with my Friend and we decided to try the MindMaze. We did the Enigma room. It was so fun I highly recommend. The staff were very nice also!

I am never bowling again!. When you're childless and over 30, the one thing that comes to mind when you tried everything else is usually bowling. Weeeell, those days are gone. This was a great experience, worth both the time and money. But beware, there are many places like that in Prague, tried a few, not all of them live up to your expectations. MINDMAZE definitely does!
Great fun. It was a great teambuilding fun. Guys who provide the instructions were also very nice. Do recommend it, and be aware the time flies really fast
Great!. It was so much fun, thank you! We had a really good time and made in 52 minutes :-) it is not that easy which makes it a real challenge. It is definitely recommendable.

Outstanding Time with my Teenage Children. This was our first trip to Prague and I wanted to do something fun with my 17 year old daughter and almost 15 year old son. We signed up for both the Enigma and the Alchemist Chamber. Both adventures were a lot more mentally challenging than we thought they would be, but they were also a tremendous amount of fun for us, and the staff was outstanding with their helpful hints when requested. I will absolutely recommend MindMaze Prague to all of my friends and colleagues for any visit to Prague as it one of the best highlights of our trip!

great fun! thrilling and exciting :). we were 4 people (2 couples) and we all enjoyed it (the alchemist room) very much. great fun :) exciting and gets you thinking, the location is a bit off from the city center but it was a nice break from the long walking. staff was friendly and helpful.

Great Fun!. If you are looking for something fun and a little bit different then this is certainly worth looking at. A 10 minute walk from the Southern end of Wenceslas Square it is worth the journey. The staff a very friendly, and helpful explaining exactly what you are doing and giving helpful and tips if needed. We did the Philosophers Stone escape room with our 8 year old and everyone had a great time. The decor and detail was excellent with puzzles and clues to suit everyone's ability.

Highly recommended!. This was our first escape room (2 couples) and it got us hooked!We did The Alchemist room and it was brilliant, the riddles were well thought and well made.There isn't much to say other than it's fun, doesn't take too long (~ hour) and was a short subway ride away from our hotel. A small tip for first timers, don't get discouraged if you feel stuck!

Brilliant escape game in Prague!. We've played a few escape games in different countries now and this was one of the best. We played the Alchemist's Chamber game and we really liked the theme, how the game was set out and all the different types of puzzles. It was challenging but logical and really well organised! I would definitely recommend spending an hour of your holiday playing this game (nice break from sightseeing!). Enjoy!

Highlight of our trip. We booked to do the alchemist chamber as a couple, we've done a couple of escape games before around England and really enjoy the challenge. This was one of the best ones we've done! The clues were so clever and the room was really well themed, it was just great fun! We enjoyed it so much we booked enigma for the next day - would highly reckoned both rooms!

Wonderful escape game!. We did the alchemy room, and it was really well made! Best escape game so far! The staff was nice, and they speak english very well. We also loved the huge map with pins in the waiting lounge! (PS: we escaped the room in 38 minutes. Beat that! ;))
Wonderful experience!. Lovely time spending for kidalts: quiz, mystery and curious parallels make "the Alchemist room" quest very logical, stylish and amusing

Brilliant afternoon!. Having attempted an escape room the day before, my girlfriend and I tried this one - alchemist number 1....it was much harder! Lots of fun and really well thought out puzzles and problems...would recommend!

Adventure. We were a group of 6 families, separated in two rooms and competed boys against girls. It was a very nice experience for all of us, we would surely try more of these type of mind puzzling games.

Fabulous hour filler. A must do attraction after visiting budapest and not completing an escape games there we decided we should complete one here in prague. The customer service eis fantastic. We did the top one which was alchemists chamber 1 and we was a great mind maze indeed. All of the puzzles were greatly figured out and the main guy I can't remember his name even offered to take a photo for us! Easy to find aswell as we stayed at residence belgicka apartments and it was less than 10 minute walk!
Amazing experience! . We tried with my collegues the escape room here in Prague. Well I can say that this was a superb experience very funny and challenging. Totally recommended!!

Had an Amazing Time.. While you only spend an hour in the room, it is well worth it. We went in the Alchemist Room, and managed to solve it just in time (with a few hints!) There are apparently a few in my hometown (which are more expensive than this one) and so many people I have told want to try it out. If you are near Wenceslas Square, have a walk down and find this place.
Really fun . My husband and I went in not knowing what to expect this was the first time doing anything like this. 10/10 highly recommend !
Super!!!. Great game! Coming back for another adventure soon! Thanks, we had wonderful time and we got out in 54 minutes;)

What an experience !!!!. This was my first ever escape room and I was not disappointed. Great puzzles and if you want to do something different this is it. Loved it that much, booked in for the following day to do Enigma. We did this room with 8 mins to go. A must do.

My first experience with escape games was a thrill!. We had the enigma experience with a WW2 theme that is highly realistic. The room is professionally decorated like a movie set with great attention to detail (sic).The personnel was very kind and enthusiastic. The challenge itself was very entertaining and not repetitive. Every task has its own quirks!It's totally worth experience that will create lasting memories :)Enjoy!

Supergood time at Mindmaze. I really recommend Pragues Mindmaze if you are in town with friends or family and want something different and exciting to do. Our guide was really helpful and had a good sense of humor. He explained really well what we were supposed to do in the alchemist's chamber and made sure that everything was okay. The room itself was so interesting and the atmosphere was good. The tasks we had to do was challenging, but with a little thinking you can solve them! Our guide gave us extra time to get out of the room and we were really happy and thankful about that. So all in all, really nice people working and helping there and we cant wait to try out the enigma next time we visit prague.

A must do. A must do and great value. We really enjoyed it. We finished Enigma with 15 minutes to go. The other room is supposed to be harder. We did something similar in Munich and this was way better.

A must! Challenging and very fun!. Very cool escape room, with a big variation of riddles, some of them are very easy, and some of them are very very hard.The stuff was very friendly, and the entire atmosphere was amazing.The only "bad" thing I can say is that they screwed up one of the riddles :/Bottom line - A must if you love escape rooms

Must do. My sister and I went to Mindmaze with no real understanding or concept of what it was. We booked the Enigma room and had so much fun that we went back the next day to do the Alchemy room. Staff was super friendly.

Everyone needs this on their to do list!. We went to mindmaze and completed the Engima room... it was absolutley brilliant! Best money we spent in the whole trip.. Jorge welcomed us in and was so helpful! It was our first time doing anything like this.. now we want to try them all! And its very easy to find too.. 5 min walk from the museum past the metro! Fantastic!

Amazing Experience!!!!!!!!!!!!!. For Someone going on a short trip mind maze would not be on your to do list but we are more than glad we did it ...... The alchemist room was amazing my husband and i did it in under an hour... its amazing for team building and an adventure out of the box..... HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FOR anyone looking for something different to do......
Great fun and a amazing experience!. The alchemist room was so much fun! If you are in Prague and looking for a fun thing to do with friends or family, try the mindmaze!

Really good fun!!. I booked the Enigma room for my partners birthday, knowing he loved problem solving - and even I was hooked!!! It was a really fun experience, making us work together - plus they let your dress up in the props afterwards! Would definitely do one again!

Mindblowing experience. Just perfect to have fun with friends, Enigma was really cool, you have to use your brain and teamwork to achieve your goal ! The staff is amazing, always here to help you, to make sure everything was okay. I had an amazing experience with them, you HAVE to try it !

Enigma. It was our very first game. There was plenty of tasks and riddles so we really were busy during the 1 hour but still we would need 5 more minutes to finish. That's why I think that another game would better suit a complete beginner but we enjoyed it anyway:)Now we are really looking forward to playing another exit game, probably we will return and try the Alchymist:)
Very cool. We had a great time, its very intertaining... Hope we can come again and try the Alchemist Room.. The price is fair

Alchemist Room is tough but fun!. We went on Valentine's Day and the Alchemist Room had just been renovated. The MindMaze employees were great help when we needed clues and spoke very good English. They let us finish, although we went about 5 minutes over time. They offered us a discount since the room was newly renovated and some clues were still going to need a bit of work to help make the game run more smoothly. Overall, the game was challenging but a lot of fun. The people were great, and I recommend it while visiting Prague.

So much fun!!!. We had an amazing time at MindMaze. There were 5 of us in our group and we visited on Sunday 8th Feb. We were late for our booking after a dreadful experience with a worker at the Metro station (beware of the Prague Metro - staff are out to con tourists) we called to apologise and they said we could still come down and they would try to fit us in and still gives the full hour! Luckily we completed the maze room in 46mins. The experience was so much fun - the staff were top class - so friendly and enthusiastic! i highly recommend to anyone visiting Prague - its a nice alternative after all the sightseeing. Thank you MindMaze staff for providing such an amazing experience for me and my friends!

Great experience. We had never been to any of the escape games before so thought we would give here a try to do something a bit different. The booking process was easy and we found the place pretty easily. The setup was great and lots of good attention to detail with sound effects etc. The puzzles were really challenging and although we managed to get out about a minute after the time it had us talking about it all day! Great way to spend an hour, would recommend it xxx

Fantastic. Amazing. We got our hotel to call to make a booking as online said fully booked, we got a time slot 3 hours later. So much fun, gutted that the submarine room was under renovation as would love to have done that one too.

Brilliant fun from start to finish. This game was absolutely fantastic, well thought out and designed and challenging enough to keep you guessing the whole way through. We completed it in 59 minutes 53 seconds (had 7 seconds to spare) and enjoyed it the whole way through. Highly recommend to anyone!

Croatian alchemists. Velmi dobre! We came here without big expectations, but we had a great fun. Four Croatians were thrilled by the experience. We definetelly recommend this to anyone who would like to challenge their logical thinking!!!

What an amazing and interesting game!. I came here with a friend and we had an amazing time, unfortunately we lost the game but It was a nice try! I would totally recommend this place to tourists visiting Prague, it was so much fun trying to find clues everywhere!
Amazing. The staff were soooo nice and spoke very good English which was great for us. Went with friends from uni and we all loved it.
Great Escape Room. My GF and I really enjoyed MindMaze Prague. They put a lot of thought into the puzzles and the props.

So much fun!. My boyfriend and I had never done an escape room before but had always meant to get round to it, so decided to give it a go! We were looked after by Betty who was so very helpful at points where we were going mad trying to figure out what to do next! We did the Alchemist's room after reading on here that others found the Enigma room fairly challenging for just two people. We managed to get out with 59 seconds to spare!! The room was loads of fun! We just wish we had time to do the other one!

MOST Awesome escape-room EVER!. My sister and I completed the Enigma chamber in MindMaze the other night. It was both demanding and satisfying at the same time. We had so much FUN!
Thank you very much!
(recommended for 2 people)

One hour well spent!. We came to this event one early morning, and we got to try the Alchemist's chamber. We were nicely greeted by the staff, and it was a fun experience! We managed to get out of the room in just little under one hour, and we had tons of fun all the way.

SOOO Fun!!. It was just my husband and I and we did the Alchemist's Chamber in October 2015. It was our first escape room and it was a blast! We love thinking/strategy puzzles and this had so many different types of challenges. Karel took care of us and when we were stumped for awhile, he'd check on us and give us a hint. His timing was perfect and his hints were specific enough to point us in the right direction but also vague enough to let us figure it out. With it being just two people, it was a bit more challenging (we didn't know this until afterwards but it's still worth doing with just 2 people!) but it gave us a better appreciation for each other's minds since we both figured out puzzles the other couldn't. We made it out in 54 min, 34 seconds; it made our day! Even after 13 years together, it was a unique bonding experience with my husband and we absolutely recommend it to everyone visiting Prague!

Fun!. We had the Engima room. After the first 5 minutes I thought we wouldn't even get out of the jail, but Thank God, after 10 minutes we figured that out. It was hard to get out but we did in 62minutes! Thank you for the great experience.

Tons of fun!. We did the Alchemist's Chamber as part of our 4 day trip to Prague. It was our second escape game in Europe and our favorite so far. The room was very detailed and full of very realistic props. The story connects well with Prague's history in alchemy and the puzzles were challenging and fun. Our game guide, Martin, was very nice and welcoming. We escaped the room in 1 hr and 43 secs. All in all it was a great way to start our Prague trip
Great Game. This was my first ever escape game, and it was great. Everything was very organised, the staff were very friendly and the game was very well thought out. Recommended.

So much fun! . I've been to an Escape Game before, and this was just as much fun. Very friendly staff, a clever and well-paced game, and made my girlfriend and I feel very accomplished! Highly recommended.
really fun, good organised. it was a lot of fun, and great value. really neat and well prepared. would like to go to the other rooms as well.

Great place. 5 young men ( age 20) went along and had a Great time. I had booked it for them and I was worried it might be a little easy but they got out at 59 minutes ! They rated it 10/10 ! Quote " was so much fun " & " was really good"!

Nice entertainment. Well organized. Nice people there. The game was a little complicated for the times given so we couldn't do without tips and clues. Overall nice thing to do when you have a few hours of.

Very enjoyable escape room. We've only done one escape room before, which was good, but this was even better. The puzzles in the alchemist's chamber were really clever and enjoyable (once you've worked them out!). Like most escape rooms you can't take a camera in but you do get a photo emailed to you at the end which is nice. The only slight disappointment was that our guide was a bit too eager to help us at the end even though we had 15 minutes left and were nearly done - but I think he was just trying to be helpful.
Great fun. Had a great time with our family. The game was intriguing and fun. Would highly recommend for the family. One hour of fun that created great lasting memories.
Awesome way to spend spare time. MindMaze was super fun and exciting! Challenges were moderately hard, and staff was very pleasant and helpful. Recommending Enigma room.

Very challenging and cool. My gf and I tried the Enigma trap room and it was our first time trying these escape game rooms and the enigma was supposed to be a very challenging escape room. It cost 1200 czk for a group from 2 to 5 people. We were locked in a jail cell and was supposed to escape the cell and solve puzzles and riddles to escape the room within an hour. With just us 2, we managed to probably complete about 80 percent of the puzzles before our hour ran out and the host helped us out. Every puzzle and every key led to another puzzle. From morse codes, maps, locks, fans, desks, lockers, and almost everything are a clue. The room itself was very interactive and almost everything had a purpose to it. With a full group, this escape would definitely be possible to escape in an hour. It was definitely a fun experience and would definitely do it again but with a group of 4 to 5.

Great family fun!. Great service, help & advice from start to finish from Daniel. Instructions were clear, hints were well-timed & the little extra time to help us finish the puzzle gave our youngster real delight in having escaped the room!
Fun for the Family. We love to do these kinds of rooms while on vacation and this was one of the best! Great staff and fun room! We would definitely go back again!

What a great time!!!!. Our family was in Prague for only 3 days, and after seeing the reviews for MindMaze, we thought we'd give it a try in between attraction excursions. This ended up being one of our favorite memories!!! We loved working together to figure out the puzzle. We finished with 8 mins left. Even our kids got to participate which made it so much more fun. The staff was super friendly and explained exactly the right amount of information without giving away any hints or clues. So very much recommended!!!!!

Great escape game. My family and I booked the Enigma room during our trip to Prague. The adventure was perfect. Not too difficult, but not too easy for a family with two children. This is our third escape game and Mindmaze did not disappoint. I highly recommend giving it a try if you're visiting Prague.
Worth it!. Very cool and fun game to play. The one thing that I would've change is the location. If it was closer to the city center I'd have played it more than one time during my visit to Prague.

TOO MANY CLUES!. So we came here as first time room-escapees and it WAS fun, but we felt they gave too many clues, in a way to get us out early perhaps? It took us 40minutes so we were a bit irritated that three clues were given (twice when we didn't ask for them!) We felt fine not getting it for a little bit- that is when your lateral thinking skills are put to the test.But - great room for beginners!
Mindamazing!. THE ALCHEMIST’S CHAMBER - is a cool room with great atmosphere and mysterious secrets. Worth going if you are in Prague. Especially to do something as a team.

Great laugh. My wife and I went here as a little something different to try and get the grey matter working after a couple of days sightseeing/hot wine tasting. It was a blast. The staff were friendly and helpful, even providing a few tips for newbies like us. Only complaint was it was a bit hard to find at night as the street lighting wasn't the best but no complaints at all with mind maze themselves.

Tightly designed and interesting. As a regular visitor of escape room puzzles I was delighted to try out both Alchemyst's chamber and Enigma rooms (the latter being more difficult than Alchemyst). Starting from the room design, props, puzzles and ending with the staff's approach, everything was at the highest desired level. Can't do else than give both thumbs up!

Brilliant fun and very challenging. This was the first escape game my boyfriend and I have done and it was brilliant. So frustrating but all very logical. We did the Alchemist's Chamber and needed a bit of help from George, and then we just managed to complete it although we were given 5mins grace as we were so close!! Might go back and do Enigma tomorrow.....
Worth the money!. Really good and interesting. Nice and kind service. Better than the other escape room in prague. Was really fun!!

Amazing . This escape game was absolutely amazing, set up perfectly and a real challenge. There was a group of 4 doing the enigma game and we finished with only a few minutes to spare. We were running around trying to solve puzzles and it was the most fun had in ages!
so much fun. we had such a greate time, that we even came back at the next day to do the enigma room... VERY recommanded !!!!!!!!!

we loved and hated it at the same time. we done enigma loved trying to figure out the clues but hated we were not so good at it .try not to have a late night the night before like us otherwise it will be like looking into a field of thistles.great craic after discussing everything

A must in Prague. If you are visiting Prague then you will miss out if you don't attempt at least one of these mind games.There is two to choose from, the Alchemist or Enigma.Myself and my wife went along on the strength of reviews on Tripadvisor, we were not disappointed. We chose the Alchemist and thoroughly enjoyed it, we enjoyed it so much that we booked to do the Enigma the following day, this was equally as good and we are so glad we found these games..It really grips you and I can guarantee that if you do this you will be talking about it for days after..Each game cost 1200 czk which is about £34 but well worth it.What was also refreshed no was they didn't try to sell you any photos or merchandise afterwards.Highly recommended.

Brilliant. . We played the room Alchemists Chamber . It was great fun and we had a blast trying to figure the clues . We did not succeed! We were rescued by the very professional George who was so patient explaining the system . If you like escape games this is really great if a little difficult!

Great way to spend an hour. We were a group of 5 women who were all new to this. We had a great time, thoroughly enjoyed it and now want to do it again! We managed to escape in 50mins which we thought was good going although we did ask for two hints. Definitely recommend.

Loved every minute and escaped with 10 to spare!!. Great escape room! I would definitely recommend it! The staff were friendly, and we loved the theme of the room. I would like to do the other room next!!

Great Fun. Visited as a group of 4 friends for our first experience of an escape game. We did The Alchemist room which was very well constructed and suitably challenging. We completed the challenge in 45 minutes though we used the 'walkie talkie' two way radio that is supplied to get a hint from the staff. There are free lockers to store your belongings while you are in the room and the helpful staff booked us a taxi once we had finished.

So much fun! . Had a great time here during our visit to Prague. This was the only thing we'd planned in advance and were so glad we did. The Alchemist Chamber was amazing, so challenging but really interesting. Look forward to returning and playing the Enigma room!

Amazing experiance, my favorite thing to do in Prague!. My husband and I absolutely loved the entire experience. The game itself is fun, challenging and extremely well done. Don't be afraid of being "locked in" they have an emergency button so you can get out whenever you want to if you start to feel uncomfortable. The staff is wonderful, friendly and welcoming. They do not nickel and dime you, instead there are little details they include to make your experience that much better. When we were done they had water for us, they provide free lockers to put you things in while you are in the room, they even took pictures for us and emailed them to us free of charge and presented us with a souvenir magnet for free! It was so refreshing to not be hassled to purchase additional things at the end, or have any hidden charges. The staff, wow if every attraction had staff like this they would be really lucky. Their English is perfect and they are super nice. It was just a great experience all around. I am now totally hooked on these "escape rooms" and my husband is already planning our next trip back so we can do the other room!

Loved it! Make reservations well in advance.. Our family of two tweens and parents had never played this kind of game. We all loved it! Our 11-year old wanted to do it the next day. Great teamwork. Lots of laughs. Talked about it long after we finished.

Great Fun!. This was the first time we did this sort of game and we really enjoyed it! We are a family of three and it was fun to work together to solve the clues and puzzles. I think it might have been easier with just 2 people as sometimes we seemed to be onto different ideas. George, our helper was excellent! He helped us at one point when we felt stuck but didn't totally give us the answer, just enough to get us out of the rut. Very fun hour in Prague!

Great activity, would recommend. The puzzle was really elaborate and well-made and the atmosphere was cool as well. The person at the reception was nice enough, but could use a little more enthusiasm. Despite being slightly drunk, we managed to solve the puzzle well within time. Great times were had by all.

Absoluetly fantastic!!!. We found it a bit hard to find as i read the map wrong but we arrived just in time. We were greeted by the friendly staff and were told to wait as they prepare the room. Once in the room we had a great time obviously i cannot say much more otherwise i would spoil it! All on all a great experience which topped off our visit! This place is just like the city it situated in- awesome!

Excellent Fun for all ages! . This was my first visit to this type of mind game and it did not disappoint. I was in a group of four including my girlfriend and my parents and we all had a brilliant time. We will definitely be visiting again to try the other types of mind mazes :)

Very Exciting Game. It was our first time playing an exit game, we had a lot of fun. After 60 minutes we wasn't done so the instructor just gave us a couple more minutes because we was so close to get out. The instructor was very friendly its a nice place to be! We also took a picture after the game and by time we was back at our hotel he already had send it to us. Great! Definitely on our to do list for the next trip to Prague! Thank you.

So glad we did this!. We really enjoyed the mind maze. We didn't manage to crack the code but still got a massive buzz from it! Very well put together and staff very friendly. Would definitely recommend.

Really fun! Challenging but very doable. This was my first escape game experience of any kind and it was great! We did The Alchemist. There were just two of us and we managed to get out in 48 minutes, though we did need a couple hints. (The guide gave small clues via walkie talkie when he thought we needed them.) There were times we felt totally lost and times where everything clicked, so the difficulty level was about right. I wish we'd had time to do the other room. I'll definitely seek out more escape games, but Mindmaze set the bar pretty high!

Best escape game in Prague. This was my first escape game and it was amazing! I've been there months ago and I still remember the experience as if it were yesterday. Sure, there are other great escape games in Prague, but this one has the best atmosphere and is hard enough to make your brain a bit overheated, but not too hard to prevent you fron completeing it in time. There are varius tasks and surprises in The Alchemist's chamber. There is also another room called Enigma, which seems to be harder - can't wait to try it :-).
Super fun especially with teenagers. One hour activity which kind of went into over an hour ! We had an amazing time with our 15 years old . Must do

So much fun . Such a great game, a friend and I did the alchemy room and we had so much fun. We were buzzing for hours afterwards and decided to book to do the enigma room as well! Can't wait. They spoke great English and were super friendly.
2nd time there - still amazing :). I had a chance to take 1st time the Alchemist room and now Enigma. Totally different experience, but the same fantastic excitement!!!Thank you!

So glad we did this . We had a couple of hours to spare before our flight so we made an appointment (you do need to book this!) to do something different. It's been a while since any of us had to use that much brain power and we thoroughly enjoyed it. It's exciting and such a buzz when you crack the code! The story lines, puzzles and props are very well put together and the staff are so lovely. If I ever visit Prague again I'm 100% going to give the other room a go. Loved this <3

Good experience. Game was exciting and well built, almost get it done... But I dont mind, it was great fun anyway. Staff was friendly and gave good hints when asked. If you dont want to shop till you drop or go to museums, this is the place to go. Might be best to do in the group of 4, but went well also wiht two people.

Got an hour to spare? Do an escape game!. We first played the Alchemist room on Saterday, the first escape game I've ever done. The puzzles will make you laugh, think and struggle. The story is really well designed and the room itself is beautiful. Actually, we liked the escape game so much, we went again on Monday, to do the Enigma room (which is a bit harder, especially if you loose track of all the information). The guides are really friendly and excited, and at €45 I feel like this is good value for money!

Something different!. We came across this place when researching things to do in Prague and thought we would give it a try.The online booking was simple and you got a quick response to confirm booking. Easy enough to find-took the number 10 tram to the nearest stop the had a 5 min walk. On arrival the staff were welcoming and gave us a quick brief on what to expect. We had booked the alchemists chamber.When we first entered the room we had a mad dash round lookin for as much as we could. After 15 minutes we thought we had solved quite alot and we would be out soon-but we were wrong after our quick start our pace slowed and we got stuck with solving the final solution. We managed to complete the room with a few helpful hints. The magnet you receive at the end with your escape time is a great momento along with the picture opportunities.We felt the price was reasonable as we would expect to pay higher back home in Scotland.Would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for something new to try. It's a good way to spend an evening. This was our first escape game and won't be our last! Thank you MindMaze

Something different!. Mindmaze is really good fun!! Probably best with 3/4 people to make sure you aren't stuck for time ☺️ The games master we had was really nice and fun! It isn't the cheapest activity in Prague, but with groups it is a lot cheaper - and is well worth the money. ☺️

Great place worth visiting. Very entertaining and although not a typical thing to do, it was really fun and a great way of new thinking and puzzle solving. Great experience especially with teenage kids.

Great experience!. My husband and I have tried escape rooms three times in America, this is our first escape room experience abroad and fourth experience in total. We tried the Alchemist's Chamber. It was an enjoyable experience overall. Difficulty was medium, we did use hints but were able to get out in under an hour. I love the magnet you get as a souvenir. We took the subway/metro to get there. There is some walking involved from the subway line but I wouldn't say it's terribly far. It wasn't too difficult to find but we did have a GPS-enabled phone.

Wonderful plan for families with children . I visited Praga in the company of my family. We have young children and on the second day they were tired of the city and wanted to stay in the hotel. We visited this wonderful place and their trip experience totally changed. We had a great time. All of us actively participate trying to find the "philosophical stone". I highly recommend the MindMaze in Prague. Specially if you are in a trip with young children.

Great Prague family activity. This was a well put together room escape. We are a family of 2 adults, a 15-year old and a 13-year old. We have only done one escape previously and were surprised and chuffed to finish in 38 minutes. The clues do get you think laterally with codes and numbers (our addition let us down). Even when we held the philosophers stone we were initially unsure what to do. Thoroughly recommend to any family visiting Prague who need a break from classical music did theatres !
Great Fun. Having done one before, we were keen to do again. A few of the tricks we knew which made it a bit easier but was still a fun challenge. Would definitely recommend!

Awsome experience :) . We heard about escape rooms before and wanted to try this kind of attraction for a long time, which is why we were excited to discover that there's one at just 3-minutes walk from our hotel. We chose "The Alchemist Chamber" for our first experience and enjoyed every moment of it! The puzzles were challenging and fun (but not too difficult) and the time flew by. A great way to end our vacation in the magical city of Prague :)

Great for a wet afternoon . We chose Mind Maze (alchemist's chamber) as a rest from sightseeing and we were glad we spent the time.The address is easy to find (although the spiral stairs in the entrance are quite steep) and the waiting are is comfortable with lockers for your gear.You are handed a walkie talkie by the host and then locked in the room. We had to solve several numerical clues to find keys that open a series of locks and provide parts of the puzzles.We played as a couple and "escaped" in just after 50 mins with on hint that is obvious when we look back at it.Would recommend to anyone who likes number puzzles, lateral thinking and has a sense of curiosity.

Great fun, break for kids from sightseeing. We spent an hour at MindMaze during a recent weekend trip to Prague.We played the Alchemists chamber, which was frustrating, but great fun with us all working together as s team. The kids loved it, and for themit was a welcome break from all the historical sightseeing!

Amazing experience . My husband and I visited mind maze whilst in Prague for our anniversary, I would highly recommend it to everyone it was unbelievably fun, we had a great time solving the puzzles working together to decipher the clues, we did the alchemist room completed in 54 minutes and I just wish we had visited earlier into the trip as it was our last day and we would have loved to book again to do another room.

Excellent!!. Seriously fun. Myself and 3 others took part in the alchemist room. It was my first time in an escape room and I cannot recommend it enough. Great value, really well organised and only a 15 minute walk from the city centre.

Crystal Maze in Prague . We really wanted to give this review a 5 - but there were a couple of issues that affected our investigations. To be honest this didn't distract from the buzz we got from the experience - it was disappointing that there was a small lack of attention to detail - for something that would have otherwise been a perfect experience. The concept is so clever - it really made us think & work together........ and us a group of drinking buddies- it was great to see how we could all pull together in the face of adversity!!! Would totally recommend this!!!
excllent. we had really great time if we have had more time in prague we defenatlly go to the alchimist room eithershany and ori

awesome attraction! a must!. We were a couple visiting Mind Maze. This 1-hour riddle was the fastest hour to end!It is hard to solve it by yourself so we were given hints by the staff. We were able to find the alchemist stone, but couldn't find the code to get it out.Very recommended to those who have free extra time in Prague.Note: the entrance is not noticeable, so make sure you know how to find i! (we were late by 10 minutes, nevertheless we got a full 1-hour)

One hour of intensive fun. My 12 year old daughter found this on the net and insisted on going, well the whole trip was planed for her Bat Mitzva (12 year old Birthday) so how could I refuse. Well, what can I say? It was GREAT FUN! As if we were for 1 hour inside one of our favorite online puzzle games, looking for clues, thinking how to solve the puzzles. We chose the alchemist room, which was all so cool. trying to find the stone that can make metal into gold. The crew was very nice and gave us hints by request, It wasn't easy and my daughter got a bit anxious towards the end, but eventually we did it. It took us 1 hr and 9 minutes with 5 hints. We worked together as a team and were so happy to succeed. Come with your family. come with your friends and let yourself be a detective for an hour. Thank you Mindmaze for this unforgettable experience.

Fantastic . I've heard about similar things in the UK but had never attempted one so this was our first. We absolutely loved it. We finished a couple of minutes over the hour. Already checked to see if the other room has availability for tomorrow before we go home but sadly not. We'd definitely recommend it though.

Great room, great atmosphere. Get going!. We visited to escape room in Prague as a couple, and we prefered this one by far. It is easy to reach, and the staff is friendly and helpful. We arived early and they had no issues with letting us start before our set time as it was empty beforehand. The room itself is very well desgined, and the atmosphere is clearly felt within. The Puzzles weren't terribly hard, but they were all interactive and had a clear, understandable flow and purpose. We never felt lost or dumbfounded, and yet the riddles did require thought and attention. We should say that we have some experience with escape rooms, and for newer players the room is definitely challenging, in a good way. Worth your time/money.

Mind Maze Prague - a lot of fun!. I visited the Mind Maze -closed room mystery with my 10-year old daughter - and we had a lot of fun! The staff was very friendly, the mystery was hard and complex, and all the information given beforehand (including the map to the place) was well though of.This was our first closed room -mystery, but we both want to do it again! The mysteries in the Alchemist-room were complex and hard, yet both of us got our moments of getting something right! And when we got stuck, we got useful hints by a walkie-talkie. Big fun with reasonable prize!

So much fun!!. We played in the alchemist chamber as a couple and had never experienced or even heard of escape games before. We had such a great time! George, our helper who was watching us from another room, let us get on with it and only gave us small hints when we started getting stuck. Although we didn't get to escape in the allocated time he spent another 10mins at the end guiding us through the final stages which was really nice because the experience we gained by completing the game will definitely help us in the next one we try. As beginners we loved it but I imagine it's challenging for even the experienced gamers.
Awesome escape game!. We liked it very much. Alchemist chamber was great and funny. Best escape game we have tried. We can recommend it.

Wonderful and fun experience!. We were in the Enigma room, and it was really fun!It was our first time ( we went as a family of 4 ) on an escape game and we still managed to solve the puzzle ( although it took us 3 minutes overtime ) .The instructor Lucia was very nice and helpful when she saw we had the clues but didn't know what to do with all of them.The crew was very nice and sent us our picture in the room after our visit.We will sure be there again next time we are in Prague!

Fun game but pretty difficult (or we are dumb)!. We had a great time! We were 4 people who did the Enigma game, and it was really fun. We did finish the game but only with some very heavy hints from the staff. That did sour the experience a bit for me personally, because I didn't feel like we completed it "the right way". That's entirely on us though, no fault of the staff that we are too stupid to understand codes (maybe it didn't help that we were pretty hung over). Very fun game and when we go back to Prague we will definitely try the other room too!

Really fun group game!. We had a really great time and solved the puzzle! We did the alchemists chamber, finished with 12 seconds to spare. It was really fun, we had a party of six and it's probably easier with less people, but we didn't want to leave anyone out. I think three to five people would be perfect for this. Anyway, we loved it, it was hard but not impossibly frustrating hard. I recommend it!

A great escape room!. First escape room, was lots of fun and the host was super helpful in explaining how escape rooms work and gave us a hint or two when we got stuck. We did this in a group of two and it was a great time! Well thought out puzzles.

Alchemist chamber. This was so fun! We had a group of three and thought it was the perfect number of people and we had a lot of fun figuring out the clues together. Something fun to do for a night. It takes an hour and is only a couple metro stops from old town. I would definitely recommend!

A must do in Prag!. Lovely founders, nicely decorated and a challenging quest. We did our 4th breakout game and the Enigma room was a lot of fun. The first quest is so easy, if you just think a little bit harder. Remember our words ... :-) Anyway, take the challenge and enjoy your adventure hour in Prague!Elle & Felix

Amazing experience. The MindMaze Prague located in an apartment in the middle of prague, we took a taxi from the hotel to reach there, it was a great and fun experience, it is nice to challenge yourself to find the gem stone..

Good team activity. If you're looking for something different than pub crawling, this is definitely a great thing for a group of people, especially if you're 8 and can do it simultaneously in two rooms.Personally, I found Alchemist room nice but not extra challenging. I wish there's a more challenging option with a bit more time (e.g. 2 hours)/Otherwise, definitely recommended. Good fun!

Fantastic (double) experience at Mindmaze Prague. I booked this attraction via the website of this company to go there with my children and wife. Our kids are 9 and 13 and liked it a lot, they were also able to help us solving some puzzles! It comes in handy you don't need to speak english to be fully part of this attraction.We initially booked the Alchemist's chamber, which was real fun and challenging to do! We can not tell more since this would spoil the experience from next users but we can tell you that as soon we came out we also booked the Enigma room.To me Enigma was a little bit more challenging and a little less child friendly than the Alchemist's chamber. Although the kids liked both experiences.It's a pity they didn't have a third room or we would have booked it to!The staff is very friendly, comes in with a hint when needed (needed one in the Enigma room - which we made in 43 minutes with one hint) and is fluent in English.Rooms are easily reachable, five minutes walking from the metro station.

Yayyyyy. A great experience!
Went there with 2 of my friends on our second visit to Prague in which we decided to try something different than the regular sightseeing which we've all done.
Very nice crew and if you have a spare hour for fun- this is a great choice.
Amazing. the Alchemist's chamber is very challenging, we had a lot of fun trying to solve all the riddles, amazing & very helpful staff.
Fantastic!. Really enjoyed will definitely go to others around my local area in the UK. Staff were really friendly and made the experience fantastic.
Solid escape room . Done a few of these now, this one had a good mix of interesting puzzles, we always felt challenged. Staff were friendly and we started on time.
Highlight of our trip!. Superfun! We visited the alchemist room. The puzzles were a bit on the difficult side but the whole experience was awesome!

Good idea, well executed. I attempted the Enigma room with my girlfriend, it was much harder than I imagined it would be! The whole thing is very cleverly put together and I did become quite engrossed in the game.
Very much recommended.

Awesome and fun place. Me and two of my friends chose the Alchemist chamber. It was awesome! It was our first time and it was not so easy for us but really cool and fun way to diversify your trip :)
Btw the staff is awesome too! Really kind guys^^

Exciting time . We went as a couple not knowing what to expect. We didn't have a reservation but they accommodated us in just over an hour. The game was exciting and challenging. Well worth the time. We would do it again!

absolutely amazing!. 2 of us chose the Alchemist's chamber, we had such good fun and it was so difficult! The man who owns it/works there was very lovely and polite. Loved crystal maze and fort boyard as a child so this was a step closer to it! Definitely recommend, planning to go back to Prague just to do the other room!

Awesome experience!. We were a team of two people and we did the alchemist chamber first and we liked it so much that we booked the enigma room for the following day! We had both times a really fun hour, we were so excited! The rooms are filled with mysteries and mindtricks. My personal favourite was the alchemist chamber, because it was more magical and mysterious. This experience was awesome for bonding too! Would do it over and over again!

Tons of fun!. We were at the alchemist chamber - very fun and the puzzles are very well thought! I really recommend going to, at least, one room. If I ere to stay in town more, I would go to both!
Friendly staff and great english!

Fun, Challenging, and Well Done. Did the Alchemist's Chamber in August with my family (two young adults, two in their 50's) and all four of us had a blast. The place is run very professionally -they give you a fun backstory to the room, lend you a walky talky in case you need help/want to ask them questions, have great background music, effects, and design. The room wasn't creepy at all (you can just open the main door to get out if you need to), but it did feel realistic! You can specify how much help you want (they watch you on a hidden camera and give you advice when you're stuck). I highly recommend it. We found it challenging, but did successfully complete the task with about 3 minutes left. My whole family couldn't stop discussing it for at least three days :).

Superfun way to spend time. We were at Enigma room and it was superfun. It was more difficult than we thought, but syill we got out in the 50 minutes. Staff was really nice and friendly. I warmly recommend to everyone.

Brilliant. This was so enjoyable, got stuck in right away! Was hard to figure out a few key things needed to get out but we were so close. Paying attention to detail is the key here. 3 or more people would probably be best so you dont miss anything. Loved it!

Amazing place!. It is not my first maze, and i most say it is the best maze i've been in so far! Great puzzles, amazimg staff that really love their job and it is amazing to see. Thank you for a great experience!

Great experience. This is a game of different taste like you would expect. I have to say it was the first escape game in my live an i enjoyed it really much. Time is running and all the time keeps you buissy. Never it was boring.
An amazing hour. What a great and interesting hours we spent trying to solve and escape the room. Great puzzles, just the right level for us and very helpful and friendly staff. Highly recommended.
Great fun. First time we have done one of these and was great fun. We escaped too. Running around trying to figure out all the bits while turning the room upside down . Go try it

Not a lot of time, but a lot of fun. I have to say that this one hour we spent in Alchemist's chamber was awesome. We had to think and try to somehow find out how does every single piece of this puzzle connect. If you like games, that are challenging and fun, I'd highly recommend you check this one out. You may feel pressure sometimes, but stay calm, the personal was always ready to help us.
Enigma!. The enigma was the first mindmaze i have done. It was really fun and a great challenge. I would highly reccomend this if you want to kill 1hr of the day and enjoy it!
Fun with teens. We did the Alchemist's room and had a great time. This was our second time doing an escape game (1st was in Paris) and we thought this one was very well executed.

Fun but frustrating . Felt like a real life Indiana Jones. Great way to spend time playing a really fun and creative game. A bit frustrating at times but totally worth playing. An experience you won't forget.

Enigma. The enigma room is well though through, with a fun start and some new interactions we hadn't experienced before. This was our fifth go at an escape room (yes, we love them), and we were still challenged with this one. In this room it was okay to be only two people (some rooms demand more parallel activity if you want to make it in time). Our helper was very good. He didn't want to give out too many hints,seeing as we were "experienced", so every time he asked if we wanted one before he gave it. This is good, because with too many hints the achivement does not feel that good. We made it out in time and we will certainly try the other rooms when we go back to Prague1
Great fun. This is a great place to enjoy an hour, especially the Enigma room, one of the better ones I have ever tried, both in terms of flow and gimmicks.8/10
We escaped. The best experience EVER!!Very friendly staff, great experience, and taxing enough to be a challenge
Excellent Sunday afternoon. Although my first "escape the room" game, I really had a great time. We had great laughs while solving puzzles and turning the room up-side-down searching for clues.
Great game . Had a great time at mind maze. Great puzzle, finished just in time. Best if you can divide the tasks in pairs. Can only recommended it.

Great fun. Spent a very enjoyable afternoon at Mind Maze. A great laugh. Hugely entertaining. A must visit. A big thank you to our helper Karep who guided us and gave us clues. He was polite, and charming

Average gataway game. The game is fine, the decoration is nice, but as "an expert" for gataway games in different European cities I was a little bit dissapointed. Puzzles are just an average and the story is weak. I hope you will not be as dissapointed as me after seeing that these guys are No. 1 in Prague....

Great concept and well put together. Locked in a room for an hour whilst tackling the challenge before us - genius!Really good fun - uses various elements of thinking to work out the puzzle.A bigger group (than us 2) would have worked better.The guy was really helpful and his clues were spot on!

Lovely staff, great entertainment. Locked rooms haven't fully taken off in England but I hope they do soon. This was an exciting, entertaining, immersive and the staff were lovely. With the help of George, my friend and I were able to complete the maze and had a fantastic photo to take home. I thoroughly recommend doing the Mind Maze when you are in Prague!

Mind maze? No mind blown!. My girlfriend and I have done escapes before in other countries so we had expectations based on those. We were very impressed by how well put together this game was.
Our guide, Tony, was excellent and ensured we had an enjoyable experience. If we had more time we would've definetly tried their other game!
Highly recommend!!!

Great atmosphere and realistic props!. So impressed by my visit to MindMaze! First of all, loved that I could book online. I booked at 530 for a 730 spot and was lucky enough to get it. Showed up early and got started early! Tony gave a very thorough introduction and made sure we understood everything. Alchemist's Chamber had fantastic props and really cool vibe to it. Not scary but definitely mysterious. I loved all the unique puzzles and tasks. Little note, it gets WARM in that room! Especially because I was so into it, running and crawling around. Dress accordingly!My boyfriend and I did need Tony's help towards the end but we still finished with 7 mins to spare. We were able to add a pushpin in to the map in the reception area for Galway, where my boyfriend is from. We had a total blast! Tempted to spend an hour here on our last day in Prague... Haha

Do this in Prague :). We needed a break from walking up and down the streets of Prague, and this was perfect. Did the Enigma. Exciting and fun!Highly recommend..!The reason for giving it a 4 star is because of the walkie-talkies, couldn't understand each other very well because of the statics. Maybe they should invest in a monitor where they can give you hints instead of a radio.
Great fun. Good fun. I went with my 15 year old grand daughter. We had some clues but did ok. Really enjoyed it.
Great family activity. We enjoyed our escape from the Alchemist´s chamber a lot. Great idea for unusual family activity. We will definitely come back to the Enigma room next time we visit Prague.

Great fun!. My husband and I visited as we had seen the great reviews. We had never attempted one of these escape games before but we will be in future! Such great fun! George looked after us and did our introduction, he was very welcoming. We needed his help a few times but that doesn't take from the game. The hour flies and we managed to breakout at 58.50! A great experience and really fun way to spend an hour.

hilarious. absolutely loved it.. absolutely loved this. never laughed as much or been as harassed in a game in my life. i bet the people watching were in stitches.can 100% recommend to anyone of any age, better in 2 teams as you will want to win!

Amazing idea. Gets you thinkng.. My sister found this online and sent it to me while I was in Prague (which i still am until Saturday) , so we thought we would check it out as its something different from checking out the city, which by the way is beautiful. So upon arrival you are briefed with a little back story .story depends on what room you go into. There is The Alchemist, Enigma and two others I can't remember. We did The Alchemist. Once briefed , there are free lockers to put your bags in. You are then given some paper a pencil and a radio which you can use to ask for hints if you get majorly stuck. We used ours 3 times. You are then put in the room and the door is closed, and away you go. I won't tell you what to do in the room as that will give it away but I can tell you its awesome. It gets you thinking. If your from the UK and are reading this its a cross between Fun House and the Crystal Maze. You get an hour to complete it and there are different sounds to notify you when 15, 30, 45 and 1 hour has passed . We completed ours in 56mins. Definitely worth a visit and would definitely back and do all rooms.Rooms cost 1200 Kc per room regardless of how many people.You MUST book in advance as its always busy. Telephone +420 775 082 395I've added a couple Pictures.
Fun to play!. Nice experience and a lot of fun. Specially for the children's - they are very competitive! I recommended for 1 hour of remembering the playful children within us. Thx.

Super fun. Very professional service. Super fun. Middle level game - Alchemist.
I Recommended for you.
We had much fun 60 min full of mystery and brainteasers

Brilliant fun. This was our second escape room and our first abroad. We were worried that language might be a barrier but that wasn't the case at all. The quality of the surroundings and decor was excellent and everything was spotless. We did the Alchemist's Chamber and took part as a family (children aged 8 and 10) and everyone managed to make a contribution. It was just the right level of challenge for us. We escaped with eight minutes to spare but there was plenty to solve in the time.
Really funny and great 60 min. We had much fun. 60 min full of mystery and brainteasers. We were a group of 6 girls and we really loved to figure out the mystery of the philosopher's stone :)
Cool escape room. Went there with 2 other friends and did the alchemist room. Escaping wasnt too easy nor too hard, so perfect! Good instructions aswell

Awesome. First time at such activity and it was great, we came as a team of 2 and had an intense hour of fun. We played the alchemists lab and finished it with help in a little less than one hour. Dont be afraid to ask for advice when stuck!

Well thought out. We had previously visited the Chamber version and enjoyed it so much we booked this one for the following night. This was another good experience with plenty of puzzles of differing levels to challenge all. The only niggles were one clue being left open in the room, and one piece of equipment not working properly. I would say this didn't really affect our enjoyment
Good Fun. Family of four with s 7 snd 9 year old and we enjoyed ourselves...go you won't regret it! Staff was very nice and polite.

Great!!. Our first time on such an activity. Group of 4, and we enjoyed it perfectly. We were in such an excitement that half of the time i had no idea whats going on. The staff was very helpful and nice. Great experience!!

Fun for the whole family. Our family of four had a Great time doing something we never done before. We all partisipated and helped each other and found the 'gold" after being searching for it for 1 hour. We must admit that we had to ask for a couple of hints. Well Worth the money. We recomend it to other families With teenagers.

Good escape room. Me & my partner love escape room games, so we headed straight to mindmaze as the top rated one in Prague.The room was set up well and the puzzles were fun and quite inventive. We did the Alchemist room, which if you've played a few escape rooms before you might find a bit too straightforward, but I think it's perfect to try as a first taste of escape games. We were out in 35 minutes with no clues (we've never managed this quick or without help anywhere else!). This didn't detract from the overall experience though as the game was very well thought out and enjoyable.
Amazing MindMaze!. It was our first try and now we are adicted to it. A must do! Book bevore you go, others know as well.

Tried both rooms, will come back. Tried the Alchemists room in february 2014, came back for the Enigma room this august. Was pleasantly surprised! They have put a lot of work in all of this, and it really makes you "think outside the box". You might even be able to unexpectedly solve a clue! Remember: keep calm, and ask for a hint.
I totes loved it!!. We had an amazing time in Alchemist's chamber and totally loved it. Beware thought! Time flows real quick in there!

Super!. Excellent fun. Did the enigma room with 3 of us and solved in 59 mins. Staff speak excellent English, though our guy seemed somewhat distracted - they are supposed to watch you on CCTV to see how you are progressing and they Give you a walkie talkie to ask and receive hints if needed. He did Give a hint for something we had already done but rectified once told. He also seemed annoyed with us for dismantling a picture - but they said if it isn't screwed down you can use it! I feel if he was watching us properly he could have informed us that wouldn't have helped us and stopped the problem from occurring. Also you are supposed to get warnings every 15 mins which we did not get.Even so, very strongly recommended - lots of fun and fab way to spend an hour!

Enigma Mind Maze. Just managed to "escape" the Enigma game at Mind Maze Prague. Great fun and a good challenge. Guide provided useful clues when he noticed we were stuck without giving too much away. Would recommend to anyone!

Mindmaze made gold from our day in Prague. We got very lucky and fluked a session in the Alchemist's chamber by simply calling in to Mindmaze at the right time but they recommend you book in advance. We were greeted at the door by the friendly and helpful Karel, who gave us a choice of two games to play. We chose the easier one, the Alchemist's chamber, as it was our first time playing a room escape. After a brief explanationof the objective we were sealed in the room and given 60 minutes to find the philosopher's stone and unlock the door to our freedom. Without giving the fun away, it's a really inventive puzzle and everything inside the room stays with the theme. We had an absolute blast trying to figure out each riddle as we uncovered them and eventually succeeded!

Extremely Engaging - We had a Blast!. We've played similar games in New York and Florida, but the Mind Maze in Prague was in a completely different league. It was immersive - the story, the decor, and the puzzles all blended seamlessly together into a well-thought out experience. Other rooms had stories that felt like "solve a bunch of puzzles to get out of the locked room" while the mind maze captivated us as we explored the room trying to discover more about this mysterious character and his/her secrets. The puzzles also challenged different types of people, requiring both logic and creativity to solve. Highly recommended, you'll have a great time!

An awesome experience. We had a group of four, all puzzle fans, and managed to escape the Alchemist's Chamber. It was an extremely enjoyable experience, and well worth the money. We were a bit apprehensive at first as we hadn't ever done anything like this before, but since we left we've been talking about it constantly and are actively looking for similar experiences back home.

Great hour spent. The kids found this on TripAdvisor, and wanted to go. We, as the parents, had no idea what it was, but agreed to book this for the next morning. It was great. We were welcomed and explained the game. Next we were locked into a prison, and the game began.... We had to find different hints and keys in the room, hidden or through puzzles. Great hour with fun with the family! (11 and 14 yrs)

Just try it... you'll have so much fun!. The consistently enthusiastic reviews on TA convinced our family to try this, although we did not know what to expect. It was our first experience playing this sort of game and we got hooked straight away. Our family of 5 booked the Alchemist room and everybody did their part to contribute to the final solution, including our 8-year-old daughter. If we had had more time, we would have booked the Enigma room too.If you can spare 2 hours in Prague, DO THIS!!! It's sooooo much fun and such a great team bonding experience. One of the highlights of our trip to Prague.

First time, great experience. First time trying out one of these "escape rooms" and was not disappointed. The puzzles were logical and had a nice variation. The thrill from the time limit and that feeling of accomplishment you get from progressing is worth the time and money for sure.

Easy fun. We did the alchemist room between 3 people. We managed to get the philosopher stone before the time ran out, without getting any hints. We felt that it could have been a tad more difficult, but maybe we were just lucky :)I would not recommend to play it among more than 3 people, as there are not that many things to figure out.

Mind maze, prague.... DO NOT MISS, BRILLIANT!. Amazing hour spent in the alchemist room and then we liked it so much we came back for the enigma room the next day. Friendly staff, especially Betty... Great idea. Enigma is more challenging. Would definitely recommend this if you visit Prague and fancy doing something a little bit different. Good value for money. Thanks so much :)
It was simply perfect!. I think everybody should try it. It's very good experience. We had a really good time, it was a big fun. I am sure I will repat it again in future ;)
So Fun, very recommended. GREAT EXPERIENCEVery great staff, visited the alchemist chamber and thought it was great.Very cheap, poor location but still worth it :)Highly recommend it

What are you waiting for? You have to try it!. This was such a fun experience! 4 of my friends and I went and didn't know what to expect, but the 5 star rating had us interested. You'll have a thrill trying to figure out what to do! Tony was so helpful and nice! We ended up talking about it all night!

Intriguing and engaging!. I went here late in the evening after making a reservation with two other people (3 total) and did the Alchemist themed room. This was my first "escape room" experience and it was probably the highlight of my trip to Prague! It was straight forward enough that our group knew what to do without direction, but difficult enough to run us to the end of the hour limit. With three people, we got by with only two hints. I would say this probably isn't good for young children maybe under 8(?) but I had a blast!
Amazing experience. It was really amazing experience. We cooperat quit well and at the end we managed it. 56min and if you want to see how it is funy and difficult, just try it

Gr8 for a small group (up to 10) teambuilding - Very quick reply from the organizers. We were a group of 24 people in Prague. Had 5 rooms for 2 different games. Enjoyed a lot the games itself cuz it gives group spirit, analytical thinking and sense of urgency. However, there was no AC neither in the room neither in the lobby/waiting room and in summer time was very difficult to survive there more than 2 hours.The organizer team kept a good attitude and was quick in reacting to requests every time. Also, in one of the toilets the water was broken so no hygiene to wash hands, etc.

Great way to spend an hour!. We read about Mindmaze on TripAdvisor prior to our trip and saw it had a 5 star rating, so we decided to book it and we were not disappointed. Priced at €50 for a team of 2-5, our group of 4 paid €12.50 each, which we considered great value. It would be difficult to find something so entertaining so reasonably priced in Ireland.We booked the Enigma room and it was great fun. The guy who welcomed us on arrival was friendly and chatty, and explained the rules of the game. After that we were on our own, and I'll spare everyone the details of the game itself so as not to ruin any of it for anybody!We had to look for assistance twice and we did go a little over time but not too much! The game is totally solvable with a little bit of logic. I'd definitely recommend it!One piece of advice though: Mindmaze is located in a large building where you need to be buzzed in. There is a small sign on the pavement outside the door, which you could easily miss if, like us, you are expecting big signage on the building itself, so keep your eyes open!
Birthday fun. We booked the enigma room and had a great time. Such a great concept that we had not heard of before. Such a great team building activity. Tons of fun ☺

Fun and great teamwork. We went as a family of five adults, and together we did a great job an had a lot of fun! We all have different skills and we managed to get out after 39 minutes thanks to good teamwork. The room was a good combination of mental and physical puzzels. We would have done the other room if we had more time in Prague.

One of the best escape games. My husband and I have played escape rooms in different cities where we have traveled to and now it was time to play in Prague. We chose Mindmaze because of the good reviews in TripAdvisor and we werent disappointed. The staff was really friendly and spoke good english. The game itself was well planned and designed. It was really exciting and we loved the alchemists setting. I would highly recommend. This was one of the best we've played.

Fun and exciting. An hour of pure fun and excitement. We were two adults and two teenagers and managed to escape from the room in just under an hour. Will definitely try the other room on our next visit!
Fun!. We went as a group of 6 friends and we did the Alchemist's Room.We had a lot of fun and we all recommend the place!

Great Fun. Me and my wife had a lot of fun @Mindmaze. We did the Alchemist's room and I have ti say that it was more fun than expected. It is a very well planned and balanced escape the room puzzle. The staff is extremely friendly and speak very good english. I'd recommend it to anybody!! We hope to go back for the enigma room.
Great fun. One of the highlights of our trip to Prague. The Mindmaze (Enigma room) was a tricky, but fun room escape, with a thematic design through-and-through. Highly recommended!
Looooooved it! . We did the Alchemy room... Loved it!!! Great and fun way to spend an hour. Would definitely go back to try the enigma room.

Fun escape game!. I tried it with a group of friends, and everyone enjoyed it very very much.The instructor was clear and helpful, the quiz enough challenging to put you on a trial, and the whole experience was very veto fun.Everyone in our group enjoyed it.Totally recommended

A wonderful experience. We went to Mindmaze last night at 9. Definitely one of the best things we have done on our Interrailing trip. We hadn't done an escape game before and this was top class. The staff were very friendly and the game was very impressive. Amazing experience!

High standard escape game. We work for different escape games in France, and decided to play the Enigma room at Mind Maze during our stay in Prague.The game play and the design of the room were both very elaborate.The experience was really immersive because we had to manipulate objects that we are not used to in our daily life. Understanding how they worked and trying to connect them was a very thrilling challenge.We highly recommend MindMaze :)
Good time. I tried a couple of escape rooms but this two is so far the best in Prague. Enigma the Best room !!!

Cool experience. Discovered this one on tripadvisor, and we eanted to try it, as we never had tried anything like it before. It was easy to find, and our instructor was very nice and helpful. We had so much fun trying to solve the puzzle, that we decided to try another room tonight!If you are allergic like me, be aware that the room is kinda dusty, but it just adds to the whole experience :)

2nd time - 2nd room - amazing again!. We already visited MindMaze few months ago and did the Alchemist room. Last week we went to try out the Enigma room. It was great again, despite the fact that without help we would never make it:) If you are in Prague longer, or just simply want to spice up your trip with something different go to try it out! Online reservation system is super easy and staff is so great and speak excellent English. For solving clues you do not need to know any Czech. The only disadvantage is the location, but it is not very far from the city center. Just mark the street on the map before you go. Have fun!
AMAZEing. It was a wonderful experience, funny and challenging. We'll definetely come back for the "Enigma" room.

Best place ever!!!!. We had heard about escape rooms, but had never tried one and always wanted to. When we came to Prague, we found mindmaze and knew we had to try it. We made reservations for the alchemists chamber and had a blast, but it was definitely very challenging. We actually came back to try the 2nd escape room, enigma, that one is a little daunting having to find blueprints in a room with so many cabnits, but we definitely got into the swing of things from the first room to the next and finished enigma faster than the latter room. All in all, my entire family loved mind maze and are now hooked on escpe rooms!!!!Toronto, Canada

must try it!!. we were a group of four and we visited this place in prague after reading the reviews on trip advisor. yes! its a place worth going. wonderful experience, u just get soo involved and 60 mins just passes by so quickly. wonderful coordinators. great concept. one word for this place "simply amazing"
Nice place. I was at mindmaze with my boyfriend and it was a good room! My boyfriend was really excited after this.

Worth a go!. The staff are very friendly and talk you through everything before you start occasionally jumping in on the speakers to give you a clue or two once inside.The game itself is really fun and gets you and your mates thinking together to try and work out what's going on! You'll probably spend most of your time confused but it's a good laugh and I couldn't recommend it enough. Top day out.

Do this. Really, do this.. We LOVED this activity. We took the subway from old town (where we were staying) and popped up at the local stop and walked 2 block to this location. Beware it looks like an apartment building and there was no signage so we thought we were in the wrong place, but we were right. Once you walk down the stairs they tell you what to expect in the rooms and what you will need to do. It's a human puzzle, so work together and try everything. It's only lasts 1 hour and it was $1200CZK for a couple. Seemed a little pricey, but we loved it. And we beat the game at 55minutes, just in time.
Great Experience!. Very friendly staff, and a nice puzzle. I would recommend this to anyone who is going to Prague. The more people the better 😀

Worth the money!. My boyfriend and I did Enigma and had a fantastic time! This was our first time doing an escape room, but now we're hooked! We arrived and received a brief orientation of what to expect and were then locked in the room and left to solve the puzzles and clues.
