Monaco Heist. Monaco Heist is really beautiful room, actually best room I played in Prague. Puzzles was unique and challenging. Game master Lukas was super-friendly and made our experience even better.

Superb! . Our guide Janna did a really great introduction to me my girlfriend. We went on the heist mission, and I can assure you this was a really fun experience! Something different, but worth a visit! 👍😊

Great experience. It was our first time in such puzzle room. The puzzles were well thought out which made it fun to solve them. The staff is nice and are always willing to help you if needed. Since it was our first time, we managed to escape the Inglorious Basterds room in over an hour. Overall it was great and we plan to go there again to try the other room.

Challenging and interesting. We've visited the Heist of Monaco room, and it was great! The room is challenging, has interesting riddles. Makes you really to work your brain. The service was very good, very friendly. Jan is a great operator. We've really enjoyed our time here and will defenetly recommend it to all our "escapers" friends.
Excellent fun!. It was our first escape game, but it was really great.We enjoyed it and can recommend it. Thanks a lot to our 2 excellent guides Honza and Matěj!
Best escape game ever!. Perfect room with amazing puzzles. Honza was great guide and advisor, thank you for this nice experience.

Great fun. We spent great time with my friends there.
Spring of ´45: Interesting story and in the place we felt like it was real.
Quite easy but good if you try such an amusement for the first time.
Very kind instructor Honza.
great. This was my first escape game, but I liked it a lot. ... actually all of us. I can only recommend it.

Monaco heist FTW!. The Monaco room was very well arranged with nice attention to details and puzzles that required quite a lot of creativity. Our guide, Lukas, was also very friendly and helpful. Looking forward to other rooms from DoorZ team! :)

Cool game. We played "Spring 45". It was our first escape game in Prague and second in life. Thanks to organizers and special thanks to our guide in escape room Helena for high quality service. It was challenging, so we had to use advice twice, but the rest managed to figure out ourselves. Highly recommend!
We stole it!. After an exhausting night in Prague we decided to go "oceans". We were able to steal the treasure. Great and very creative indoor-activity and awesome support from Jacob!

Amazing escape game. Me and my girlfriend have been locked in this escape room during our weekend trip in Prague and we must say - it was amazing! We chose the room "robbery in Monaco" (rough translation :D) and I must say that I was surprised how well the room fits to the theme. Thanks for the game, Lukáš!

Highly recommended!. It was a great evening! I loved everything about the game Monaco Heist, it was so luxurious and well-prepared that I thought I really was in Monaco :) Excellent tasks, magnificent atmosphere and unforgettable time spending with friends!

Great quest room in the middle of the city. We went with work colleagues and had a great time at Door Z. Jan was very helpful, greeted us at entrance and explained all ins and outs of the game. Location is awesome - right on Veneclas square. The actual quest was more than just finding one key and another key to open a door to find a third key :) Would definitely recommend to others!

Had a great time, great activity in Prague. I did the "blow up the Nazi headquarters" room. It was very entertaining and a good challenge. We had to request 3 tips from Jan who was great all around. Setting is really nice and the actual use of props and gadgets during the game makes it even better. I recommend it widely.

I'm just here to kill Nazis.... Two young friends and I spent a great time escaping "Spring 1945." Working our way through the several rooms was fun, just challenging enough for one friend who has been to several escapes and very exciting for a first-timer. Great decor, authentic-looking equipment and a couple of sneaky clues make it very engrossing. We would have liked a clock of remaining time in each room to add a little tension. Also a little more dramatic intro would have been nice and maybe costumes for the staff. Perhaps the instructions could have done via "radio" once the players were in the first room. Nonetheless, Eleanor and Honza were delightful and very helpful. We'll go back and try the other room when we can. Thanks for a good evening of fun.
Best. Best exit game ever, Jakub is awesome and introduce everything. we enjoy it well............the story is pretty good.

A real brain trainer. I had a lot of fun here, gave my brain a workout and bonded with the boys.Veronica was very helpful and attractive, I wish I asked her out for dinner but unfortunately we were heading home that night.

Great fun! We have completed the quest within 45mins :). Very interesting quest and of course, a lot of fun guaranteed! We really enjoyed this experience :) Looking forward to try the other heist, Monaco :)

So far the best Escape room in the Czech republic. Visually very, very beautiful - literally amazing first impression :), interesting ideas, high-tech, very good guide (Honza), nice instroduction both - technical and story. Compare to Czech escape rooms, I have visited is so far, it was definitely the BEST. Compare to some foreign rooms, I miss deeper logic and thoughtful story... seems to me that some activities didn't fit, there was only a few activities, which lasted longer.... But over all my Czech bestee :)

A lot of fun, team spirit, perfect host (Honza). Perfect place to spend an hour or two with friends or good job colleagues. We were 4 girls and had an amazing time finding the diamond.Our host Honza was very friendly, gave us needed background information and was helpful during the game. The interiors looked real and we were soaked with the atmosphere. I strongly recommend to all.
Perfect experience . Very good game. Nice clean atmosphere. Very good host (thank you Jacob!) Recommended to everyone in Prague :)
Excellent atmosphere. Not related with the movie but definitely one of the best escape games in Prague. The atmosphere is awesome, everything makes sense and is logical.

Blowing up Spring 1945. Awesome interiors and atmosphere that takes you back in time. We great fun with the puzzles. Honza was very nice, professional and helpful in times we were confused. TXL for this great experience, we will definitely come back for the Robbery room.

Fun and Challenging!. My girlfriend, a friend we made two nights before and I wanted to play an escape the room game. We reserved "Ocean's Twelve: Monaco Heist" ahead of time and were received warmly by Jakob, the Door Z employee. He made sure to explain the rules very thoroughly and answered any questions we had. Super nice guy :)!The game was challenging and unlike the other escape the room games that I have played. Not wanting to give away anything to other prospective players: I can say that the mechanics by which this game works are rather different to most other such games! I enjoyed that it was so different and high-tech. Refreshingly so!We finished in 46:48 and were completely stumped by one challenge (wow, that one was hard!). Thanks again to Jakob for giving us the hint we needed :DMy advice: go play "Monaco Heist" for a completely different approach to escape the room games! Regarding the game itself: "be exact" is the only advice that I'll give you ;)

Great fun!!!!!!!. It was my first time experience and we chose the jewelry roberry. It was very original and had great interiors. It is a must try in Prague if you havent played it yet. All the best in solving. Honza explained all in detail and was very friendly and professional. THX a lot!!!

Heist in Mónaco. . Awesome experience. My first time at this kind of games and I loved it.Great feeling having the final prize on your hand.Thanks to Jan for being so cool and helpful. See you soon. If we're not arrested in the meantime.

Amazing experience! :) Monaco heist. I got this as birthday gift from my friends and was it for all of us our first exit game... First minutes were quite confused... what to do, where are the hidden hints etc. but later on we were fully concentrate on game and really enjoy it. And what is the best, we found the diamond! :)Thanks to Jakub, our guide, he was very nice to us :)

Fantastic experience at Door Z!. My friend, my parents and I took on the challenge of the Inglorious Basterds 45 room yesterday at Door Z. Having completed 6 escape rooms between us to date, we were really impressed with the thought that had gone into this theme. The clues were challenging but not impossible, and the creativity was fantastic. We definitely recommend Door Z and will be going back to complete the Monaco Heist room!
MONACO HEIST. Great game, exciting storyline, very nice and authentic decoration together with hi-tech solutions was fun! Highly recommend! Many thanks also to our excellent guide Honza!

Cool Escape Room! . I have done about 5 Escape roomsNow, this my most recent. It was just myself and my boyfriend which people say is usually too hard only two people. But we usuallyDo ok! We did the Monaco room. It was pretty tough, but we managed it in 48.08mins and got 3 clues :)Don't want to ruin it but some different challenges than I have seen before in a game!Jan explained to us in English, and helped us a little along the way Thanks Jan for a good afternoon!

Robbery in Monaco. We were a group of two and found this room to be challenging. Our host Jan was very helpful and we really enjoyed the challenges required to complete this room. There were some good puzzles and we needed a couple of clues to see us through. Would love to try the other room too.

Great escape game for our group. We took the inglorious basterds '45 room as a group of 5 guys without any escape room experience yet. Tho we could solve it after 42 min with a bit of help of our host Jan.It was a very good time and we will definitely come back to try the other room!Jan was a great host for us New Years hungover guys on the 1st of January 16!Enjoy!

Monaco Heist - truly amazing. This was our first escape game and we really enjoyed it! :) We successfully robbed the house with only little help from Honza, the organisator. We definitely recommend it and we are looking forward to solve another escape room "The Summer of 1944" here.

Great experience!! Highly recommended. We had the opportunity to try the escape game as a teambuilding activity and it was just great! We played the World War 2 exit game. I loved the decoration of the rooms and the original equipment. Most importantly the storyline was interesting and very exciting. I especially appreciated the diversity of the tasks which altogether contributed to our amusement. Special thanks to Jakub who was our guide
Hi quality game. Have been to dozen of quest rooms in 3 countries. For the moment "Inglorious bustards" is the best in decorations an scenary.
Great experience!. Would definitely recommend!!! You should try it if you in Prague. You can spare 60 min to experience an exiting adventure!!!

Production valve was amazing . Only the second escape room I have done but by far the best.. couldn't belive how well themed the room was far exceeded my expectations.. and Jan was a huge help. Not that we needed any clues

Great fun and interesting experience!. Very exciting game, I have never been to any other game like this but it was really worth to go there. Must go also to the other escape game - Monako! What's more the place is very comfy and our host - Jakub - was really nice and helpful. It really exceeded my expectations. So let's try it!

Cool experience. I'd never done anything like this before, but it far exceeded my expectations. The theme of the rooms was really nice and the production values were excellent. The puzzles were challenging, but not unfair or unsolvable (we managed to solve them despite nursing New Year's Eve hangovers). Thanks to our excellent guide Jan as well!

Battle of the sexes. What a fun night activity! Two teams boys vs girls and our host Jan who made it one epic battle! Lots of fun, plenty of laughs and good teamwork! Thanks to Jan for really making our night :)
Great Fun. A Very fun and chanllanging escape room experience. Unique puzzles and very good atmosphere inside the rooms.

Great fun with friends!. I've attended several escape games in Prague and must admit that Door Z I liked the most .What I really liked about this game is its design and attention to details- you really feel the atmosphere! All the tasks are really well developed and make your brain go crazy)! Also I appreciated the location in the center of Prague and customer care! So, highly recommended!

Simply great!. I've been to several quest rooms in Prague, but Doorz for sure is brining the game to a higher level. Surrounding of both rooms will just catch you from the very beginning and won't let you go till the end. I can only reccomend!
Great fun!. Highly recommend to spend great time with friends, or as a team building. We really enjoyed! Interesting puzzles, secret passages,unexpected solutions))
Great atmosphere and good mood!. We had a good time with friends! Quest Monaco remain in the memory, together with Prague! I advise everyone!

Great Escape Game in Prague. We went to the test game, and were one of the first teams to play. This was the best escape game I experienced in Prague, and I have been to at least five of them. Great atmosphere, captivating plot, interesting tasks, unexpected ending- every one in our team had a lot of fun!

Kryštof Kolumbus. Absolvovali jsme výpravu s Kryštofem Kolumbem do Ameriky. Vynikající hra plná dobrých nápadů a skvělých myšlenek. Zpracování kulis a úroveň místnosti nás naprosto vtáhly do děje. Řešení jednotlivých úkolů spočívalo na využití kombinace všímavosti a logiky. Hra se nám moc líbila, určitě stojí za vyzkoušení! We sailed with Christopher Columbus to America. Terrific game with brain training ideas. Design and structure of the escape room took us immediately into the action. Solution of individual tasks was based on observation and logic. We really enjoyed the game - worth a try!

exciting and intriguating fun for all ages!. visited Gullivers travel room - the rooms really brought the adventure alive! a great flow during the game. lots and lots of good quests and tests! an important note, if you get stuck, the hosts are really good at leading you in the right direction WITHOUT solving the problem for you! really contribuation to the overall awesome experience. the hosts were really kind, encouraging and friendly. A++ recomended! Exitgame like this one, can be solved by almost everyone, it is a good thing to have a mixed group (also in between ages) you need to think in more than one direction to succed.To the RunAway team: thank you for the best time in Prague - we will return next time around (Keep up the good work!)

Archimedes. It was my 7th game and I enjoyed it. It's really original and the puzzles are quite difficult. The solutions are not common so it can bring a lot of joy. It's a pure pleasure! I definitely recommend. The room master was a great guy, funny and energetic!
Entertaining, moderately difficult escape game. With interesting ideas, technology usage and even added thrill. Suitable for beginners as well as veterans.
Guantanamo prison break. Very good experience. Original idea. Pleasant a communicative staff. I´m look forvard to visit next rooms. I´m recommend !

Great experience!!. We have visited both Guantanamo and Archimedes and I have to say that I didn´t expect so much fun. Rooms are filled by smart ideas and unexpected moments. Someone put a lot of effort to come up with all these puzzles. On the top of that the staff is really nice and helpful so you feel comfortable even if you are not exactly a genius :) No english barriers there. I can fully recommend.

So far the best game we entered. I truly recommend this company and this game.. It was really authentic and even demanding guest will be satisfied with the logic and stratedy of the game. We really enjoyed it and cant wait to try other game of this "brand". Nice staff is also appreciated :) good luck with this game :)

What amazing advanture :). We spent really great time in this game. At the beginning it appeared to be an impossible getaway. The game has superb atmosphere and there is a lot of tricky tasks and brain-teasers. Most of all the staff were extremely friendly. Would definitely recommend.
First escape in our live.. Nice. Great! I recommend it for everybody. Small children can solve it with small prompter. We done Archimedes' secret. T.

So far two of the best escape games in Prague. went through only about 10 escape games here in Prague, but these belong definitely to the best ones (both Archimedes and Guantanamo). great rooms with surprises/story/staff ...can only recommend

Awesome experience!. Couldn't recommend this more. Exit Game RunAway is very entertaining and engaging. The variety of puzzles is unparalleled and the unique twists for the game really do make this a fantastic experience.

Great fun! Go for it! It was our first 'escape room' and I am sure not the last one. I can highly recommend this game, it was very clever. We were couple and ot was really good to work together and solve the puzzles.
Archimedes. Cool gamekeeper, really good game. It was our third experience of this kind and we would certainly recommend it.

Great experience . Was a verry fun escape to do this is my second one and i think it was little bit harder but for aure more fun ! We had a great time also the people who are working there ar kind so for sure its worth to try it out !!

Absolutely great game!. You must visit game called Guantánamo - great idea and realization. There is really very polite young man as a assistant and game is czech and also english friendly. I definitely go back to play the second game Archimédés.
Great exit game in Prague. Really interesting exit game in Prague. We spend there about 1 hour and it was fun from begining to the end.
Excellent game. The stuff was very kind and everything was perfect. We are satisfied totally and looking forward to visit them again.

awesome experience. We have chosed Guantanamo escape and it is real fun. Game has a great atmosphere, you can have a glimpse of really hopeless experience of inmates in a correction facility. Game is really clever designed, and is very challenging. I will certainly recommend it to enthusiasts.

Great experience while escaping Guantanamo prison. We had chance to escape from most secured prison Guantanamo and we did it in a limit! We were so excited by the whole story and whole environment so we enjoy it on 100%. We can only recommend this Exit room and we believe that it is one of the top in Prague. All staff was very friendly and helpful in the right time. Thank you
Best. They have best escape rooms I ever play. Rooms are so cleaver buldit.They had nice tricky puzzle which will make you surprise. I can rexomendit go for it.
great exit game. i had great time with my mates here. i had visited many similar rooms and this one is really cooool.

Possibly the best breakout game in prague. I can recommend this escape game to anyone who are considering trying it for the first time or experienced players. It offered numerous challenges, and being 6 people in the group still left us with more challenges than people. The staff was very nice and accommodating and there was snacks/drinks offered at a good price.10/10 Experience, and a very nice way to spend the last day in Prague!

Dawm awesome!. It was my first time doing something like this, and I was not disappointed! Actually it was really fun, staff very friendly and give you some briefing and give you a bit of reallity ahah thanks!!
Great way to dive into the history of Czeckoslovakia. A great adventure with a lot of historical objects and fun intellectual challenges! Great way to spend an afternoon in Prague.
Fun!. Four friends, and we have never done this before. Exiting and fun. We almost felt the spirit of KGB in the bunker! We want more!!!! Love it
Great escaperoom. We had a great time at the escaperoom. Well designed! Eva was a very good host! We would definitely recommend this place to other people.

Creative, positive, bright feelings and memories!. Our team was 3 people and everybody was happy during and after the game. František­, who was leading the game, is really welcoming and positive person, it is easy to get the information from him even without good knowledge of English. Some tasks are not so easy, but you have a good helper. Rooms are perfectly decorated. Fun and excitment are provided!
Perfect. This game was really cool and now i want to try more Escape games. The game was exciting. And we almost belived what the KGB would arrive.
Lovely Rooms with tricky riddles . Both og us went to an escape game for the first time - surely won't be the last. We were emerged and challenged, perfect experience!

Exemplary. We are very much into escape rooms and this was one of our best experiences so far. This well furnished room offers a good variety of tasks without making you feel lost, an awesome atmosphere and a coherent story. Best of all: Hints were given in-character, as not to disrupt the atmosphere, and none of them were unasked for.

I do recommend. This was out 2nd escape game and we enjoyed every minute of it, I went with my family and was amazed by our ability to cooperate (even our teenage kids who normally fight all the time!) The puzzles are interesting and quite difficult, it was fun, it's definitely worth it.

First we've ever done and SO fun. It rode the perfect line between challenging and fun, kept us guessing and each member of our group's minds worked on different tasks which made for an interesting symbiosis... Was very exciting and there was a surprise after every turn! Tomas was super cool as well! Go here!

A Lot of Fun. Try it - You will be surprised. We were 2 couples on this mission and we had a lot of fun. A real mind game :) Thanks a lot to our instructor Eva :) We have already recommended this game to family and friends.

First time but not last. I went with two " experienced" friends. I thought it was a bit difficult but we managed to get out in time!
I live 5 minutes from this place and didn't even know about it!
Would truly recommend it!

Fun puzzles.... We went as a group of 11 for a bachelor party... We split up and had two games. It was really fun with some challenging but solvable puzzles for a fair price. We can only recommend it.
Breakout Prague. My family had a great time trying to break the code and get to the secret documents before the KGB got to us!

Best in Prague. It was an awesome event, our hostess made sure we were indulged in the theme and she did a great job. The room was very cool and challenging. This one is definitly a must! Just go! Now!

Great escape room. We had a great time, the room gets you in the right mood of the theme, very challenging but can be done.
We enjoyed it very much

Fun escape game. This was a fun escape game with so many little details we didn't even catch them all (but the staff showed us to them after finishing, which was nice). All the puzzles were well designed, some of them were quite original (from my experience with a few other escape games). The decorations were also nicely fitting the theme.We went as a team of 5 people and it was maybe a little too crowded at times, so I'd recommend going in a smaller team to fully enjoy everything.

A must when visiting Prague!. Thoroughly enjoyed, would definitely recommend. Great team game. Didn't know what to think at first because it was hard to find but as soon as we got there, staff were excellent and made it even more enjoyable. The game itself was so much fun with just the correct level of difficulty.Would definitely recommend!
Great way to spend an evening!!. So much fun! The righlevelt of difficulty, staff very friendly, highly recommend it to friends and family! Great time, cant wait to try out some more escapes!!

It was freaking amazing!!!. We had the best time. The puzzles are engaging and challenging the Tomas helped us in the right amount, allowing is to still figure out the clues on our own. We had a blast and we can promise you will have a great time!! Go, go, go!

First escape room, keen to do another. We found this on ta and as it was 5 mins walk away and we had a birthday treat to book, thought why not? Thoroughly enjoyed it. Charming hostess, clues were mix of easyish and downright tricky but fair. Succeeded with 5 mins to spare. Amazing how fast the first 30 mins go! We all enjoyed it. Would thoroughly recommend.

feel like a secret agent!. Breakout Prague was our first Escape Room Game and we really loved it ! We were a team of only two persons and sometimes it was really hard to find out the next step. Thanks to "Roger", our partner in the hospital who remembered some hints when we felt lost, we could make it just in time with only 5 seconds left. You really feel like a secret agent, there are so many hints you have to combine to find the solution, but constantly you advance. It was really great fun I almost would like to do it again. =)

One of the best experiences in Prague . We had so much fun solving the puzzles. The girl at the reception was super polite and kind and we had the best customer service we have had in the whole Prague during the week. 5 stars to the experience.
Really great experience!. This escape game is a really great experience. We were with 4 people and the guy was very helpful and took his job very serious. It was great fun!

Amazing experience. We were four people playing the game and it was so great, funny and interesting. All those riddles, locks, systems,... everything was well prepared. The atmosphere and arrangement of all the historical stuff was so cool! I would love to recommend everybody to go!
Brilliant . Went as a group of 4... And we all throughly enjoyed it. The rooms were well planned and organised. Definitely worth a go!

Let the games begin ! . It was real fun with all the clues we had to look for and the puzzles to solve. Really cool decoration and very helpful host (Eva). Booking online was so easy and even we were a bit late, i just contacted them and they were waiting for us to start the fun :)
The extra beers we ordered helped us solve the mystery.... Fantastic and a great activity for our stag party. Great surprise for the other 6 guys in the group.
Fun!. The room was challenging and very fun. Decoration was nice and steps were logically built up. The guide Thomas is an extremely nice and welcoming guy!

Challenging and surprising. At first we didn't know what to expect. It was challenging and surprising. The guide was friendly and we have enjoyed the "brain" game. Remarkable. Safe, funny and cool also for the kids.
Breakout Prague was great fun. Breakout Prague included fun and creative puzzles. We've done several escape rooms and this one had some cool elements.

Like an action-movie!. On our last day in Prague, we planned to try an escape game for the first time. When we arrived at Breakout Prague (quite difficult to see as there's no large sign), we discovered that we had booked the wrong date. So the door was locked and there was no one there. We luckily found their number online and called to describe what had happened. The owner (a young couple started this business, we had the pleasure of meeting Tomas) was very friendly and arrived shortly after our conversation, even though he was not really working at the time.We really enjoyed the game! The tasks were difficult enough to be challenging, yet felt not by any means impossible. And if we were stuck Tomas would gladly help us. As a bonus we solved the mission in the very last second! It was quite a thrilling experience.The owner is extremely welcoming, and the game itself is very exciting, as well as rewarding (especially if you succeed in solving it). If you need a break from walking around in Prague and watching beautiful buildings, I strongly recommend you to visit Breakout Prague!
Like life PC game. I think the comparison with adventure or point and click PC game is the right one. It is like virtual reality. I liked it very much.

Breakout Prague was AWESOME!. We had a blast with this escape game. It was all our first time doing it and had just met each other the day before, it was the perfect amount of difficulty to be fun and a little stressful. Highly recommend!
Nice challenge. . The room was challenging enough. We made it out (a couple) with extra 5 min. This is our 4th room and we enjoyed it very much.
Good adventure!. Adventure game in cold war setting taking place in several rooms. Great value for your money, and you're allowed to drink beer while playing!

Great fun. Very fun escape room. You get really into the game and our guide was very kind and informative. The puzzles are very satisfying to solve. When you think you are done, you are not it is not that expensive either, so if you are in Prague I would recommend this.

Amazing! One of the best!. We played many escape games around the world and this one was definitely one of the best, if not the best one... The design and story was excellent. The puzzles were smart and everything had great flow. Must do when you are in Prague! Don't miss out!Thanks for the game, we had a blast!

Awesome Escape room with nice atmosphere themed in Czechoslovakian Communist Era. Game has multiple rooms and nice variation of puzzles. Game is not hard much and we made it although it was our first game - therefore I can recommend it to (but not only to) beginners.

Great First Experience!. It was my friends and I first experience doing a Breakout room and this breakout room set the bar high! It wasn't labeled great on the street (just in an apartment builiding) but it was close to the train station and our leader met us outside. We got help as needed and overall it was a great first experience.

FUN FUN FUN. - really close to tram station
- friendly staff that explains everything
- escape room is really great. A lot of puzzles to solve, some were quite tricky but the staff helps you if you aks for help trough a walky talky.

Worth and amazing . My friends decided to go and definitely the best decision.
The set up is awesome and there are plenty of objects that take you to Soviet era.
The game was clear and the instructions easy to understand. I would recommend it to all my friends.

Great fun!. I decided to book Breakout Prague due to the number of excellent reviews on Tripadvisor and I wasn't disappointed. The host was friendly and clearly explained how to play the game to us before we started. The story takes place in 1950's communist era and the mission is to find documents and breakout of the room before the KGB agents arrive. The host gives you a walkie talkie so he can communicate with you and give you hints or tips if you should need them. The game was set up very well and it was really fun to play. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is thinking of booking something fun to do whilst in Prague.

Nuclear fun. We played the escape game as a couple and it was great fun. Tricky but with the help of lovely Tomas we made it out in time 'ish'. Compared to other escape games it is excellently priced (40 Euro). We would have loved if more of the story was revealed as each puzzle was solved. Highly recommended!

Great experience. Our first escape room and I must say that it did not disappoint. We loved the theme and it was very exciting to solve all the puzzles. Thomas and Ela were also great and provided all the information.If you have an hour to spend for having fun with your friends, I would definitely recommend going to the Breakout Escape Room.BREAKOUT DELIVERED!

An energising start to a visit in Prague!. Breakout is really engaging! It immediately sucked me and my friends in (all, bar me, having never done an escape game before). Eva is a wonderful guide, giving just the right amount of help (if required!) to allow you to solve the quirky challenges.We were all hugely relieved to escape and it left us buzzing for the rest of our trip in Prague. Couldn't recommend it enough!
Great escape game. This was my first escape game experience and I really enjoyed it. I played with five friends and each of us has some ideas and finally we got out two minutes before the limit :-).
Awesome Experience. It was our first Breakout Game and it was awesome. The Staff was lovely and gets us into the right mood before the Game starts.I can fully recommend this experience!

Definitely Recommend . First experience of an escape room, 8 of us split into 2 teams of 4, one team attempted the escape room after the other, staff were very friendly and helpful, and challenges were great, would definitely recommend

Back into communist days. Me and my brothers really enjoyed this experience. We had the feeling that we are back in communist times. The special tricks and effects were great. We just made it on time with a little help. I can't remember when I had this much fun and excitement.

Cool and challeging. We were here with a group of 5. Very nice scenery and decoration.
Definitly had to cooperate to reach the end with only 2 minutes left on the clock.
Puzzles were challenging to solve with some good surprises.

Prague's hidden gem!!. Saw all the great reviews and decided it was a good way of spending a few hours and were not disappointed. Eva the host was very friendly and we thought it the setting and game was very well executed!
Student from Erasmus. t was a very nice experience . It has much anguish and a lot fun . hopefully next time we will go there is a new theme 😀

Be part of a revolt for a while. I wasn't expecting such an awesome adventure. By the second half of the game I was really excited about every new clue we have found. Highly recommended for adult in love with mistery, histery and codes.

Good experience!. This is a well-designed, theme related escape game. While it isn't actually a bunker, it is made up to look like one and filled with period details, challenging puzzles and clues hidden throughout the multiple rooms you must work your way through.Some of the clues are very hard, others are a little easier and it would be extremely difficult to finish in under an hour if the support team did not offer tips along the way. Overall, it is well designed with story-related elements throughout and our host, Eva, did a great job of setting up and managing the process in the room. Certainly worth the price for a group of four of us (cash only).

Great atmosphere and riddles. Breakout Prague is perfectly located in Zizkov quarter and after we descended into basement, I instantly felt like I travelled back in time to Cold War Czechoslovakia. The artifacts - furniture, maps, radio, old uniforms are perfectly chosen to build the tension and make you completely forget the outside world. Difficulty of the puzzles is set very right - they are demanding but fun and the same time. I must admit that I had a few moments of proudness when I solved them :) I also liked that there are more rooms included, which adds dynamics to the game.In conclusion, we hade a really great time and I would definitely recommend the experience to anybody.

Brilliant. Our first escape game and really enjoyed it, staff were very friendly and happy to encourage us. Easy to recommend to anybody looking for any activities in Prague. Fantastic time and can't wait to try more.

Real Life "Black Ops". A great facility and well thought put together! Friendly staff. The game itself was very realistic and the atmosphere added so much to the experience. The puzzles were very challenging and interesting and used awesome props! This is the right game for Prague. I almost want to do the same game again.I actually neglected to write this review for months until I played another escape game in another town. This one was far superior.

Absolutely Amazing Experience. Absolutely awesome time spent here would highly recommend this experience to anyone in Prague with an hour to kill. Genuinely gets the brain working and adrenaline going.Eva is an absolute star as well she sets the mood prior to the game commencing and makes the whole experience perfect can't thank her enough for a uniquely entertaining afternoon.
Amazing experience. We were 4 friends doing the escape game and we had so much fun. You dont stop looking for clues, codes, and hidden hints. Cant tell you more :P must try experience

They've set the bar high for future games!. This Breakout games was really challenging and fun! The staff set the scene well and the set design was great. I can't wait to play another, though they have set the bar quite high - will we be able to find another breakout game that will compare?? haha :) thanks for having us!

super fun!. We went to the Breakout Prague and had the best time ever! Fantastic setting, super friendly staff & great description of the game.
Tasks were varied, smart and very inventive.
Thank you so much, we had the most amazing time!!!

Amazing game. Me and my partner try the breakout game at the last day of our visit in Prague. It was our first escape game and we definitely will try others after this thrilling experience. Only with some hints of Thomas we were able to finish in time. In our view it was a really challenging and funny game with quiet a lot details in and a good story around it.

Fun experience!. The Breakout Prague is a really nice way to try something els than beer and sightseeing in Prague! The game was fun and challenging without being imposible or scary. The staff was really nice and friendly and overall it is for sure worth a visit!

Definitely worth a visit!. I went here with my partner on the 3rd day of our visit and we loved it! Tomas was such a brilliant host of the games and he even rung us when we were lost and came and found us. He even took a picture of us both after the game and emailed it to us at no extra charge. The games are brilliantly structured and really makes you think! Unfortunately we were unable to finish in the hour time but only by just a few minutes. Definitely do this, we can't recommend it enough!Also on a side note, the sign for breakout Prague is quite small on the side of the building so if your using google maps or similar it's there just have a good look!

Nice theme, and exciting game . We had the Nuclear Bunker room and it was a great experience!We were not able to finish on time, but still we enjoyed it a lot. The organiser was friend and helpful, since it was our first time in an escape room. We liked the fact that you really have to use your brain and be creative at some points! We definitely recommend!
Cool quests and puzzles. We enjoy it a lot! There is original and authentic story and game prepared. Hard enought, but anyone can solve it just with a logic and universal knowledge.

Challenging game. We had a lot of fun on this escape game. There is a cool Cold War theme and a lot of good props. The puzzles are very challenging - we have done a few of these games but we still needed a few clues. The host was very helpful and quite enthusiastic. I would definitely recommend this game. It can be a bit hard to find as there isn't a lot of signage. If you find the door then buzz to be let in. You will be taken down underground which adds to the atmosphere.

Really exciting. We had loads of fun and the Final was quite hard but also exciting! So many original riddles are in this bunker! And the time limit of 1 hour is hard to get by ;) Only the (english) introduction sounded a bit as if learned by heart. The best party size would be 4 persons I guess. Totally recommendable.
One of the best escape game in Prague!. Fast, intensive, well prepared. Extra fun guaranteed! Excellent guides. Thanks for a great experience. Highly recommended.

Puzzling the tricky way. This was our first breakout game, therefor it was really challenging for our group of 6 people. But with a little help from our commander we were able to achieve the goal and escape the bunker right before the enemy could catch us.The room is designed with so much love to detail full of nostalgic stuff. It takes you back to the time of cold war and let you feel like a spy of this era.Thank you very much for this awesome experience, we had a great time and would definitivly recommend it to others.

Exciting until the end. The room was really nice designed and created an exciting atmosphere so you felt like being in a real bunker.The secrets and myteries were very clever and varied. We had so much fun!

Great way to escape reality and be transformed back to the 1950's. Our family of 4 first try at this new craze...Thoroughly enjoyed ourselves! We had to ask for three clues...they are really challenging.From now on, we will be looking for these games in every city we visit...Thanks for a great time out...glad i did not live in the communist spy era!Casper & family

Excellent bunker atmosphere. The location makes you feel like you really are in a bunker! Really nice tasks that become more and more tricky the further you get to the end! The best room escape I've experienced so far!

Thank you Breakout Prague. Great escape game. It was actually my first time so couldnt really imagine what it would be like, but it overcame my expectations. Lots of twists and turns, I enjoyed myself as well as my friends did. Thanks a lot :-)
Escape experience. Nuclear bunker has a great location. Our supervisor, Eva, introduced us to the game and we learnt something from history.

Amazing and historical adventure. Alright I'll be as brief as possible.We had one hour to complete and succes it.The main goal was to unlock all the rooms and get to the last one and get the documents.I've to admit, even if we failed the game was just great.It's tough but very productive in the same time.Can't really describe it.I didn't even realize how fast the one hour passed.I reccomend this for sure, you'll have the best one hour you can have on something like that.
The Best. It was so good! It was the best game i have every played...Try it is the best for entertertainment..
First "escape room" experience. Excellent place for team building, families, friends. Close to the center of Prague (10 min by tram). Highly recommended.

Brilliant fun!. I've been to a few Escape games now and this was definitely one of the best! So much fun and there was more to it than I was expecting... Would absolutely recommend for an entertaining and challenging, fun alternative activity in Prague.

If you like escape rooms you ll love this one !. Great escape room, great theme!! Did this in a group of 4 with our parents who hasn't done before. Lots of fun. Highly recommend!! Done lots of escape rooms and loved this one!! Must do!
Holidays. Very good experience! So different and and fun! I look forward for the next room!!!! Highly recommend for people who want to escape from the usual holidays program!!

Best 60 minutes in Prague!. Really enjoyable experience for me, first time I took part in this kind of activity, and it was just unforgettable! You should plan your visit here during your stay in Prague, to make it even more exciting. Extremely friendly staff worth mentioning too! Go there with children, they will enjoy for sure :)
Escape Game. Bored in Prague? Wanna take your friends places? Try this escape game. Great fun, nice riddles in logical sequence with the attractive story behind. RECOMMENDED!!!

Great challenging escape game. This was my first escape and our whole group of 5 thoroughly enjoyed it. You can see that lots of work went into developing the place, story and puzzles. Overall, the 1hour limit is just about right, you have to come up with your best to make it! Tomas, the cofounder was very helpful and is also providing hints should you get stuck at something. Overall, I would definitely recommend it to groups of friends and families with bigger kids as well.

First Escape Room Experience. Wow! This was my first escape room experience and I had very little an idea of what to expect. The staff, decor and story were amazing. I visited with three other people and we had an excellent time. There is a great mix of simple and complex puzzles and our group is still talking about how unique of an experience Breakout is. If you find yourself with a free night in Prague skip your routine bar night and head to Breakout for a good time.

Authentic and fun!. When my girlfriend had the suggestion to try the breakout style game I was unsure. However once we arrived and actually participated I was instantly in love with it. The staff are extremely friendly and love what they do, and the experience they provide is very rewarding especially for the price. Would highly recommend for anyone interested!
In 4 word : Challenge, Fun, History, Pressure. It's was a very fun Escape Game very realistic and very beautiful and creative Escape Room well decored as a Communist Bunker.

Take a break from guided tours and try to escape. After tricking the way out of the back of the train station by overcoming the hurdle of a grim real life policeman (I recommend not to use this way but go walk around the train station) we were just in the right mood to also escape the KGB. The game is fun and done really nicely by its creators, Tomas and Eva! Great to test your team work skills within the family! All 3 of us (17, 50 and 57 years old) enjoyed it!

Witty Escape Room in Zizkov. It was my first time to visit escape room. We went as team of three and it was absolutely great and bonding experience for us. There are 3 rooms designed as state secret police directorate. There is always an unexpected surprise in each of the rooms. It took us more than hour to solve all the tasks. The couple that runs this place are really welcoming and make you feel comfortable although you have no clue what's ahead of you. There are also free drinks provided.
Definitely recommend. Very exciting fun and challenging activity!Would definetly recommend to people visiting Prague!Someting different

Perfect engagement for a small group. Tomas and Eva from Breakout Prague are creative and customer centric. Their real life escape room is fabulous and perfect for any team or tourist group of upto 6 people. The setting, the clues, the activity, the challenges and the overall experience is brilliant, to say the least. If you're in Prague and wondering what to do apart from the "touristy" stuff, then I highly recommend that you get in touch with Breakout Prague and book a slot. Its ideal as a team building game as well as a friends/family outing.Its offbeat, exciting and will keep you talking about it through the day and week too.

Absolutely great experience!. I can only recommend you this escape game! It is absolutely fantastic - I especially like that there are more rooms. The quests are clear and logic, story makes great sense and the decorations in rooms are cool :) And also there is very friendly staff.

Great Play. I finished this Escape Room with my brother. We found a very nice location, lovely created with very nice concentration of design. As an historian I really enjoyed the experience, because it was authentic. The level of the "Secrets" are well done and there is no time getting boring, We finished it in about 59 minutes and enjoyed every second.So if you like Escape Rooms and also like czech younger historian age, you will love it.And also another word about the owners. They are great!Thx a lot and I will come back for sure :)

Would definitely do it again. Me and my girlfriend have never heard of this type of thing before and thought about trying it out. It was a really fun experience and also really challenging.The staff was nice too. thanks for this great adventure.

The best exit game in Prague. Me and my friends tried 4 different escape rooms in Prague as it's much cheaper here than in other cities in Europe. The Nuclear Bunker room was by far the best one we played. The atmosphere is so real. We really felt like spies in 1950's. Everything is so well prepared and I was amazed at the creativeness of all the puzzles. This room is really unique, challenging and fun at the same time. Highly recommended!

Unique game, fun and challenging!. We decided to give this a go when in Prague. We had never done anything like this before but thought why not! Well from the start we could see how professionally well run this place is. Our lovely host giving us a good welcome and explained how the game works, the rules and then the storyline which was very good indeed. It's hard not to get sucked into the game ahead as its all very well put forward by the staff. So off we went with 1hour to attempt the mission. It was so much fun, quite challenging, and we didn't really know what we were looking for at first but as the game progressed we soon got the jist! Maybe attempt this one without a hangover next time as we really had to use our heads! The puzzles and clues are all very well thought out and as you find secret compartments and drawers and cupboards it all just sucks you in to the game which is a lot of fun. Highly recommend this, and we will def have another go in the near future. Well done Breakout Prague!

Can you be the hero and find the documents?. Super cool experience!! We were a group of two people, so it was pretty hard, couldn't make it in time but nevertheless we got help and solved all the puzzles. The puzzles and hidden mysteries are really cool and the bunker is decorated perfectly according to the theme! Would definitely recommend it and go there again, super exciting !

Fantastic Escape Room and Story Telling - 5 Seconds left. We were 2 players, and enjoyed this escape room from the bottom up! The rooms are very well decorated, the puzzles to solve range from fairly easy, to distracting items, to pure logic, and typical spy-puzzles. We managed to get to the hidden documents with just 5 seconds left on the clock!The greatest thing about this Escape Room in Prague is its storytelling, and the authentic decoration. You can tell that they put a lot of work, attention to details, and passion into it.The location is already convenient, as this neighborhood is very trendy, and a good place to get a drink or snack afterwards.In a nutshell: Fun, and well-spent money! Thanks a lot!

Escape room. By far the best we have ever been to. Heaps of fun, interesting, challenging clues! Can tell lots of thought and effort was put into this, the staff were super helpful and enthusiastic! Definitely recommend was a good way to enjoy an hour of our day :)
wonderful experience. It was my first time in a room escape. Many riddles and puzzles. We won in 56 minutes! fully satisfied.

Great experience . Great fun for all! The story takes place in a communist nuclear bunker during the 1950's and it's pretty interesting to hear a bit about Czech history before the game starts. The game it self is really addictive. I would play it again if it was possible. I'm pretty sure you will love it as well :) Just give it a try, you won't regret...

Historical and educational. This game surprised us because we didn't know about Czech history almost anything. It was kind of tricky and we did it in 55 minutes! The place is located just one tram stop from main train station and a few minutes by walking which is really nice.

bunker party with friends. been there with a group of guys on a city trip for the weekend. the host was very nice - we were even offered something to drink for free - and the escape room was created with passion to details. electronic gadgets made a number of wow effects. riddles were fun. location was easy to reach. would definitely recommend a visit.

Amazing Experience & Great Staff. It was an amazing game with so many unique and creative puzzles ! Everything was difficult but logical which made solving the puzzles so satisfying. The whole escape scenario and details complimenting the theme were awesome.. Also, the hosts were accommodating, friendly and helpful throughout. We could tell they are escape game fans just like us ! Highly recommended.

Secret agent for one hour. If you wanna go back behind the Iron Curtain into the Cold War era, this is an absolutely must for you! I went there with my friends and we really had to think hard in order to finish our task. The amount of different magnetic locks, secret doors and other "spy" stuff has really surprised me. Go and check this out!

Awesome experience, I have never done this before! :). It is a unique and a very creative game where you need to solve a lot of brain teaser and find the secret documents in 60 minutes. I was there with my friends and we had a lot of fun! It was our first time in such a game so it was kind of demanding for us but definitely worth it. English friendly, the staff is great, highly recommended! :)

The greatest escape games in Prague. I visited three escape games in Prague and this place was definitely the best. We had the "bomb" room. It was really challenging, exciting and the trics and riddles were very innovative. Our whole group loved it!

výborná zábava v hrobce!. Moje třetí úniková hra - Tomb je bezkonkurenčně nejlepší. atmosféra hry, různorodost řešení, nutnost týmové kooperace v několika místnostech. zatím rozhodně to nej, co jsem v této "branži" zažil.My third escape and The Tomb was the best one for me - I can only recommend to spend one hour with exciting team game...
Exciting group adventure. It is a great team building and exciting game! Will definetly come back to do the other room and hopefully beat the clock!
Worth trying! . Amazing game. Difficult to solve but definitely worth trying! You can have fun with friends or family and try how you work as a team! Higly recommending! :)

Awesome experience, great for a rainy day. Myself and two friends visited TRAP when they came to see me in Prague, it was a great experience and actually very challenging! It required a lot of skill to complete all the challenges playing the 'bomb' game. The host was lovely which made the experience all the more enjoyable. Will definitely be returning to TRAP again to try out the other room!
It was great!. We did it! It´s a lot of fun. The best escape game in Prague. Very clever and quite hard! Definitely recommend!

Awesome experience!. My fiance and myself played both rooms, and it was realy challenging experience. At some points of the game it took all our skills to solve out the puzzles, but eventualy we managed to solve all the tasks on time. The games are beautifuly decorated and the music playing in the background makes the experience even better. The Secret of Tomb was a little bit scary which was fun, and the Bomb room was more tricky and technical. I can only recommend this!

Nice Entertainment. We played here the BOMB scenario. We have done other escape games before in our lifes and were satisfied with the offered scenario. It was really tough but great fun even for 6 persons. Nice service and tricky gameplay = 5/5*
úniková hra. We had very great time playing both games, both of them are original and there are amazing tasks to complete - some of them are harder, but it is still fun in the end :)

Hunter. Hello. Super experience in the heart of Prague. Solving logic tasks plague even experienced :) after completing one action one has to try and taste more and find out whether it would be better.
Great experience, friendly staff. Went with a few friends and tried the bomb. It was great fun, staff was friendly and helpful. Would definitely recommend it!

Great fun, friendly people. We booked both rooms with a group of 8 friends and split into 2 groups. We had a small delay with the start because the group in front of us didn't want to pay after their voucher was apparently expired. Our game master was a great guy with very good English. He told us he was a bit stressed because of the incident before us, especially since he only worked there for a month. We didn't really mind since he was really friendly and easy-going. I was in the bomb room. It was quite hard to do (it was our first time also), and I don't think we'd have gotten far if he hadn't given us a hint or 5 in total. The room itself is set-up really nice, with hidden stuff you wouldn't have ever thought about.All in all a great experience and each of my friends liked it.

So mich fun!. Although we were only in Prague for 4 days, we've been twice at the Trap und played both rooms. Real fun. We really enjoyed ourselves and are now escape game addicts.Also we hope you will play the game during Dominiks shift. What a charming and nice young man.

Good challenge, friendly staff. The girls running the reception & game were friendly and helpful - we were staying in the apartment above and turned up (Trap was in the basement) and made a reservation for that day. It is located in the middle of town, and easy to find - just look for the sign up on the other wall. Apart from one small technical glitch, the game was a good challenge. Not the hardest nor the easiest though that we have done; it was a good mix of applying logic and accurate guesswork. Thank you also for the professional photos!

Amazing Fun!. This was our first ever "escape room" experience, and it did not disappoint. Even though it took my girlfriend and I a humbling 72 minutes (with 4 hint calls) to get through the "Tomb", we absolutely loved every single second of it. My biggest regret is that we did this on our last night in Prague, so we didn't have time to do the "Bomb Defuse" room too!Fantastic mix of puzzle types that really challenge you without ever making you feel like you can't solve the problems in front of you. Highly recommended for anyone visiting Prague!

A Shaw. It was my frst time ever trying one of these games. I went along with 3 friends and we absolutely loved it. An amazing hour trapped in a room finding clues to detonate a bomb. We died... but it didn't spoil the fun as we really worked well as a group to get as far as we did. I couldn't recommend more.

Awesome experience . First time trying this sort of game and it was awesome. Perfect for a rainy day in Prague. The Game Master was very helpful and she made the experience even better by giving small clues when needed without revealing too much. WE MADE IT OUT . Definately worth going. We were 2 people but you can also go as a group.

Challenging but logical, good if you have prior experience. We did the "Secret of Tomb" room with my wife. We have been in different escape rooms before. Compared to the other escape rooms this was challenging but it wasn't because of illogical tasks (as in some other escape rooms) but more that you really needed to think what to do next. We didn't beat the clock :( as we were about 4 minutes over the limit. If you have been in other escape rooms before than this is a good challenge.

Fun and challenging for when youve walked too much!. I was apprehensive about this one as friends had been to ones in England and said you needed large groups. I imagine it would be better and also easier and you would probably get out within the hour.We did this as a couple and enjoyed it a lot. We were tired from site seeing and our feet were throbbing but we wanted to do something fun and this was the perfect place. Friendly staff and a cool dog who joined us at the end :-) we managed to escape within an hour and a half with help from the friendly staff.Would recommend to everyone, old, young, couples, groups, etc.
Brilliant Attraction. Really great fun! Much harder than we expected. We got blown up. Lovely staff, with good English. An ideal break from sightseeing!!

So much fun. I loved it - but I was a escape game version. There were four of us and I couldn't think of a better activity to fill an hour. It was difficult, but not too much so as to lose interest. We left feeling buzzing and elated (even though we lost). On a hunt to do all the escape games i come across now. Staff were helpful and friendly. Its well run.

Disappointing. After playing many escape games (9) in Prague, I should say trap prague is not in the top 5. The game was a bit illogical, the flow of the game is far from other rooms what we experienced.

Super únikovka. Moc pěkná místnost, propracované a nápadité hádanky. Milí průvodci hrou, se vším nápomocní. Rozhodně doporučuji k hraní !!! Very nice trap room, great variety of smart puzzles, nice rooms decorations. Helpful and kind staff, which will guide you trough the game. Really recommend to play !!!

Thrilling!. We played the bomb, and the puzzles are not easy to solve (which is somehow good, for the players to think harder). Service is good. I will definitely recommend this, and will come back if I have the time!
So much fun!. Such a great laugh. They have two rooms both of which are very different and complex. Awesome way to spend a few hours with friends.

Tomb room. Me and my boyfriend took on the tomb room at TRAP. The host was great and the story of the room was interesting. However, a number of the puzzles rely on maths and some of the maths seems quite illogical.Generally, I didn't feel this game flowed particularly well and I attribute this to the reliance on number problem solving.Would loved to have done the bomb room instead as this does not rely on number solving.

Great escape room!!. Great room, Wendy the room operator was more then amazing, the room pose a great challenge but all the riddles can be solved...Very recommended if you looking for an escape room in the center of Prague
Good fun. Brilliant fun. We did the bomb room and really had the adrenaline going. Very clever puzzles, and the staff were really friendly and helpful - thanks again!

Good fun and friendly staff member. This was the first time 4 50-somethings had done one of these games and it was great fun, just enough helped from the lovely lady at reception to give hits when they were needed - good way to spend an hour.

Fab time trying to escape!. We played the Tomb Room which was fab. very well thought out and despite having played a couple of different TRAP rooms before we still didn't have a clue - thank goodness for the hints. Staff were very friendly. We would definitely recommend for something fun and different to do whilst in Prague.

Fantastic way to spend a rainy hour in Prague. We played the 'Tomb' room and it was brilliant! Our host was very friendly and helpful and the game was fantastic. It's an easy walk from the centre (10-15 mins roughly from the old square) and a really different way to spend an hour if you want a break from sightseeing. I don't want to give too much away for those that haven't played a game like this before but it's great fun for all ages!
Great place, even better staff! . Our group of six did both the bomb and tomb games. Both were great fun, would highly recommend! Staff were very friendly and a good laugh.

We failed! But had a lot of fun trying...... We only decided to go to TRAP the day before we visited, and were lucky to be able to book the time slot we wanted. In fact we arrived a bit late as we got slightly lost trying to find it but rang ahead to let the staff know and they said it would be OK - they even offered to come and pick us up which was so kind, but not needed.We went into the Tomb Room - quite spooky. The first room reminded us of 'Ghost Stories' for anyone who's seen the stage production, with different numbers written on the wall. After solving a couple of clues we were able to open the door to another room which was way spookier than the first - quite gothic. I won't give more details as don't want to spoil it for anyone planning a visit.If there was a 'downside' to the experience, it was that all of the clues seemed to be kind of mathematical - not my strong point - and I think we'd have done better if there'd been a mixture of maths and maybe riddles or something included. We still had a smashing time and would definitely go again and maybe try the Bomb Room next time.Staff were incredibly helpful, kind and didn't make fun of us when we failed to solve it all in the one hour time slot...
Time flies... We visited the Tomb-trap with my girlfriend and it was just great. The staff was great, very helpful and kind. It was my first time and just loved it!
Great fun!. Not sure if this place is any better than the other room escapes, but we enjoyed our game here. The staff was very helpful, spoke English, and made sure everything went well.

Difficult!. My boyfriend and i picked to do the bomb room!! It was very fun yet picked my brain! We were about a minute away from deactivating the bomb before it went off :( The phone in the room really helps as youre being watched and if youre stuck on something for too ong, youll get a clue!!

Great first time experience . It was amazing! It was our first escape room and it was a hit. We had the tomb room. It was to bad that we didn't have a timer to see the time that was left. We started to use a lot of clues because we thought that we were running out of time. Otherwise everything was great. The riddles were neither too difficult nor too easy for first timers. We were well received and afterwards we got to write our name on the wall. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to try something exciting. We left with big smiles on our face and can't wait to come back and try the second room. P.s. no outside knowledge, like math or English, is required.

Really good rooms with helpful staff. Two great rooms with very challenging puzzles. Staff that we met were helpful and spoke good English. They accommodated 7 blokes from London on a boys weekend away no problem. A must to get out the cold!!

Great fun, especially on a rainy day! . We tried the secret tomb room and had great fun in the hour spent in the rooms trying to solve the mystery. Sadly, we failed and will be locked in there with a mad priest forever! We did this as a couple, and while some couples have successfully solved the mystery, I think it would definitely be easier with a few more people to help!The staff are very helpful and friendly too.If you have the time to spare whilst in Prague, this is definitely a fun and different thing to do :-)

Gets the brain working!. My boyfriend and I tried a couple of Prague's escape rooms and this was a great one!To be completely honest, my first thought when I entered wasn't overly confident. The place itself has a bunker-style feel and having completed numerous in the UK I felt that this seemed a little less well done BUT I was wrong!We completed the 'tomb' room and found the puzzles stimulating and thought provoking - everything was very logical and really made you think!A really enjoyable hour!

An affordable but great little afternoon filler. We went here as part of our stag do (don't let that put you off) and it was a real highlight - we actually ended up trying to book a second visit in their second room for our final day but they were fully booked. The girl working there was really friendly and chatty and then the scenario itself was just the right level of difficulty to work you hard but not leave you banging your head against the wall. All in all a good bit of fun for what I thought was a really affordable price - a great little afternoon filler.

Great time!. Our family of 5 (2 adults, 3 college kids) had such a good time at the first Trap Room that we booked it again 3 nights later and did the Bomb Room too! The puzzles were challenging and fun. We loved it!
A lot of fun!!. We are a family of four - 2 kids age 17 and 12 and we enjoyed it immensely! If you have a hour to kill in Prague - do it!
Great fun. Good quality escape game that flowed well.Really enjoyable with a good story.Would recommend again.

Fun for our family. Our family of four (2 adults and 2 college students) had a great time in the Bomb Room at the Trap. We escaped with just 4 minutes to spare, without any hints. Good level of puzzles. A surprisingly fun activity in Prague.

We loved it so much!!!. It was so fun!!! There are two rooms in there, we did both, very interesting and quite hard! We escaped from both of them tho we needed extra 5 minutes on the bomb room because it was very tricky :) Amazing experience! 2 hours flew like minutes. TOTALLY MUST IN PRAGUE, great for 5 people per room. GO THERE! :D

Cool escape room. It was our first experience, loved it very much, the staff was very friendly and helped when we needed a push. The puzzles are fun, not easy nor frustrating. Very good for beginners.

The most fun hour in prague. My boyfriend and I spent an hour in The Bomb Room having a wail of a time. The tasks were challenging and interesting, and the ideas so inventive! We have never played anything like it. Great value for how much fun we had. Avoid tacky bar crawls and overpriced tours and spend your money on an experience like no other. The lovely staff member running the experience was wonderful to talk to and so helpful with clues during the task. Despite having an amazing time we did actually fail to save prague from the explosion.

Great escape rooms. We have been in both rooms. It was a very fun experience, the design was cool and the riddles was challenging.The stuff in both times was very nice and their English was excellent, so as tourists we had no problem to communicate with them.Very recommended.

Great fun and reasonably priced!. My wife and I fancied doing one of these puzzle games and found trap on our travels around the city. We were initially a bit apprehensive but, once we got started, it was great fun. Really interesting puzzles and solutions. The lady on reception helped us when we got stuck (more than once) and had to call from the phone in one of the roomsOverall, one of the best things we did in Prague and reasonably priced at around £30 compared to more like £80 for something similar in London
Excellent game. Me and 4 friends attempted the Tomb game and managed to complete it with 2 minutes 25 seconds left! A very enjoyable game and very challenging.

bring your thinking head!. Don't be put off when you ring it hidden away on a little street... it really is worth the online booking and mission to find it! We were in there for 1 1/2 hrs (which we were told was quite good) and it flies by we were having that much fun. Lots of riddles and puzzles to solve to take you to the next room... VERY well thought out and little hints given to you should you need it. Very secure as all on CCTV. Loved it and am searching for one by me in England!

Good way to spent an hour. We went to this Tomb escape room. This was our first escape game and in the beginning it was a bit difficult but after we got a couple of tips from the host we really enjoyed the game. This is a good way to spent an hour..

Fun hour!. We played the Tomb game (there are three games, I asked the management to recommend a game) and BOMBED. The game was difficult enough, but Ii think that maybe if we hadn't come at the end of a long day, we would have done better. Nice decor, nice place, very nice people. Recommended for a fun hour in Prague.

Fun passtime. We did the tomb room and it was fun, especially because it was our first escape game. I think for someone who has already done a lot of them this one could maybe be too easy, but for us it was a lot of fun.The staff are all cheerful, helpful and very friendly.
AMAZING!!!. This was our second time in Trap Prague. Our group had a lot of fun and will definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Prague.Looking forward to do it again next year.

Ok escape room. We did the tomb room. Maybe because we had done lots of these before but this was very easy. We finished 20 minutes early and never felt very challenged. If you're looking for a hard room this one isn't it. Very friendly customer service and an otherwise good experience.

Amazing Experience. First of all - I have to recommend it!!! We went there with 3 of my colleagues, each of us was from a different country and we made it TOGETHER! and that is the thing! you need to work together, have fun together, you train your brain and... you get out!! The lady was nice and gave us two small hints, puzzles are very nice, some of them more difficult some of them easy (or depends for who maybe :) and all is very nicely decorated :) Def recommend :)
Absolutely Brilliant. We did the Bomb Room at TRAP Prague. It is probably the best escape game I have ever done! The theming, the room, the puzzles, unbelievable!

Double!. We had 2 quests, the bomb and the tomb, both were great! We had the first (the first time) yesterday, very interesting and funny! There was a very kind (and handsome) girl helping us behind the door (just in case...)... Today there was a guy, kind too! The quests were awesome! Must to do!

It really 'is' a trap!!. My friend and I booked for this game one the 14th at 10.20pm,we had to walk for 28 minutes,came early waited for another 30 minutes and 10 min before our scheduled game,the lady called us to cancel!! We told her it is ok and booked the game for the next day at 10.45 am, we usually wake up (on holidays) around 12 am but we were very early that day,took a taxi and we're in front of the door 10 minutes earlier,we waited for 20 min, called the lady,waited for an extra 10 min and she was not even there,the place was locked,the lady was not answering the phone! She ruined all our last day at Prague program and actually NEVER called to apologize! Horrible unprofessional experience that I won't reccommend to anyone,just find something better to do in Prague than waiting in front a locked door
Good Room. Went here to do the tomb room with 5 friends while staying in prague. The puzzle was fun and challenging.

Average is the word.. I've visited there after i have been to the MindMaze the day before. Me and my friends have done the tomb game and we were dissappointed! First of all, they built the room in such way that they expect you to ask for hints, there were a few puzzles with little to none logic. The other thing the annoyed me was the lighting inside, it is very poor and it damages the expirience. Besides that, the lady in the front desk was extremly nice and kind, and if you ignore a few flaws, all and all it is a fun room to escape from. But on the bottom line, there is no comparrison to the Alchemist Chamber in MindMaze- it was absolutly perfect!

So much fun we did two rooms!. This is without a doubt one of the best "escape room" places there is!!We booked the Tomb room (4 people) and it was so much fun we booked the bomb room for the next day- both are really hard (we needed 2 hints in both rooms) - but be aware that the tomb is more mathematical while the bomb requires more logic.Also, the lady who greeted us was extremely nice and also helped us with recommendations for good nightlife places in Prague :) I will definitely recommend everyone looking to spend a great hour in Prague to visit!

Excellent. We did the 'tomb room' puzzle here and it was fantastic. As a couple we enjoy logic puzzles and this was the perfect difficulty for us - we completed in about 45 minutes and were given 1 hint along the way. It is the first time we have done an escape the room activity so have nothing to compare it with, but thought that the puzzles were varied and well integrated into the features of the room. The design could have been more sleek but other than that it was great and I would definitely go back to try another of their puzzle rooms.
A great way to spend the evening . We have done a few of these escape rooms and this was one of the best. I recommend this if you are looking for something to do that is fun and exciting.

Challenging but OK. OK Experience, the puzzles were maybe a little illogical or our group had the wrong mindset going in to this one. We had trouble progressing but did manage to complete the room in the given time limit. We had to rely on hints/help on a couple of occasions.

Great fun!. Question: What do you get when you put two bumbling, clueless muppets in a room full of puzzles and challenge them to escape within an hour? Answer: Brilliant fun and a good laugh!Having successfully completed two Trap escape rooms earlier this year in Budapest, we thought we would tackle the Bomb room on our recent trip to Prague. This particular room is rated as the most difficult of the three Trap rooms in Prague. Unfortunately, we appeared to have left all our logic and problem solving skills behind at our hotel. Suffice to say we needed more than a few hints and clues from the lovely, helpful young lady in charge. We unfortunately did not manage to diffuse the bomb within the hour but were allowed to finish the game. There was only the two of us and I think this particular game would be a little less challenging with at least three people playing. Despite not completing the game within the allotted time, we had a good laugh throughout (with not too much bickering) and would definitely attempt the other two Trap rooms next time we visit Prague. All in all, this is an entertaining way to spend an hour and we would certainly recommend it.

Very tricky but entertaining!. The secret agent room was our first escape game experience and we found it very challenging! We needed quite a few clues but still found it really interesting, kinda stressful and a lot of fun!
Great time. Challenging game. Great staff was very friendly and gave excellent explanation. Nice way to end our long weekend trip to Praha.

A fantastic group activity. Trap Prague was awesome. I loved every minute of it. Well thought out clues and riddles left us working hard until the last minute to finally escape from the room.
Time, and money, definitely well spent! Highly recommended.
You will be challenged!. Excellent family or group vacation activity. Very challenging, fun and interesting. It's easy to imagine yourself in the time, at the moment.

So much fun!. We visited here in June and did the 'Secrets of the Tomb' room. It was our first escape room and we all loved it! The hour passed by so fast and we left feeling very exhilarated. We did need a few clues along the way to help up but the girl who was helping us was lovely. The room felt a little creepy and very realistic which just added to the whole experience.This is a must do if you have a spare hour in Prague!

Very good, well-themed room escape with slightly flawed maths puzzle. We love room escape games and have completed quite a few now. The theming on the TRAP tomb room was probably the best we have seen to date. There was a great variety of puzzles and some clever ideas that we hadn't seen elsewhere. While we really enjoyed this room, there was a slight over-reliance on maths based puzzles. One of the central puzzles required a few too many assumptions and didn't feel logical. Having said that, we did escape! Special mention to the chap who ran it, as he was very friendly and helpful.

Suprising experience - bring your friends!:). Honestly I was a bit sceptic about the TRAP. The place itself is a little bit hidden – the entrance to the building is through the 1st doors on the left to Tlusta Koala restaurant and you have to ring the right bell there – marked with Trap. The staff is friendly and explains you all you need to know and then the game begins Well, it instantly dragged me in so that I enjoyed every minute. The difficulty was appropriate and you have possibility to ask for a hint from staff (In 5 ppl we managed the game in aprox. 45 minutes without need for hint, however you might get stacked on some puzzle).
