My best friend's wedding happend sort of fast and so did the idea to still plan a bachelorette party as a surprise before the big day.Getaway was part of a whole day of surprises for the bride to be, and I must say it was one of the highlights that really gave the group of girls, that didn't really know eachother that well, an excellent opportunity to work as a team, have sth to discuss later and mainly get comfortable around eachother. It is the perfect way to bond with people you don't know that well!We were about 10 and therefore split in two teams (at that time only one room was open) and the group that went first had time to prepare the next activity while we were doing the same room afterwards - so perfect for time management as well.The communication with the Getaway team, was incredibly supportive and so was their warm welcome with a glass of champagne ready for everyone.The game itself is incredibly witty and for us blondes sometimes even a little bit too challenging :D, but that's what you have the rest of the group for. For most of us it was the very first escape game and therefore we didn't really know what to do, but the guys were super helpful and didn't make us feel stupid at all :).Seriously guys, who says this escape game is not good, did either not get it, wasn't there or kinda was a little too blonde to make it to the end ;).Peace, love and GetAway.Monika, the maid of honor and the rest of the gang <3
Just do it!. I had so much fun doing the prison room! I'd never done anything like it and it far exceeded my expectations! The way through was so clever and enjoyable. Highly recommend.
Do not miss it!!!!. Best escapeing game in Europe! Lot's of fun! Very nice and helpful stuff! You have to try! And tell to your friends too!

exciting and superb. I've been to some escape rooms and this one is really challenging and exciting game at the same time. Its fun and brain teaser while Robert is a great host. We enjoyed it a lot, I would definately recommend it to anybody.

The great mystery!. Me and my friends had a week in Prague just two weeks ago, we visited many places, such as the Castle, Jewish quarter and, obviously couple of pubs. We didn't know much about escape rooms, but one of us had already been in one of them, and recommended to give a go for one of them here. We picked up Getaway, and it was an excellent choice for us who hadn't been at a place like this before. Great fun, it showed different skills that we shared and eventually helped us to open the door in time! :-)
Great game. It was my first game, but I realy enjoyed it from the first minute untill the end. Full of challenges, excitement and fun! You have to try it!

Great experience for people from all cultures!. We formed a mixed Czech-Mexican team and it was amazing to see how the cultures developer their skills and combined! Getaway is a great opportunity to bond groups of friends, families and couples :).

Team building. Our company is keen to provide its employees only the highest quality team building experience. Getaway Prague simply fits all our expectations and we had wonderful time there. The result of completing the tasks showed that our team is really able to work as a team. Highly recommended to all friend and work communities.

Best Prague escape room. I tried all of the rooms, and I can say Its absolutely worth it. The story is interesting and there are many fun and surprising parts. Go with your friends or family, it is fun for all of them.
Awesome!. We played a couple game,it was perfect. Service, place, fun... It took us very long to find The Documents The reason to check, how we will succeed in future again!

Absolutely awesome, highly recommend . My girlfriend and I did the prison room and it was amazing. We enjoyed it so much that we're considering going back to do the other room tomorrow. The location is perfect: it is in an old air raid shelter which looks very cool. The room is very well decorated in order to create the right atmosphere for the game. Before entering the room there is a short briefing about the game with some tips on how to play it. The game itself was a lot of fun, you need to think logically and stay organized.We had a long conversation with the owner afterwards, he is particularly friendly, so even that part was very nice.

Not the usual hunt for code after code!. I've been to a few of these escape rooms and I was surprised to find something a little different. The tasks you need to solve are nothing extraordinary, but I think they add something as you need to really use your brain instead of just hunting for codes to open locks & doors.

Fantastic. I have done these world wide and this is a nice room, well done, well handled by the game master and just a good fun time. The fact it is in an old concrete air raid bunker just makes it that much better.

Great fuN. That was a real wow experience. We loved the Prison game,it was so much fun that we wanted another one immediately!If you want a short break in the day just go go it. Also it was very cheap, just 1000 Czk for a couple and it was really worth it!

Excellent fun. We went with our 8 and 9 years old children and we all loved their prison room. No, it's not easy at all, though indeed, the room and the puzzles are perfect challenge for any age! A simple proof is that some of them was solved by our kids and while we parents had no idea what to do. The reviews are right, Robert is very kind, talkative, answered all our questions after the game. Don't expect anything high tech, this is a simple but perfect escape room that I can recommend to anybody.

Brilliant, you won't regret it!. We went to Getaway as a group of four, and were greeted by Robert who was very pleasant, humorous and informative.After a quick brief, we descended into the basement where the Prison escape room is situated, full of excitement and curiosity. Robert closed the door and left us to our own devices as the game began. The room was very intricate, realistic and engaging. To complete the challenge involved teamwork, cooperation and problem solving, with a variety of hidden objects, linking these objects, use of basic maths as well the use of initiative and small physical tasks. Robert was still contactable via walkie talkie, offering subtle clues when we asked for them, without giving too much away.All in all it was a very enjoyable experience and great value for money. We highly recommend it!

AMAZING!. I have recently completed the Prison escape game and all I can really say is that the experience was absolutely fantastic! From the moment we walked in we were warmly greeted by the host, where the game was explained to us and the scene set. We then went down to the starting room where we were given the last part of the brief. The game itself is challenging but everything that you would expect (but even better). You really have to use your brain and work as a team. Cannot say anything bad about this place- would recommend to anyone staying in Prague, well worth the money!

Awsome game. My girlfriend and me visited Getaway a week ago and it was a fantastic experience from the very beginning! We made it out just few seconds before the end, it was surprising and a good challenge. I wasted so much time on choosing the right room, so if I can say: this was a perfect choice!

Stay Orgenized, Nice Place. The game itself isn't easy at all. Me and my family were playing "The Crime Scene" game, and we couldn't solve it for 75 minutes. The game is challenging, and you have to stay organized, work together to solve it quickly. The owner is very kind, we had a long and nice conversation after the game.

Very nice escape game in Prague!. I have played the 2 rooms and both are very nice with great scenario. It is probably easier to start with the prison for a first game. I even watched some friends playing and it is as much fun as if you were in, even probably more stressful!! :-)All of us liked it so much that I can only recommend it. The hosts are very nice and you can easily talk with them.It is a must do if you like games!

Great rooms. My kids convinced me to try Getaway Prague during our short trip. I was sceptical first, but this is a must do! We enjoyed it so much that we decided to play even their second room. Robert, the host was very friendly, up for a chat after the game, which put the experience on an even higher level.

Great rooms!. First we wanted to play the Crime scene, but Robert convinced us to try the Prison first because we were not really experienced. That was a good decision, we didn't regret at all, enjoyed every minute and escaped just seconds before the end. Then we decided to go for the second room and indeed, that's more challenging, though the puzzles are just so obvious when you are done with them. The games are nothing too technical, don't expect any lasers and high tech things, but that is what really made it stylish. We found the greatness in its "simplicty", definitely recommended!

One of the best we have played so far.. We played The Crime Scene and we liked it a lot. We managed to arrange for a last-minute reservation to play in English and got a very friendly game master. The room itself is indeed challenging, the puzzles were innovative and sometimes not easy to guess but despite that the flow of action is very smooth. One of the best games in Central Europe so far.

Must do!. We decided to do this on the last day after reading the positive reviews so we had very high expectations.We didn't book on the day so made a call and we were able to start our game after about 15 mins.Glad to say the game and our host, Robert, lived up to all the positive reviews! This is an absolute must do!Next time we're in Prague we will be attempting the crime scene!

Great fun, thoroughly recommended. We did our first escape room in Prague and enjoyed it so much that we decided to do another one.......we chose Getaway as it was close to our accommodation. It was a great choice, Robert was a superb host who took time to explain everything and make sure we had a great time. The clues were challenging and inventive and kept us thinking, we managed to escape though which was great. This was a really authentic and atmospheric room which added to the fun, it is excellent value for money, especially for families........you should go!

Prison escape - a perfect way to spend an hour!. Me and my husband tried the prison escape room, and we had an awesome hour. It's definitely one of the best room escapes we've been to! Very well made. We had a great time and can definitely recommend it!

Prison Escape & Murder Mystery. This was an amazing experience! It is definitely a must while visiting Prague!!!! From entering the building till leaving Robert was amazing! This being our first ever room escape experience he explained everything in detail and helped us through out both games!!! It truly is an amazing experience! We rang and was able to do the prison game that day because we enjoyed it so much we booked for the next day for the second room as we did not want to go home without trying it!!! at the end of the game we asked robert questions which he was happy to answer!! Being a couple aged 20 & 24 it was really fun and interesting also reasonably priced! We are definitely going to return later in the year with friends! Can't wait to come again!! You will not be disappointed!! IT IS A MUST!!!

Best escape room ever!. This was our first escape room, and we've recommended all of our friends to go to one since! The room was fun and interactive, and the owner was really helpful throughout. We were in Prague for only 4 days, but it was definitely worth going!

Great fun, go for it!. We jumped in with a couple of friends thinking that it is not too expensive so we have not much to lose. Actually it was a blast. The best decision in Prague! We loved every single moment!

Definitely a TOP escape room. Me and my family visited Getaway after 7 other escape room in Europe. This was one of the best if not the best one. We played both games, the tricks are not too technical, you need more like proper observation and practical thinking. We enjoyed this one the most! I recommend to start with the Prison, that is a great "warm up" for the much more challenging Crime Scene! Go for it!

Prison Break!. We visited Getaway Prague on our last day and had tried 3 other escape games during our stay. Without doubt though, it truthfully stood out amongst the rest! Robert our host and owner was fantastic and made the whole experience more immersive and exciting. Every detail had been thought about to such a great detail and although we needed hints along the way, we managed to escape with 57 seconds remaining! We will certainly be visiting the other room when we return and cannot stress enough, if you're looking for the best room escape in Prague then go to Getaway Prague!
Enjoyable. Getaway was my first exit game I have tried and it was a blast! If you enjoy this kind of activities you will really love it;)
An enjoyable game!. This was my first time i have visited an escape room. I was amazed by the game, well designed and tricky. I totally recommend it!

One of the best escape rooms in Prague!. I've visited few rooms in Budapest and in Prague. This one is certainly in my top 3. The scene is well prepared with close attention paid to the details. Most of the quizzes are not hard and some are even solvable in several ways.

Great place in Prague for escape rooms. We visited with my husband and our two teenage boys. We really had great time. Omg what an ambiance! There are two rooms. The 2nd one a bit more difficult but the boyz helped me out :-)

Something extraordinary and hardly recommended!. I had my first escape game experiences here and I would say that it was a perfect choice! Unique atmosphere (bunker in the city centre), well designed puzzles and rooms, great gamemasters/owners of the game. Time flies quickly and you will not get disappointed. I liked every minute! :)

family friendly escape room!. We have played with my husband and our 10 years old daughter couple of games in europe but this was far the best. In the prison our daughter was able to add a lot, still it was very demanding for all of us. Robert is a great host, he definitely knows how to entertain people. Do not miss it!

really exciting and fun. This is one of the best room in Prague and the most tricky one too. Go with friends or family so you can manage to get out :) The place has the style and so does Robert who is really a friendly host. Recommend to anyone!

Great room escape experience. Lately I lost faith in this type of experiences, since it seems there's a fashion or something and there are plenty of them in the big cities, and many of them are disappointing. But this time I had a great time with my friends. The game was very well plotted, and very immersive.Robert is a great host, and nows how to keep the thrill (and the fun) at top level.

Superb brain twister.. Well thought through, cleverly designed and extremely well managed by Robert. He knew when to give us hints and made the game really enjoyable for us without taking away the challenge. We loved the set up and the overall theme a lot and our 8 years old daughter enjoyed it too. I was impressed with the twists and turns the game manages to get in relatively short period of time. Some serious out of the box thinking is required and our daughter seemed to excel in that. It combines all the elements well (mystery, detective work, fun and logic). Whilst creepy it is never too scary for even the smaller kids to enjoy. Cannot recommend it highly enough for a pleasant family bonding afternoon.

Highlight of our trip. The Getaway was absolutely amazing from ringing the doorbell at the front door right through to the end, we felt immersed in the whole experience from the get go. Robert buzzed us through the door and we went down a industrial style staircase which felt like something from a thriller film. We met Robert who had a quick chat with us and went through the rules and a bit of background on the story of "The Prison", then we headed down a ladder and were locked in a small room where th game begun...We finished with 1minute and 7 seconds remaining and our hearts were racing throughout, the decor and ambience created was enthralling and we would definitely come back to do the Crime Scene when we come back to Prague. Robert was a great host and it's nice to see his ideas come to life!Anyone can attempt the game, whether you complete it is another story!!

Escape game : the prison. Today, my wife and I played this escape game. It was very good. The boss Robert is very friendly and he explains the rule very good! We escaped on time! To recommand!! Super!

One well-spent hour with my friends. It was my 3rd escape game. Its clear from the first minute, that they want us to have a great time. They have 2 games. We were in the crime scene one (I was told the other one is easier). It's rather for experienced and logical players, so buckle up, and get there before the evening starts ;)

Absolutely awesome!. My girlfriend and I, first-time escape game players, got through this game in just over the 60 minutes allotted. We found it challenging in places but Robert was on the other end of the Walkie Talkie to provide us with some hints if we needed any. Robert was a great host and made our time at Getaway very enjoyable and he spent lots of time after the game talking to us about the game and previous visitor stories! We would recommend this to anyone who's considering it. Thanks Robert. :-)

Proper challenge for veteran escapers. While the props, decor and overall storytelling could use a bit more love, Getaway gets definitely thumbs up thanks to the caring staff and challenging and interesting selection of puzzles that belong to the best what's out there in Prague.

We made it out (just)!. My other half & I have done one escape the room before in the UK and enjoyed it, so we thought it might be fun to try a Czech one! So off to The Prison we went (slightly hungover, whoops!).It was really very good. Very well designed and constructed, and Robert (sorry if I got your name wrong, I'm terrible with names!) was at the end of the walkie talkie to give us a few hints when we got stuck. It's really a game for 3+ people but as we didn't know anyone else in Prague we figured we'd go anyway, so the hints were our 3rd person ;)Definitely worth doing and when we're back in Prague with more people we'll be heading back to attempt the larger room!A nice fun alternative to sight seeing and drinking.
Great fun!. Very challenging game, with lots of turns. We enjoyed it very much and were just able to escape before time was up.We definitelly try the other room, looking forward to it.

Excellent game!. There is definitely more to think about and do in this escape room compared to others, so if you are in a big group, there's something for each person to do at the same time. We played as a couple, and it was just as fun. Great room, thanks Robert! :)

Lots of fun! . A very involved escape game with a well-structured story and an immersive setting. Quite challenging, but with a very logical progression and plenty of practical puzzles. Highly recommended!
Excellent! Amazing! Thank you!. Playing The Prison has been an amazing experience! Robert was very helpful and we greatly enjoyed solving the puzzles! Definitely would recommend this escape room!

Best of 3 other room in Prague. We are escape room maniacs, and we played 3 other room in Prague and the Prison was far the best in Prague! As we told them we are experienced they offered to change the room settings to make it more difficult and we accepted the challenge! We loved the story and that Robert told us some insider stories after the game. Another advantage what makes them different that they have plenty of time till the ext game, so they didn't kick us out like at some of the other places. Definitely recommended!

Best escape room in Prague. We played both rooms with my girlfriend. We gave them a call and they orientated us to play the Prison room as we were not too much experienced. I can say these guys really know what they are doing. The room was great, we really liked the atmosphere and that the puzzles were demanding still after the game we found them unbelievably obvious. This really made us laugh, how easy it is to trick our brain. The second room was extremely challenging, we were not able to make it on time, if anyone plays that I can recommend to really focus, otherwise you dont have too much hope :-)
Awesome!. Great fun! Nice and challenging and Robert was very helpful. Well worth a trip out of your way when visiting Prague. Easy to find!

The most balanced game I played so far. My team already had some experience so we played the Prison room. It was quiet technical, medium difficulty level I would say. The host was great, gave us some insight of escape games after we finished the game and I would say this gave us new perspectives. As the host explained the second room is more challanging, thus we couldn't resist to try that one as well. I can say, it was a good decision to start with the prison, as their Crime scene room needed our full attention and focus. Though we got trapped in there, we really enjoyed it. All together if you are willing to visit Getaway, I recommend to play the Prison room and the other one only if you are experienced and ready to step to a higher level.

Amazing fun - great variety of puzzles!. Me and my partner played this escape game today as our first one ever. Robert was very helpful in explaining the rules, and spoke good English to help us out when needed. The room to escape from is so authentic with an excellent attention to detail with all the puzzles and objects. Robert remained on standby outside the room with a walkie-talkie to offer us clues when we needed it.We were unable to escape within the 1hr time limit, but we were allowed to continue to escape. This game has a great variety of puzzles and challenges that required creative thinking, but was ultim incredibly good fun! An absolute must-do activity! :)
good fun. A very intense and entertaining 60 mins to spend with your friends while trying to unravel a crime scene :)

Amazing day!. I've been there with my classmates and we all LOVED the games! It was super exciting and we laughed the whole time. We had an amazing time there and we just wanted that the game never ends. It has been one month now since we escaped off the rooms but we are still talking about those quests and the whole experience! Special thanks to the team, you guys are the best! Had so much fun with you! And maybe we'll see each other again coz I want to play your games one more time :-)

challenge accepted :). Having checked some escape rooms we decided to challenge this one with our friends. Staff was friendly, explained all important steps :) The room(s) itself were great, authentic uniforms, difficult task to pass, no time for soloying. Fortunatelly, we ere good team and we made it out ín 53minutes {out of 60) . Definitely not the record, but we absolutely enjoyed that :) A bunch of final photos just made our day even more fun

One of the hardest "escape game" in Prague. This room is very stylish and u will feel like in 80s. Task were very difficult, but I think, if you will be in bigger group, you can solve them more easy. But I can highly recommended that room for other visitors! We had a chance to meet ower of Gataway and hungarian guy was very kind and sometimes helpfull.

Gotta go to Gateway. Have to recommend it to everyone who likes challanges, puzzles, quizes and adrenalin. I bet you will enjoy it in the company of your friends, colleagues either spouses! Gateway enhances teamspirit therefore creates bonds between people. You will get hooked on it and won´t be able to wait till the next room visit! :)
Per. Super fun experience! Robert was absolutely fantastic and it gave us an unforgettable time in Prague.

An hour of thrills. From begging to end the experience was thrilling!! The attention to detail in the set design and fact that it takes place in an old underground bunker adds an exciting realism to the game. The puzzles were so clever and got our minds thinking and the countdown of the clock got my heart racing. The staff are super nice and were helpful when we got stuck on one of the clues without giving away any answers; so we still felt like we solved the problems ourselves and it was very satisfying! Unlike an escape room I had been to in Australia, the challenges were not un realistic to solve in the 60 minute timeframe that you are given.The only downside was the difficulty of finding a carpark during the week, but if you get public transport it's only a short walk from the tram station. Also there is no sign out the front, only a small sticker above the doorbell saying GETAWAY. So give yourself some time before you go to find it so you don't run late.A bit thumbs up for this escape room!

Awesome venue!. We have now visited a large number of escape rooms across Eastern Europe and the UK. I can thoroughly recommend this one and had a great time completing it. It is quite challenging, but also achievable. What I really loved was the venue, you have to go down a ladder to reach the room and it feels like a real cell. The puzzles are great and I liked the fact there were various rooms to get in to. Host was excellent and very friendly. Definitely recommend a visit! Thanks.

Excellent visit to Getaway Prague!. We visited as a team of 5 people, 3 of which had completed at least 2 escape games prior to Getaway, and the other 2 were new to the concept. For those experienced in escape rooms, it proved the most challenging and fun so far, and for those who were new, it was a great experience. The puzzles were very inventive, and the theme of the room was well thought out. Robert was a great host, and extremely welcoming!

You should go there if you like challenges and meeting interesting people. We went there and it was very fun and challenging, but even better are the staff there. when they told us they were testing another room we had to try it, and we are sure happy we did, it was harder, and when we ran out of time we were given a chance to finish and save our dignity.Definitely go there

Excellent. We had the most amazing time in Getaway Prague.We have been to another escape room in Prague and Getaway was 10 time better. Robert the host was extremely nice and provided good explanation.The game itself was very cool and interesting for us, as a couple.After the game Robert sent us some photos of us that were taken during the game.Extremely fun and cool experience.

Great fun with even greater staff. It was our (me and girlfriend) first time to play escape game and we are just "wow". The experience starts with first steps down the basement (former civil defense air raid shelter) and goes on till the end. You need to solve different types of puzzles just to unlock others ;) But don´t worry, should you get stuck (which we did several times) just let Robert (gamemaster) know and he´ll give you clue but not the answer (so you still solve it yourself). Robert is great, intelligent, free and talkative guy.110% recommended!

Great fun for open minded people. The place was first scary as it's not a front store, don't look for a logo, just try to find the address. The game is in the basement, a bit unusual but when we got in the game we understood the concept in a second. Our host was Robert, told us the rules and took us to the Prison game. I can't really say much about it without spoiling the game, but we enjoyed every single minute of it! We made it just a minute before the time limit, and it was a real blast! After the game we had a long chat about our performance, it definitely made us busy not only for an hour!

Great and fun challenge!. Together with 3 friends this was our first 'escape game' experience and we loved every second of it! Our Getaway was fun, had challenging puzzles, tricky elements and gave us a great adrelanine rush. Solving those cool puzzles together and beating the room with only a few minutes on the clock was very rewarding and kept us talking about it for hours after completing the game.

Top Puzzle Room in Prague. We did three puzzle rooms in Prague and though that Robert and his creation was top. Most of the rooms in Prague are good though, nearly on par with Budapest rooms. Don't hesitate to book with Robert if you're just doing one puzzle though, he's very intelligent and welcoming as well.

Great adventure!. This is good fun! This is a well-designed and clever puzzle that can be enjoyed by people of different ages. The manager is very friendly and the whole experience is impressive and good for the brain!

Great experience. My boyfriend and I found out about this place on trip advisor and decided to try it out. We both thought it was super fun! We didn't make it out on time but Robert was kind enough to give us some extra time so we could finish. The game was challenging and fun, the host Robert was really friendly and the price was good as well (1000 Kc for two people). Would recommend this to any group of people who are looking for a fun experience together!

Great Escape Game. Good price, challenging enough (got out with 5 mins too spare two hints), the host had very good english and was very helpful and funny, definitely up to the standard of other escape games we have been to around Europe.No complaints 100% happy.We do have one suggestion. It would be nice to finish with a cardboard sign saying something like "I escaped" or "I got trapped" as a photo opportunity to remember the game!! Also good potential publicity on social media.

Superfun!. I was there with my boyfriend. First time of getaway game for The both of us. We really enjoyed it! Superfun! Challenging, but just The perfect difficulty level. The host was very friendly and also showed us several other places to visit in Prague

Good plots and puzzles but poor interior and decoration. We have visited many escape rooms so far so I can say that the puzzles must go hand in hand with decorations and interior. The gateaway is not the case, nice and clever puzzles but the interior and decoration is poor and cheap. What a pity!!!
Fantastic. 2nd room that I have been to and a world away from the first. Great intuitive practical challenges mixed with logic led to an hour of great fun.

Super fun!!!. My first time at live escape game, and i am thrilled. One hour fun time, for a great price, great ambient and challenging game that really puts you in a spy role. Something fresh and fun :) recommend for people who likes ridles, team buildings or just try something new with your friends. Five stars!!!

Get away. This was so challenging and fun. I think that everyone that tries and manages to escape from this room will feel so much more than just enthusiasm. They will feel that they again took control over their lives.

Really Great Experience. We planned this really late and only found out about it about 2 hours before we went. This was a really surprising and fun thing to do in prague. There were 7 of us in total and we were split into two groups to attempt the challenges. The host way friendly and gave us a couple of hints when we got stuck but overall was a really great, challenging and entertaining experience

Amazing and mind-challenging group game for any occasion!. Went with a group of friends for the first time and it was super fun. Highly recommendable since it's small amount of money for 1 hour of experience you won't forget. ;-)

So much fun!. My first ever experience of puzzle rooms, and I'm hooked! I went the beginning of this month with my friend, as something to do to get out of the sun for a bit... and had such a fun time. The guy who ran the place was so lovely, funny and friendly. Thank you so much!

Great staff, challenging game!. I really enjoyed this escape game. It is very surprising and challenging. However I would recommend to play it in more people as it is not a piece of cake :-). Staff was very friendly and helpful. Thank you!

A different kind of fun you don't want to miss.. We were on a family vacation with our recent College graduate sons and they picked this as one of our things to do. We, the parents, were somewhat reserved about the activity, but went along. It was a blast! I recommend doing this with 3-5 people. Anymore and it could be more difficult. It takes a lot of teamwork, thinking out of the box, no fear of new things and good communication skills. If you think you have that, take the leap. You won't regret it, unless of course you don't make it out. Don't worry, it's only failure, nothing more.I won't give you any tips, although you should know that you have the option of having a walkie talkie to ask for help if you get stuck. As Robert will tell you, don't be afraid to ask for help. You might not need it, but you don't have unlimited time, so keep that in mind.You should also go into this with the understanding that this is not a commercial storefront, as you might expect. Its in a non-descript building, which actually adds to the mystery. I don't think I'm giving anything away here, but it is in an old bomb-shelter. Talk about secure and secluded. Don't be intimidated, its all good fun and Robert is very good at what he does.If you have the chance, do this, especially if you have a family of older teens or older. The family dynamic makes for an interesting time. It would be just as fun with a group of friends.Oh yea, we made it out with 11 seconds to spare.

60 minutes of excitement. The Getaway escape game is the most talked-about topic after our Prague stay. It was exciting from the first to the last minute. The riddles are all solvable if you can think around the corner (or with a little help from Robert via walkie-talkie. Because it was just my boyfriend and I, a few hints were needed). Great location, well thought out riddles, very nice guide: Definitively a must-do!

Brilliant place!. Getaway Prague is a must-try place – unique experience in the beautiful Czech capital! Robert who runs this place is very helpful and easygoing guy and he can give you good advices where to eat after this one hour (or maybe less - depending on you :)) of adventures!

The thrill is real! . Well thought out game. The game has twists and turns and makes you think outside the box while you still have to use all your senses! The game is really immersive which is extremely helpful and also very atmospheric for the whole experience! The game host was also really nice and everything went smoothly. Highly recommended for puzzle lovers!Tip: Book for either a rainy day or a summer day too hot when a shade is a relief!

Great fun with friends.. This was my first experience with a escape room and this was awesome.. The owner Robert welcomed is in and was very pleasant and nice. He gave us a breif and sent us in. Initially it took us time to figure out things but then things started happening and we were kept busy the whole time.It was exciting, challenging and kept us wanting more.. Recommended it..

The Prison. In March 2015 we stayed in Prague and visited Roberts Getaway Game "The Prison". We don`t want to reveal too many details (because you will probably visit "The Prison" on your next Prague stay ;-)). The location is just perfect and while entering we were amazed. We had a lot of fun with Roberts exciting riddles. You will even feel transfered in another time. Thus you should come to Prague and visit this Getaway Game!!! Additionally Robert is such a nice guy :-)

Experiencing a great puzzle with friends. It was a great experience! This was my first getaway puzzle, the "Crime Scene" which is awesome in it's way. I highly recommend this puzzle for teams, friends and even for family. It's not so complex, but sharing the thoughts is essential to wrap up the crime and get out of the room. I can only recommend this puzzle.

My 1st time getaway experience!. Last weekend we tried the GETAWAY, it was my first-time-escape experience and it was AWESOME! So I highly recommend it to smaller groups of friends or colleagues, because beside the thrilling excitement it is a great team building activity too. The staff is nice and professional, no negatives at all.
i loved it. this was my first time locked-room experience, and it was really good, the clues, the game, nice people in the staff, everything was well organized, I really recommend it to everyone.

Great fun!!. We didn't know what to expect and as we are not crazy fans of adventure games, we were afraid of getting bored. But it was truly wonderful!! The atmoshpere of the place is very authentic, we found the puzzles neither obvious nor impossible to solve. We enjoyed every minute of the game. Time flies really quickly during the game, we couldn't believe we spent there almost whole hour. Finally, I would like to appreciate the staff which was very nice and explained to us all the tricks used during the game. We recommend it to everyone!!

one-hour fun with friends / colleagues in an unusual environment. this was my first exit-game experience, so cannot compare it or somehow objectively rate its difficulty, but we definitely enjoyed every single moment of it! honestly recommended

Have fun with your friends. It was really fun. We tried the new "crime scene" which need a bit of logic and team work. Is ideal for teambuilding or just for a relaxation from everyday rote. In my opinion it is perfect for 3 or 4 people, because you really need to pay attention to each other and share your opinions and ideas to get out and solve the murder case in time. It is highle recommended to try this game if you have a chance!:)

Fun fun fun! . We visited as two couples, and managed to get away at 50 minutes! We had lots of fun, the place is highly recommended - "a must visit" in Prague. Robert is very nice, our opinion seemed important to him , and he was kind enough to recommend a place for dinner and beer afterwards (which was also really good!) The price is good, and it's easy to get to using the metro.

Good fan for everybody. Wau that was really fun more than I expected. If you have 2 hours in your schedule go for it. Don´t hesitate and try the game. It is in a real civil defence cover so it is very authentic . I´ve never been in a such place. If I visit Prague next time I hope the second game will be in operation.

Must do in prag. we discovered this place trough friends otherwise we would never find out. It is so much fun to play that game and laugh with your friends about how "clever" you are. it makes so mich fun to search for hidden advises to gett the hell out there again. its a reall bunker in the ciy. so really authentic feeling. the guy who runs it is great and fun person. we enyoed it very much

A must do in Prague. l have been living in Prague for 4 years now and had one of the best times 2 days ago. We were 2 couples and played the room with escaping from the prison story as spies. lt was great fun! The room is set smartly and gives you the feeling of old times of Czech Republic. lf you are visiting Prague it is good to see the city and all those monuments as well but this is a MUST do here definitely. We took our friends to play who were visiting Prague from Lichtenstein and they loved it too. They have already decided to come to play the 2nd room that they have in Getaway. The staff is very nice and friendly too. The feedback you get after the game is one of the best parts of the game :) Anyone from any age would love this game! Good to try with your friends, family, colleagues, and as a couple. Highly highly recommended!

So far the best exit game I've tried in Prague.... This is such a fun activity! If you want to spice up your stay in Prague, an exit game is the right thing to do - and I recommend Getaway! It's challenging, but every clue you find and every mystery that you solve, motivates you and keeps you going! It's well-conceived, better than the other game we've tried in Prague, and you really feel like you're on a mission or something hahaExit games are the perfect teambuilding activity - you see how every person of your group works differently and how well they work under pressure, which is so hilarious to observe from a psychological point of view as well!The staff was very nice and helpful, thus 5 stars from me :-)Oh and btw. - the price is totally reasonable for the preparation, great service and attention you get from the crue throughout the game.

Great little activity and wonderful owner. My boyfriend and I made the trip to this on our last day in Prague and it was very worthwhile! We both consider ourselves smart, but the game really tested us and - ashamedly - we didn't finish in time, or without help! But we did finish! ;-) we'd recommend this to any couple visiting Prague as it highlighted our communication styles in a fun and unique environment with just the right amount of pressure to encourage us to evaluate our teamwork at the end. The owner, Robert, is a lovely guy who took the time to explain to us a little about Czech culture and the history of the game, and he seemed proud of what he had created, which he definitely deserves to be. Thanks a bunch, we would never have tried something like this back home, but we might now!

Not bad but cannt recomend for visit.. The game has unique atmosphere of shelters and as such is not bad. (but there are much better escape games in Prague) The thing i dislike most was attitude of the staff. We were six, which is more then 3-5 persons on website. To the game it didn't matter, you play for your own fun and more people mean less fun. But stuff insisted on paying double prize for one game. Compared with staff attitude at cryptex we were really surprised. We spend some time arguing to get to final fairer price (1,25*normal price).

Amazing..!!. This was a really fun activity to do... It's Intense and challenging with very clever clues and lots to think about... Hard enough to make it interesting but not so impossible you want to give up..! Just 2 of us tried it and completed together with only 1 minute to go... Such a good feeling if you manage to escape... :) Robert the host was great also really accommodating and there on the radio for a couple of cheeky hints when you need them too... :D
cool game. really really really enjoyed playing=) would absolutely recommend to pay a visit when in Prague!!!!!
Excellent game :). Exciting, excellent game, imaginative, something refreshing... You must to try it!!!!!!! :-) It will be funny :-)

That is a really cool game! A lot of fun!)). I visited my friends in Prague and one of the evenings we decided to go and play Getaway. I was surprised how much fun it is. We were like crazy searching all over the small bunker for keys, solving tasks and feeling and trying to think like a real 007. That was pretty cool! I definitely recommend this game. The organization of the game was great, if we got stuck we had walkie-talkie to communicate with "The rest of the world", but I'm not telling any more secrets...)) Better try it!

Thrilling experience. 60 minutes to escape! You have to find the right way to unlock doors, understand clues, to combine every single information. I tried Gateway Prague with my friends. I suggest you this experience to understand the synergy of your team!

Great game. We played together with friends from different countries and managed to have a nice teambuilding and to cooperate smoothly. Was fun to see how we behaved there adn reacted to challenges. Excellent challenge, great fun! Highly recommended...Olga, Belarus
Loved it!. We had a great time while playing! Getting everything afterwards explained was fun as well. I would come again for a next game anytime :)

Perfect teambuilding :). We played this game as part of company's Christmas party. It was amazing, excellent and can't hardy imagine better Christmas party opening than this. It was really like playing an adventure game. And after game we shared lot of experiences and we had topics to discuss during drinking :)I can recommend this game for team-buildings or just to have some fun with friends or girlfriend.
Loooove. It was really really fun. I mean, The game was thrilling, the setting was great and the owner is the nicest guy! I highly recommend it :D
Awesome experience. Highly recommended! Have a nice time with your friends in Prague! It's so exciting and you will not be sorry! Let's the game begins!

Great time. We spent really great time trying to solve all the riddles. We didn't know what to expect and it appeared to be a big fun& great adventure. Everything is logical and if you cooperate you will manage! The building itself has a good atmosphere for this game and the host is really nice guy, always ready to help and explain everything. It was one of the best activities in Prague! I'll for sure come again when the second room is ready! I'd recommend to everyone.
Great hour. My husband and I had a great time. It as interesting and fun. Suited for people that like solving riddles and puzzles

Fun times - unusual evening than most.. I went on a usual weekday just to try something different with a bunch of friends who have played some other puzzle games in the past not sure what to expect but with some adrenalin anticipation if we would succeed and be able to beat some good times. The game proved well thought out and your mind would race to undiscovered clues and combinations. Sometimes we would stumble on clues that would not be part of the plot or so we would think but the game master did a good job at indicating the right path and putting us on track if we went off in search of paths that were not in accordance with the plot. The time flew very fast and although we did not have a specifically good time, we have all enjoyed to put our brains at work and being able to solve the plot albeit with some help from the game master. Would recommend to anyone looking for a new experience or outing whilst traveling to Prague and being tired of the usual sightseeing / clubbing / drinking activities. For certain you will have an entirely new experience and will get to have a great first person feel for a plot set in the history of the Czech republic. You ll experience the rush to solve the mystery and be glad that you took a crack at it.

Excellent activity, great plot.. My girlfriend and I loved the game, making it in the nick of time. The story was intriguing and the clues were well thought out. We can't wait to come back for the next adventure.

Amazing time!. When we first arrived my wife got nervous and didn't want to go in, as it was in the basement of a building and was kind of secluded. But it was a blast! The host of it is a very nice man and the game was probably the most fun that we had in prague. We are coming back in a couple months only for the new room he will have!

Perfektni darek / perfect gift. Perfektni darek! Adventura, kterou hrate nazivo sami.. Logicke, primerene narocne hlavolamy, napovedy k ceste ven. Byli jsme dva a vyresili vsechno az do konce za 55:30 - tesne, ale predse ;) Rozhodne doporucuju!Perfect gift! Adventure game where you are the main character in the real time.. Logical, puzzles and clues with right level of difficulty (not easy, not impossible).. We were 2 playing there and managed it without outside help in 55:30. Close, but it counts ;) Indefinitely recommend it!

great adventure. We played in a group of five people, which was maximum capacity possible. It was great, we all had great time and a lot to do the whole hour (almost ;) ), but with less people the game would had been even more exciting and intense. Anyway, we all enjoyed it a lot!

expected more. Been there a few weeks ago with friends, and had an iteresting time. The game was quite ok (although two of the puzzles were familiar from games I did in Australia), the reason for my rating is the cheep implementation and the lack of athomspehere. It is only a couch a table and a wardrobe in the room where we spent most of our time. I had fun, but I think with a little more investment and care they would have been able to create a more authentic environment. The host was also nice.

A great fun different experience. This was a really awesome activity & I would recommend it for the majority, you are up against the clock and you have to work as a team to complete the mission. The owner was really nice, friendly and excited with us.... the game was very well prepared and a unique experience!
Amazing game. I tried some other escape games before this one, but this was the best one so far:) Very well planned game. I can only recommend it:)

A great experience!. I went with some of my friends during a visit to Prague. It was a really fun way to spend a night! This was my first experience with any sort of escape game, and I was definitely impressed.I loved getting to play detective, if only for an hour. I would highly recommend this for anyone who wants to experience a fun, unique activity while in Prague!

Real Life Agatha Christie!. My boyfriend and I have now completed four of these "Escape the Room"-type games and Getaway definitely had one of the best layouts and puzzle sequences. Equally if not better than Trap and MindMaze! The owner was very friendly and was genuinely excited about us participating and playing. If you're looking for an exhilarating night and have some extra time in Prague I highly recommend coming here!
Perfect adventure. Very well prepared game with perfect atmosphere and many details. I will definitely send there my friends. I can strongly reccomend!

Great experience. I really loved the atmosphere and a lot of interesting ideas which made the game varied. You have an hour to get away from the prison - and it was one of the shortest hours of my life!

Amazing experience. This was our first experience with escape rooms and it was amazing. The atmosphere and the story in general were great and the staff were super friendly. I can definitely recommend it!

Great experience!. I did not know what to expect before the game as I had never played this kind of game. But I really enjoyed it. I was there with my colleagues and it was fun! I can highly recommend. Great experience.
Great Game. Excellent experience. The game is perfect for team building events. There are lots of activities and surprises related to the mission. I recommend to visit The GetAway to everyone.
an awesome 60 minutes. I've never tried any exit game before. I really enjoyed it...The place and the atmosphere were really satisfying. Big thanks for the organizator.
Enjoy it. it was really cool game and I recommend to all. Such an impressive experience with solving quests and finding clues.

lot of fun. Incredibly well planned 'game'. It makes you think, and smile.You are being watched at all times and can radio through for clues if needed.
Even if 'games' or puzzles are not your thing, this is a great way to have a laugh as a group. MUST do if you go to Prague.
Awesome:). A really interesting and entertaining game. I highly recommend it, everyone who visits Prague should try to get away:)

Such a great game!. A wonderfully planned exit game under Prague!!! The atmosphere is super, the hints are well planned and it just takes you to a whole different world! I fully recommend it to everyone, who likes at least a bit to think!

Excellent - well worth it!!!. I had so much fun!!! I've played similar games like this online but it was seriously so cool to go through everything and figure out the puzzle. I was cocky and thought it might be too easy, but it was definitely challenging!! Guys are great too. I laughed, was mildly frightened, and want to do it again when their second room opens! Highly recommend!!!!

Awesome. Did this a few days ago with my girlfriend, and we both loved it.Puzzles were great, and even if we were not able to finish it in 60 min, we got a few extra minutes so we did it!:) i really loved the interior and equipment. Recommending to everyone , it is a lot of fun!! Looking forward for more and more rooms !!:)
Exit room. We were there yesterday, it is intriguing, funny with exquisite surroundings.Time well spent I can only recommend!

Awesome!!. This was excellent from start to finish, set in a basement near the centre of Prague it is authentic from start to finish and we had a great time, the puzzles were tricky but not impossible but certainly stretched us! Won't give too much away but we loved it and Robert was great, had never tried something like this before but thoroughly recommend it if you fancy a break from sightseeing! Very reasonably priced considering how much fun you have and all the thought that has gone into the set up.

Great indoor activity!. Did the Prison room as part of a group of 4.Reservation on-line was smooth, also called contact number for assistance and got fast and friendly support. After a brief introduction and overview of how game works we were locked in a room. Clues had to be found, puzzle and riddles had to be solved in order to get out. Time passed really fast and we had awesome time. :)Story and athmosphere of location is unique, tricks are cool! A great indoor activity to do in Prague for friends, families, colleagues, ...

We Love Escape Games. Flew into Prague from London for the weekend and did 2 of the escape games. One was so difficult it wasn't really fun, but Getaway Prague was the best escape game I've done anywhere in the world. A good mix of mental / physical challenges and difficult but not impossible. We made it out with 3 minutes to spare. Much better value for these games than in London and i can't imagine anyone not having a good time!
Really good fun. Exit game first-timer, I was a bit relunctant and hard to persuade to take part, but afterwards NO REGRETS! Really good fun, no waste of time! Highly recommended.

amazing experience. We've been there without any expectations what's going on. It was one emotional hour full of expectations and surprises. There's great unique environment enhanced by story. Looking forward to the next game. Highly recommended!

It is just perfect!. We've been here with some friends and we had amazing time. Clever ideas, innovative approach, 1 hour of total fun! I am happy to recommend Getaway to any group which would like to have a memorable adventure!
wow, great fun!. Super vymyslene, tmelici a navozujici pocit vlastni geniality :D Will definitely come back to play the other room when its ready :)

Awesome game!. Incredible time that we had in Getaway game. It was the first time that i tasted this kind of game, but after 5 minuts playing i realized why is so great! everyone should go there and try to find the exit of "the prison game". That's a perfect plan for those days that you need to laugh a lot.

super experience. 3 guys in a cellar for 72 minutes having fun, not even experiencig the time flying by. first time experience of such escape rooms, and an excellent one. I can just recommend to all to try it out. No disappointment, but guaranteed fun and give-me-more feeling afterwards. Enjoy it you all!

awesome entertainment. We've been there with my colleagues in the Prison room. It was really cool! The staff is great and the instructions were really helpful just in the right time. Must check it out in Prague.
We are waiting very much for the new track.

Fun time!. We were a group of friends from London who decided to have a bit of fun in a lovely and beautiful Prague. The activities were very fun and we managed to get out of the "prison" within 55 minutes. We definetly recommend (especially for groups) to spend their time in such way.
Great time. We were first time at this kind of place and was superb! The Owner of this attraction is a very friendly man.

Very very cool!. We were 4 friends who went there, perfect amount of people, we didn't need to be more. Staff was great, instructions good, and puzzles were cool. Definitely do this if you are in Prague, we were talking about it the whole night after we finished!

Výborná aktivitka!. I really liked the location and the setting of this exit game! The emotions get involved very easily, so it gives your friends perfect chance to stick together and work as a team! Excellent!

Great time in prison. I was sceptical at first, because I thought this really is not my kind of thing. However, after a while I got into it. The whole game is very well composed - it was a great experience. It's all about thinking uncoventinaly in a limited time and it almost makes you forget you are not in a real "prison". We had a great time and I would definitely recommend to anyone!
Unforgettable experience!. Wow! Simply wow! This was my first exit game, and I sooo much enjoyed it! Really well done, with minucious details, I definitely recommend it!

Finally not a boring escape room :-). Recently visited this place with my friends and we had such a great time. I like escape rooms and been in many of them. Any place I go i visit one. But this one is really oustanding. I can recommend this one the best

Impressive game!. Me and my friends were really exciting about this game as it has good reviews on TA. First we were surprised as it is located in a basement, no signs for a big attraction, so we were afraid that it's just wasting time. Then we were taken to the basement what is a little bit weird but it's a nice intro for the game. They told us the rules and how to play, what was really helpful during the game. At the beginning, when the instructor said it's the game already, we were a bit desperate but found our way after a minute and then we understood quickly what we should do. This hour seemed to be like 10 minutes, everything happened so quickly and we enjoyed every second of it. All together this was something new, I have never tried before this kind of games and I can recommend it to anybody who is at least a little bit competitive type.

Really entertaining! Guaranteed fun!. It was the first time I heard about such a game. I went to try with some friends...to be honest, I was quite skeptical in the beginning, but I had so much fun that I suggested it to my friends, who enjoyed a lot, and I went with them to watch their performance!!!I was among the first to try the game, so it was not perfect when I tried it, but still I could enjoy a lot. When my friends played, it improved so much I was impressed! Every minimum detail is well thought and prepared, you really don't need any special ability to succeed but cooperation!It's difficult to manage to escape within 60 minutes, but if you like to think, to have fun or if you are just looking for a teambuilding activity, this is totally recommended!!Looking forward to playing in the new room, in case they will open it!

Great day for co-workers. We went to Getaway for our HR Department's Team Day out and we had an absolute blast. It was so much fun! We are planning to return when they are ready with the second room. Great use of 60 minutes!
Amazing experience. Unique atmosphere and experience, enjoyed every minute of the game. I would recommend to everyone, especially young people.

Excellent team game. Never heard about escape games before (except Boyard Fortress :) So I was very surprise with great authentic atmosphere of old bomb shelter and the inventiveness of the game. We were 6 people, didnt know what to expect but we really enjoyed it. So I would highly recommend it to anybody who likes fun and trying new things - also because you can see your friends' behaviour under unusual conditions:)
Great great great!!!!. The game was excelent and we realy enjoyed it! Until the very last moment, we were not sure if we manage to escape the room or not. Finally, we succeeded :)

Amazing!. Our whole experience was amazing from start to end. We called and booked a time slot, the staff met us at the entrance and gave us a tour of the old building (it is an old bomb shelter). The theme of the game was really good, there was a variety of puzzles which work in any language. We were only 2 people but were able to complete the game with only a couple of minutes to spare. We found it challenging but very very enjoyable. The staff were very supportive and helpful, we were given a walkie talkie, so if we needed a hint we just needed to ask. I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking for something different to do while visiting Prague.
Great Exit Game. I really enjoyed the game. It was definitely not easy to finish in time and get out, but there were no boring moments. Great atmosphere! I will definitely come to play another game.
You get locked.... A truly great room, although we managed to bypass some puzzles. A lot of rooms, great story and not that eady. It was my fourth escape game and I enjoyed it.

Would you like to experience something important from CZ history? Absolutely recommended!. It is really authentic experience. Everything inside except locks, walkie talkieand you is from 40.It took us a while to get what is going on and where we should that code. It is a little bit more complicated escape game in my point of view (it has been my third one), but awesome design, story and staff as well. You may be going back and forward, you can get lost, but in the end you will learn something important from Czech history.
So much fun . This was our first escape game and was such a great experience. Our host was so helpful and friendly. The game itself was great. Would highly recommend!

My favorite activity in Prague. My family of five (myself, husband, and three children: 14y, 12y, and 9y) recently visited Prague for a long weekend and enjoyed many sights, but Locked in Prague was my favorite part of our weekend. I really enjoyed the story of the escape room and really liked the connection to the real history of Prague during WWII. The setting of the escape room was so realistic and the surprising twists and puzzles made it even more real. I loved watching my children get so involved in the game and working together to solve the clues. We made it out in 56:50!! Our host for the night was amazing too. I would definitely recommend Locked in Prague to anyone looking for a unique adventure in Prague.

Almost excellent escape game. Scale of rating on Tripadvisor should have more options, sometimes it is very hard to distinguish between attractions having only 5 options. This place is really really good, a fraction from Excellent, though lacking a tiny bit compared to other games I rated so.First the positives: I really really like the decorations, it feels like you move to the 1940s. The beginning of the play is excellent and innovative, sound and light effects throughout the game are great (the ones towards end of the game make you feel like in a movie). You won't find any advanced technology in the room but hey, the acion takes place over 70 years ago! Puzzles are challenging, we got really got stuck at one by the end of the game and needed help. But we have finally managed to compete a mission. So why not 5 points and Excellent rating? Sometimes we were not sure where to use which clue and ended up in running from place to place trying to apply it. If you play in a group of two it makes you loose a lot of time and create a feeling of chaos. There are some ways to indicate the flow of actions so that players feel less lost, happy to share them with the owners. There is no countdown clock in the room so you'd better bring you own with you. Fix these two minor items and you'd deserve a full 5 from experienced escape gamers.

Good fun!. This is the first Escape game that I've played. Thoroughly enjoyable experience and good value for money (1250 CZ Korunas for 4 people). The booking process was quick and simple with no prepayment required. Our facilitator was very friendly and offered just enough help and guidance as and when we needed it. The No. 9 tram stop is just a hundred yards away making the location easily accessible from the Old Town.

Perfect. Our second escape game. Nice story, great fun. We were team of three members. Quite suprising end :) Naše druhá úniková hra. Pěkný příběh, skvělalá zábava. Byli jsme tří členný tým. Trochu překvapivý konec. :)

Great!. Highly recommended!!! There's nothing requiring czech language, so it's also for foreigners. Interesting story from world war II. and period equiped rooms. You will forget all your problems of your ordinary day and you will be caught by the game!Also the attendant is very kind and willing.Do not hesitate to visit it!

Thinking can also provide good experience. Locked in Prague was our very first escape game ever. Although we didn't succeed to escape in time limit, the story itself on the background of the Assassination of Heydrich in Protectorate of B.&M. in 1940s dragged us in. Investigation, thinking, teamwork, fun. And last but not least, group photo together with one of the owners of Locked in Prague:)

Great escape game with WWII theme!. We enjoyed this escape game very much. We were four and it went great. We did get out in 51 minutes and had a great time. Very good and sometimes tricky puzzles. Set into the context of spring of 1942 (after the Operation Anthropoid).
Great fun. We were a large group, first time players and had a lot of fun. The riddles are great and quite tricky. It's a wonderful experience for a family trip.
Wunderbar!. Perfect story and 40's atmosphere, strongly recommended, great story! Quite a dificult game bit you'll definetely have a great time there!

Escape the room in Prague!. Very well organized! We spent great time looking for the way out =) Staff was very friendly and nice. We spent even a bit more than 1 hour inside, they let us finish the game and find the way out. Great game, so far one of the best in Prague.Good luck to the company and I hope one day they will create another room , so we can visit them again!
1st time and we hooked. This was a great experience for our very first game. We were excited and adrenaline was working. The staff very accommodating and nice.

A respectable competitor to Hungarian games. Good story, smart quizzes and overall very nice setting of this game make Locked in Prague a great place where to go with your pals before setting off for a further exploration of night Prague's wonders. Extremely nice and friendly staff who even allow you to take inside some beers which was greatly appreciated. Even though we speak czech I assume that not knowing the language wouldnt be much of an issue and so I can readily recommend this game to everybody who is into this kind of fun!
Great fun!. We went here without any expectations. This was the first escape game we played. We had a great time, it was exciting and challenging. Thank you!
Exciting!. It was an excellent and thrilling escape game, I can highly recommend! The staff was nice and helpful, the story intriguing!

Great fun!. We played this game in a team of four and enjoyed it a lot. Lukas, the organiser, was really nice and friendly too and the game was very exciting and challenging and well designed.I certainly recommend LIP and this game to those who like to spend some time having real fun.PS: Feel free to beat our record too for the fastest team in 48:00 ;)
Great netscape game.. One of the best escape games our family ever played. The environment is sooo realistic, you believe that you are in 1942.Btw we made a record escaping in 49:00 minutes.

Best spent money in a long time. + Clever puzzles that interacts with the environment.+ Awesome set up which makes you feel like you're really in 1942.+ Nice service - Once you figure it out you feel stupid because a lot of answers seem obvious.- Impossible to repeat.Best to do in group of 2-4 people because you are still able to follow what's going on.

Thrilling hour in a locked room. Me and my lovely girlfriend visited this attraction last week when it was rainy outside. Despite the fact that it was a "back up" plan we were more than surprised. We really loved how the game (story) and environment were set up. It worked as the whole. In the context of the story, when we were supposed to be scared, we were scared and when we should have felt a bit relaxed, we felt that way. We enjoyed it a lot and its up to you now.

Scary and thrilling!. This Kafka-Golem-Heydrich atmosphere was sooo cool. It is like you are trapped somewhere and feel the clock ticking while you are running out of options to get away. I was there with 2 friends of mine and our Czech guide (not that we needed her). I loved those props they had there and all that old stuff (books, sewing machine, historical documents.) Where did they get it? Magical. One suggestion, though... After that thrilling experience - draft beer would be a better life saver!:) But that Zizkov area is full of pubs, we found one just riound the corner.

Funny and challenging!. Located in Zizkov, Locked in Prague is very challenging escape game filled with various and entertaining tasks. Whole game is set up in WW2 and it has great atmosphere and story line. You can really feel the preasure of Gestapo knocking on your door. One hour time limit may look a little excessive at first, but in the end it is hardly enough and you won't even notice that you are about to finish. Staff is very helpful and friendly nad they also sell beer. Next time in Prague I am definitely playing this game again!

Amazing experience, breathtaking atmosphere, impressive story! Great escape game!. Locked in Prague was the first escape game I have ever played and I was really surprised how wonderful this game can be. We were three friends there together and we didn´t know what to expect. We were drawn into the plot immediately, equipment from 1940´ was creating exciting atmosphere, that I had a feeling I am part of important historical moment. You should pay attention to every detail and try to solve the puzzles as soon as possible, because gestapo could arrive at any moment. Definitely worth visiting!
Excellent Locked In !. Actually the best that I know so far ! ;)Nice welcoming, interesting problem to solve and really good staging !

Great time being Locked in Prague. I played this escape game with 3 friends in May 2015. This was my first escape game experience and it went far beyond my expectations. We were welcomed in a very nice lounge area and were put right into the context of the 2nd World War. After that we literally traveled in time. We arrived at the overwhelming 1940s' interior. I love old decorations over the walls. Moreover I especially like the flow of the game which was underlined with a touching story. (I can not reveal it, though.) As far as the difficulty of the game is concerned, for us (4 players) it was manageable to solve puzzles in time, however we got stuck 2 times and asked the staff for help. I appreciate the "mechanical" puzzles which we all enjoyed most because we are not "deep thinkers".Concluding that I strongly recommend playing this escape game. It is worth it. Well done, guys!
Best Escape game I ever played.. We enjoeyed the game called Heydrichiada very much. Authentic premises, interesting story hidden behind and really nice people...

Absolutely brilliant! Add it to your to-do-list in Prague. I have visited several escape games but Locked in Prague was definitely the best one! Highly recommended!The location is great, just a few minutes from the city center and fwith riendly staff. The escape room has great atmosphere, everything fits to the story. I think it would be great for teambuilding too. Great experience!

Lovely Quest Room. I loved this room it was very pretty, I loved the decorations.
We was in the Magic room, the Zombie decoration that they show us as well at the end was very awesome.
The stuff are very nice and we managed to compete the room on time^^
amazing rooms!!. beautiful rooms.Harry potter was easy. great for starters. the Zombies was amazing and very special.

Unexpected Birthday Gift. The staff is extremely nice and polite. We are instantly transported to the world created within those rooms. With no fear, a lot of fun and enthusiasm. The riddles are captivating and well thought out. It is a great way to spend 1 hour of your time. And we come out waiting more. Thank you!

Magical Time in Questerland!. If you are looking for a different and awesome way to brighten your day in Prague, Questerland is the place to go! I went with 4 friends and we had a great time discovering our way out of the Harry Potter magical room! The staff was very friendly and helpful too!I can't wait to go back!

Best Escape room ever!. We arrived by mistake 1 hour early, and it was fine, they let as in in a few minutes of arrangements. the room is well equipment, well planned, a lot of puzzles and riddles to solve the way out. very entertaining! they have 3 rooms (safe rooms, harry potter and zombies), we did the safe rooms. our advice - book 2 rooms at least, its an endless fun!

Interesting . Never done any mind game things like this offered from questerland before but will defo do it again if come back to Prague or here in U.K. Me and the gf defo wore our brains out and big thanks to the staff for giving us more time and putting up with the constant chats via the intercom asking for help. We attempted the bank escape and nearly got out just we overlooked some things and over complicated matters. The set is realistic and makes you feel under pressure to escape in 60 minutes. Good for couples but more heads the better. Would loved try the Harry Potter game but was booked up and our minds were warn out from the vault! Was quite easy to find with help of google maps and staff helpful and quite good English.
Zombie Apocalypse . Staff were very helpful and friendly and an overall thrilling experience. Nice atmosphere and realistic
Birthday party. We had a birthday party of my daughter. Everything was prepared and ready. The games were cool. The girls love it.
great fun whilst on topdeck tour!. Had so much fun completing the harry potter room and the bank room with a team from my topdeck group travelling around Europe :)

Almost like really being at Hogwarts. We played the Harry Potter experience and it was amazing! Each detail contributed to reproduce the atmosphere of Hogwarts: music, riddles, games, "magic" interactive objects such as the wands, the speaking book and portraits.We recommend it for Harry Potter fans of any age!
Funny. We had a lot of fun in the Harry Potter escape room. We were only 3 and first time we tried such a room. Took some time to adjust the brain to the puzzels but we enjoyed it very much.

AWESOME!!. We are a party of five and we had a great time!! We played the bank and it was between easy and intermediate. The price was fair, and the escape room was intriguing and very enjoyable. Highly recommended! The staff are extremely nice and we managed to escape in less than an hour!! The location is a ten minute walk from the main city. The room was super cool and it really looked like a bank, decorated, high- technology and the they put much thought to the room. Almost every object had a use sometime during the game!!Thank you c!! We'll definitely come again and check out the Harry Potter room:)
Great family experience. It was amazing how everything was arranged! We didn't manage in one hour but it was so much fun!! Thank you for that great evening!
Room escape. Really good fun, great value for money, would of been a 5 but there was a slight glitch with the zombie room, but the Harry Potter room is definitely worth a trip to the escape rooms

Great time at Questerland!!. This was our first experience of escape rooms and we loved it. So much so that we did 2 rooms in a day! The 'Harry Potter' room was great. We tried the zombie apocalypse room which was good but technical issues meant we couldn't complete some of the tasks unfortunately. These need to be fixed but once they are it will be fine. We would recommend these escape rooms to anyone!!

Great Place, Great Rooms - MUST in Prague!. Bank Robbery, Harry Potter and Zombies - We'he been in 3 rooms at the same day, and every room has it's unique and special design that takes just you to another world. The rooms are very special' different, interactive, interesting and surprising, so you want it to be continued. Definitely those are the best rooms we have ever been(and we've been in many rooms). Thank you very much, we are waiting for new rooms!

Great fun. Excellent, great fun. Several different rooms incorporated into the Harry Potter escape room. Some parts were challenging and some were easy; it makes you use your brain and has interactive parts along the way to keep it interesting. The host is always on hand to help if required. Very reasonable at 1000czk for a couple - about £15 each. Would definitely return!

Great Fun. Really well setup place, the harry potter game was brilliant if not a little easy. The people working there were really nice and helpful as well. I would definitely go again and try some of the other games.

Great Harry Potter, Zombies even better!. We gave as a present Harry Potter to our teenagers, went inside with them and enjoyed great experience with them too. We wanted the adventure to continue so much, that we bought and played Zombies right after that! :-D Atmosphere there was so great! We must be back for doing the Bank soon!
super. Amazing experience, what an atmosphere! Highly recommented. Thanks David for your assistance it was very helpful.

Harry Potter fun !. We chose Questerland since they have a Harry Potter room. It was a little bit outside of the city center, but it was easy to get there. Jon, the host was VERY helpful, and we had a good time. The only problem was the quality of the technology. The sound was not good, so we had a big problem understanding what the room was telling us. But over all it was a lot of fun - and it sounded like they were going to get a better sound system later on.

Best place I have ever been. They have a lovely space I played both quest . Staff was fantastic.We went lilte over the time but it was not a problem They are doing a new room which seems to be fatanstic as well If I back to Prague I will be back
We loved the Harry Potter room. The room was very cool and the puzzles we had to solve were not so difficult..The room was very fun (we were 4 people) and i highly recommend it

Highly recommended visiting questerland.. My boyfriend and I had a great time in the Harry Potter room. The room was quite difficult but very entertaining. John the receptionist was very kind and helpful. If we had more time in Prague, we would have certainly come back for another room experience.

Great night in Prague. My friends and I spent an evening in Prague attempting to escape the Harry Potter room. We had a fabulous time and we were treated with incredible courtesy by our host John! He even stayed late for us to give us more time to finish. I would absolutely recommend this as a small group activity, it's a lot of fun!
Great room with a magical theme. We came as a couple with an experience of 10 rooms. We found the room fun and challenging. Some riddles needs usage of math and some roman numbers.

The Harry Potter room. Amazing idea great and very welcoming service. The room was fun with tons of geeky stuff but the Harry Potter connection was weak (besides the wands). The room is indeed very very recommended. Although it was not very hard (we finished in 48min)

Well designed!. I was with my friend in both rooms - The bank robbery , and in Harry Potter.
