The rooms are beautiful and well planned, whith many lights/sounds that contributes to the mood.The puzzles are challenging but logical as well, so you can solve most of them without any help. But when help is required, you are given a clue by the operator.The room is suitable for non Czech speakers too! We both enjoyed very much and i sincerely recommend you to try it !
great rooms. great people, with good english, completely different rooms if you want to do both. easy to find, not far from center

Awesome design, good puzzles, but too short. These guys really invested in the production value of their rooms, as they are all superbly decorated and create the right atmosphere for the game. My mom and I did the bank heist room and thought it was very well done, but we were surprised by how short the game was, as we finished in about 35 minutes. It was our 4th escape room, and we have never finished a game with more than 5-6 minutes left before. It's not that the puzzles were easy - some of them were quite tricky and all of them were entertaining - it was just that there were fewer steps than average. I still very much recommend this place, especially for beginners. They showed us their two other rooms (the zombie room opens next month) and they both look great as well. Also, the staff was very friendly and helpful.

Fun in Prague!. Such a great time! My wife and I were visiting Prague and decided to try this as an alternative activity away from the craziness of Old Town. We had a fantastic time and would definitely recommend this to others! We loved our puzzle room but also we got the privilege of David showing us the setup of the other rooms as well. So impressed with the level of detail and care put into these concepts. Thanks David!P.S. Questerland was only a few minutes walk to The Tavern which is a local burger joint that is highly rated. We were able to do both and would recommend the same!

Great fun!. The staff was very friendly and very engaged to what they are doing :)The game iteslf (Harry Potter room) was an excellent experience and we enjoed a lot of fun! I would totally recommend this game to all of you. If you love Harry Potter you simply must visit this escape game :)

Best escape room yet. The best escape room we have done yet. (5 so far). Well designed and professionally built. The wands are a good addition too.Although my wife says you should have wizard robes and hats!!Excellent trip, thank you.
Very good. Very good experience overall and the person in charge was very nice! Definitely recommend it :) Only little down side was the lack of a clock to let you know how much time there was left.
Excelent experience. Amazing experience. We had enjoyed so much with the topic of escape room.I recommend everybody to choise this entreprise.
Positive surprise . Very welcoming staff! (We had young man who spoke good English) And effects was spot on. :) I would come back fore other room in the future.

Great Escape. We tried the bank robbery theme and were excited! Cleverly devised puzzles with sometimes surprising solutions. We (5 friends) escaped in 50 minutes. staff was very friendly and helpful, explained everything properly and offered advise when needed. I would definitely be back to try out Harry Potter or the one that's coming (horror/bunker theme). Thanks for great experience!

Great experience ! . We got there with a couple of friends and made the Harry Potter room, which was a lot of fun and not too difficult for a first escape room. The staff is very nice and helpful if you're stuck in one room. This escape room definitely is worth the price.

"Great Experience". I recently did the Bank Heist room. The theme was put together very well. There was only two of us and we escaped with only 5 minutes to spare! Highly recommend for a fun night out with family, friends, or coworkers.

Good!. We did the Harry potter room. The theme is well made and using the wand was very fun.The puzzle are good even if a bit simple sometimes. But it's good fun and it's enjoyeable to get out. If you are a family then its perfect for you! If you're an advance espace gamer then maybe pick up another room. They are making new rooms and surely it will be great.

Robbing The Bank and Saving The Wizarding World. Where to start! We (two of us) love escape rooms and made sure we did one in Prague and we were not disappointed. In fact, the Harry Potter one was so good that we came back on our final day to do the bank heist. Both of the escape rooms are well thought out and have plenty of challenges, each in their own unique way. Both have obviously had a lot of thought and you can even get a preview of their next escape room. Without spoiling the contents of either room we would highly recommend doing them, even if there's just two of you. Thoroughly enjoyable and perfect for a final day activity if you have an evening or afternoon flight. The highlight was that neither room required any prior knowledge or particular expertise, and all the puzzles can be solved through pure logic.
Nice experience. Something new and very, very interesting for our boys.We would like to come again and try another puzzle.

Great. Did the Harry Potter room with our two grown up children and we all had a fantastic time. Really good room and a challenging test. The host was very welcoming and gave a bit of help when we needed it. Highly recommended.

Fun time escaping. We had a fun time in the Harry Potter themed escape room. The staff was friendly and professional. I would totally recommend using this escape room. The rooms they are constructing also look great.

Bankrobbery was great!. We had a great afternoon at Questerland Prague where we robbed the Bank and escaped from it(1 option). Very friendly personel and they just where building new rooms with other themes.

Nice experience!. We really enjoyed the "Harry Potter" room. Very fun and thrilling but in a positive way. We recommend Questerland to everyone who likes adventures and is good at playing as a team. Greetings from Austria.

HP ESCAPE WAS AMAAAAAZING!!!. My first ever escape room, we even managed to escape. We were a group of 4 of both czech and english speaking. I have to praise the thoughtfulness of the game being english-friendly. The room was really interactive and thematic, with video, wands revealing secret things and play of light. I can only recommend, it really made me excited about Escape Room. And this one in particular is really engaging and entertaining.

So much fun!. Went while on holiday with 4 adults (my parents and 18yr old sister, I'm 22) and we were worried it would be too childish especially with the Harry Potter theme but it really wasn't. It was aimed perfectly at us, but I think younger teens would have managed, while it keeps adults entertained too. There were only a few voice overs but they were in English, though I'm assuming there were other language options. Overall a great hours activity, worth the twenty minute walk from the city centre to get there and great value for an afternoon of fun. Bit more detail, but no spoilers I promise: There are three rooms, but you cannot get into the second or third until you have completed challenged to open the door. The aim is to find three items and place them in the correct order in the first room. The first object is in the first room, the second in the second room and the third object in the final room etc. It is good to remember to go back and forth between the rooms in case you have missed anything. The advice given at the beginning was very clear and we felt well prepared. You have the option to ask for help if you want it, but you won't be given the answer, just a hint!Suitable for anyone, especially those who love Harry Potter, but the theme isn't everything, so long as you can imagine a magical scene, you will like it.

Very good fun with children 8-10 years. One of the best Escape room in Prague! The first on I experienced with family and children (8-10 years old). Harry Potter's room is challenging and entertaining! Plus, staff there is very friendly. I recommend!
Really good fun. Challenging, but not to much. Really good fun! Can deffinetely reconmend! We went with a group of 9 and booked two rooms. I did the bank robbery and had a great time!
Time flies... Very funny and challenging. We where to people and that was fine. Needed some extra time which we got. Very fiendly and helpful staff. Well worth the cost!
Great Experience. The Harry Potter game was so much fun and it was totally worth it. Although it was not easy to get there with Bus or Tram.

Teenagers loved the Harry Potter room. We are a family of 2 adults and 3 teenagers, who have never been to a games room before, but had read much about them. We chose Questerland as it sounded more technologically advanced that other games and we liked the Harry Potter theme.Questerland is rather a way out of the city and it took around 45 minutes for us to walk there from our hotel on the border of New Town Prague. However, it was easy to find. The lady who welcomed us and guided us through the game was very friendly.We got to select our wands and entered the first of the 3 rooms, which was very well done and just challenging enough, as was the second room. We struggled a bit with the third room as there were lots of red herrings and at one point it looked like we would run out of time, but as she could see we were very close she gave us another 1 min 6 secs and we made it out! Phew!This is a very well done games room and they are developing others at Questerland, which sound like a hoot. I would recommend going with a group, as it helps to have more than 2 or 3 of you to complete the task.

Great escape room experience. We did the Bank room with my girlfriend who was in such a room for the first time. We manage to escape and enjoyed the experience a lot! Really great and fun room to escape, highly recommended! And staff was superb also!

Fantastic activity for all weather in Prague. Well worth the cost, we had a fantastic time solving all the clever puzzles in the Harry Potter escape room. Prague has so much to offer and this was one of the highlights. Plus, it's so close to the curious TV tower (worth a look up close!) and there was a great street food market by the metro station the weekday we visited.

An Amazing Experience. We loved the Harry Potter room so much, we decided to come back and do the bank vault on the same day. We beat both rooms with a few minutes to spare! Great atmosphere and well put together.

Great Escape game with teenagers and children. Easy to find , helpful staff and a great game We did Harry Potter version and really enjoyed itThe wands were a great touch and you don't have to have in depth knowledge of all things Potter to crack the game

fabulous highlight of our trip. I took my 3 kids( 18, 16 and 13) to play both rooms yesterday. Lovely, friendly staff...you ll be in good hands even if you've never done an escape room before.Both rooms were absolutely great..we can't choose which was more fun...both very very different concepts and so play both if you can..nothing repeated or samey.. questerland..you rock.. we will be back someday..wish you all the best for your company's future.

Fantastic way to spend an hour. We did they Harry Potter themed escape room. Fantastic fun and a great way to spend an hour. The guy who works there is fantastic too. Very friendly and helpful. A must do in Prague.

Place where name truly define content. We've escaped from Harry Potter room. Guys did great job: puzzles are interesting and different, finishing of the room is brilliant, stuff is very friendly. All tasks are related to room theme and room story. We've been in about 15 rooms in different countries and this one is in top 5.

Magic room / Must do in Praha. We've found it on TripAdvisor and we tried it.Really good escape game ( first escape game for us), the magic Harry potter room is really fun.David, the guy who explained us and helped us, is someone really passionated and he gave us help to resolve some problems.Must do in Praha !

may be easy but it is cool. the magic room is really cool and it is an amazing experience. it is not very difficult, but some of mystery confused us for a short time. any team can try to finish it without any help and it will bring you a sense of achievement.
Amazing. I hade such a great time hear. I really hope their third escape room will be just as good as the other two!!

Escape with wand waving from Harry's Magic Room. A bit different escape room experience with impressive theme. Not your average "find the right number combination to the next lock" room but very well themed one.

Awesome!. We have a bit of escape room experience, but the two rooms of Questerland were the best so far! We booked 1 but decided to do also the other one once we were escaped. The storylines are wonderful. Highly recommended when you are in Prague!! The special price for two persons is a great idea :)

An Hour of Escapist Fun. This is the first time we had engaged in this activity and I hope it won't be our last! It was brilliant - we were impressed by Katharina's friendliness and professionalism and we thoroughly enjoyed trying to escape from the bank (we did succeed, but were suitably challenged). As a group of parents with 'children' aged 10, 20 and 26, we were all enthused and would definitely recommend the experience.

Absolutely Fantastic Escape Room!. This was my first escape room, and it was fantastic! We tried out the Harry Potter room, and it was great. Some of our friends tried Va-Bank, and also loved it. You could use interactive wands, and the paintings moved, and talked. It had great pricing, and I would totally recommend it!

Great experience! Worth the money. We chose the Harry Potter school of magic and it was absolutely wonderful. Beautiful decoration and fun puzzles. We were welcomed hartily by the owner. A must do in Prague!

Spells and money. Amazing trip out! tried out both quests and enjoying them soooo much! Slightly preferred robbing the bank great service and hours of laughs with friends and family! Definitely recommend this- such an amazing experience!

Awesome Place. We did the Harry Potter themed maze first it was so much fun we went back the following day to do the bank robbery! Absolutely loved it and actually thought it was even better! Would very highly recommend this to anyone staying in Prague looking for fun! Both the instructors we had were lovely and spoke excellent English! Can't wait to try the zombie room when that opens later this year! Thanks guys!

Excellent Adventure. Our family of four ( 2 adults + 2 kids 10yrs and yrs) enjoyed solving the mystery & unlocking the room. It wasn't easy & we asked a few times for clues but we did it. It's a great way to bond & build team work. A fun way to spend an hour or so in Prague. We highly recommend it.

High budget escape game, very friendly staff. The escape game we undertook was the magic room ( based around Harry Potter) and it did not disappoint. The interactive wands which were used to solve several of the problems really improved the experience. The staff done everything in their power to ensure we had an enjoyable time. I booked online through their website which was simple to use. Definitely would recommend the experience to anyone and even more so when they finish the new rooms they have under construction at the moment. Go do this when your in Prague!

Fun!. So our group always make a thing of doing a TRAP/Escape game when we go on holiday, this is like our 4th now I think, and we've managed to escape all the rooms so far :p - this one was fun, and the decoration/wands/puzzles were cool, it had an added element of being submersed into the game. We did it with 20 minutes left, but we spent 15 minutes on the last part of the game because we were being stupid, so we did it pretty fast, but let me just say I hope you're good at math, so if you're planning to do this, get practicing, I'd have been stuck in there for my entire life time if it was me alone (yes, I suck at math :D) The woman that told us the info/rules etc was nice, very friendly, welcoming etc. There is also a new room being made there which will be awesome I'm sure. Definitely check this place out, it's not expensive and you'll have a lot of fun with your friends.

Super fun. Very interesting and fun activity - we solved the magic room with three minutes to go, partly because of a faulty light, but it was easily fixed and the staff were very supportive and friendly. Great fun if you like puzzles, and different from most because you had interactive things like lights, locks and boxes where you could use your wand and actually affect what happened and was going on. We'd never played anything like this before, but this experience left us super happy and satisified and eager to come back for more. 5/5, would play again!

Best room I've been to. The Harry Potter room was amazing. The riddles where some of the best I've encountered and they were super-interactive. Not just same old locks and key-pad combinations, but mirrors, spells, hidden rooms. The wand was actually used as part of the game.Great time!

Real magic!. We've been in the School of Magic room this weekend. Our operator - David - was very good, very friendly. The room itself is totally cool! Real magic! Also we finished it quickly, it still felt like we worked hard to get out. Interesting riddles, the decor is fantastic. And for Harry Potters funs, there are several things, that will make you smile:-)

A bad operator :(. we got there 4 newbies, the operator told the story very unenthusiastically and the hints he gave us were not good, plus it was hard understanding his english.don't recommend it to the unexperienced.

Really fun. This game is Brilliant.it isn't easy which a good.you get a choice of wands and it feels like being in Hogwarts.the staff are really friendly and speak great English and are so helpful.will be going back again highly recommend this place

A new market leader? Probably. Prague is fast becoming saturated with Escape games and since Questerland opened in September of last year around 50 games have opened up in a short space of time. Questerland currently has two rooms open, a bank heist and the intriguing Howarts style Wizard room. I have play a fair few bank robbery games and no particularly looking forward to playing it; I had only really come for the Wizard game. I left loving both. The bank game was a masterpiece. High quality puzzles with a well crafted use of technology that doesn't overwhelm but compliments the game objectives perfectly. We escaped this room with about 15 minutes to spare. It was adrenaline filled and left you wanting more. The games master was really keen to take us back in side and talk about what our team liked. Before we played the Wizard game I was lucky enough to go back into the new game they are in the process of constructing based around a zombie virus. I know for some of you you might grown and. I likewise am not a big fan of zombie escape games but this one looked incredible. They are using film set specialist and it shows. Now the the finale. When we arrived a Czech family who had never played escape rooms before were being briefed. The wands they are given are not just for show. They actually 'do things' in the game. You are free to exclaim lumos if you wish but it is not necessary but yes the wands are an integral part of the game. This is one of the best examples I have seen of using technology to heighten the sense of magic. It really worked. Questerland is highly recommended, it has the right balance of puzzles, technology and amazing set design. My trip to Prague has led me to drastically reevaluate my top 10 list of games. Questerland is a definitely in there.
Great Experience. We have escaped from Harry's Magic Room and it was really fun. Great design and electronic equipment, totally worth it.

One of the best escape game in Prague. We did the Harry potter room and the experience was really good. If you're visiting Prague and you're looking for something a bit different, go there !Staff was very kind and friendly.Just one thing to say, the decoration of the room could have been a bit better and more authentic but it was still great.

Harry Potter Trapped Room. We had a wonderful time trying to become Hogwarts University Graduates! We made it out with a little help from the man working but most of it was done on our own! It was a great mind blowing experience for my friends and I. I would recommend anyone to do it too!!
So much fun!!. well worth a visit! the Harry Potter magical room was reasonably challenging and a lot of fun! The choice in wand was awesome!!!

Escape from Harry’s Magic Room. Great game – everything what you can expect from modern escape room and even a bit more found in the magical wands, talking portraits and other spells. Great for Harry Poter lovers but fine even for people not so crazy about magic (my partner belongs about this people but loved the room as well). The room master was very friendly and attentive, place itself has great potential. Looking forward to come back and enjoy more games they are planning to open.
Excellent!. We took the Harry Potter room yesterday and it was a great experience! Very well designed and we had lots of fun!

Very good place that can be even better!. Me and my girfriendhad visited quest room about Harry Potter and it was awesome! Cool feature with magic wands, good equipment, and very interesting tasks! We think that design of portaits and sound in video can be better, but atmosphere of lost chamber is great anyway! No boring tasks, only a couple of straight-deed tasks, and pure happiness at the end!Love and sure recommend it!
Fun. This was a great experience. Loved the activity but it was very frustrating trying to get all the clues to come together, but it was a worthwhile brain activity.
good room. "Harry" is a good room. very special theme and cool riddles. don't miss.Discount for couples with a coupon.

Perfection!. Awesome game and even greater instructor! Worth the money! High quality props and ideas! Very creative! Surely we will be there again when next time in Prague! Can't wait for the new rooms!

Magic room. Great experience ! :-) I have already played more then 10 different escape rooms (2 of them also in Budapest) and this is one of the best - very nice and detail performance, a lot of interesting technical effects. When you play the game you have really feeling that you are at some magic place:-)
Great game! Loved it. Loved robbing the bank. Our first escape room and will do it again for sure!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Was challenging but not imposiible. Perfect for new comers
One of the best escape rooms I was. This room was number 20 in my life, and this one (Harry Potter) was really the one that impressed me both by quests and technology. Highly recommended .

So much fun, the Magic Room is a must for every Harry Potter fan!. We chose to solve the Magic Room and had so much fun! We won't spoil anything, but we were pleasantly surprised by how intricate it was compared to what we expected. The staff was so helpfful and friendly and we felt very well taken care of! We will definitely try other rooms at Questerland in the future!

Amazing experience in the magic room!. We did the Harry Potter room and I have to say it was the best escape room we've done. (We have done around 5). The special effects were super, the puzzles were fun, and we loved our wands! The guy working there was really helpful and nice too. I'd highly recommend any Harry Potter fans to visit this - we had great fun!
exellent!. The exellent quest with the exellent staff.We were a first time, the guy explained us very good.We were exited a lot.

Great night out. We decided to do a binge session of these games all in one day. Starting with 4 in the Harry Potter one and 3 in the bank. Both were well set out and it helps the more people you have. Probably a few things that they could improve but they welcomed our opinions. Even stayed open later so we could do both. Is a little way out of city center.

Perfect quest!. Have been there with 7 friends making 4 boys vs. 4 girls competition to break down the time limit of Witchcraft (Harry Potter´s) room. As this is my very first experience with escape rooms and dont like just this fairytale, must admit it was designed in such an ingenious way as there were 3 connected rooms to be passed, where you are trying to use your magic wands almost everywhere and still think how does everything around you work. The staff is very nice, helpful, kind and let us have look into new zombie escape room which is still under construction. Very interesting experience! Definitely recommended for anyone to have some fun and let your brain works!
The Best web ever done. This is our 20th scape room...and IT has been T'HE BEST ONE!!!Perfectly balanced decoración (environment) with games /tricks.We really really enjoy!!! Harry Potter!!!

Awesome :-). I got the invitation here as a company event and it was great fun (thank you, KE) I tried both rooms and both were excellent. In some points my brain was sweating extremely much :D. Easily it was very funny and interesting.Do not hesitate to visit ;-)P. S. Already looking forward to the new room, which is now under reconstruction :-)

Best escape room in Prague!. I came here with my mother, my sister ty girlfriend to do the Harry Potter room. Everything was perfect, Dave has been really welcoming and helpful with us, he seems truly passionate and we had a very good time just talking with him. The room in itself is really inventive compared to other rooms I've done. Its also challenging and fun. It was a first for my mother and sister (teenager) and they liked it so much that we are going to do their other room as soon as possible.Its honestly the best escape room in Prague with Mindmaze. Go for it!

Great fun. This was my first escape room experience but according to my friends this is one of the best ones they have been to. They have been to quite a few different ones in Prague and other places in Europe. Our group split into two. I chose the "robbing bank" option. It had plenty of clever mind puzzles and was made really authentic. The ultimate Mission Imposible experience!My friends who did the Harry Potter themed one really enjoyed it too. It looked really Well done as we had a little sneak peak.Definately worth while doing whilst visiting Prague!
A great experience. We enjoyed this particular escape room very much although I'm not sure whether it suits anyone new to this kind of activity.Anyway I truly recommend it.
The best. It was just great! If You like such games, definitely go! It is also not far from the city centre. Easy to reach.

Nice and fun!!!. This was my first experience playing the escape room game. We were 2 couples. The game was very fun, interesting and challenging. The Harry Potter room set up was top notch. You actually use your wonder wand!!!!

Escape room full of magic!. I highly recommend this place to everyone who wants to spend a great time with your family and friends. We have tried the "Magic room" and not only had a lot of fun but also trained our brain with tricky puzzles.
Very entertaining!. This room escape game has good enigma and good scenery. The rooms are very interactive! It's a room scape to try in Prague for sure.

An excellent escape room . We did the 'escape from Harry's magic room' as a couple. It had a great range of interesting puzzles and we thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it. The team at quester land have decorated the set well, and there is some good uses of technology which I have not seen before in an escape game. We managed to finish the game exactly on the hour with one hint! Overall a great experience and a special mention to the man who works there most of the time as he was very welcoming and friendly towards us. If we are ever back in Prague we will be sure to visit again.
"Fun with Harry!". We have done a few games and our kids and we too enjoyed escape from magic room the most!Martina and kids

Great production values. Our family of four (married couple, two teenage daughters) tried the "magic" escape room (I think due to trademarks we can't say the character's name - let's just say Perry Hotter). It was a lot of fun. The gentleman at the reception was very helpful, and also provided hints when we needed it. The theme was cool, everyone having a wand was interesting, and the puzzles were really fun. There is a lot of cool tech here - you can see they spent a lot to make a high quality experience. We've done a few escape rooms, but this was our favorite.

Fun family team working experience!. Our first escape game and it did not disappoint. Both adults & kids enjoyed the thrill of the game and loved working together as a team! Would definitely come back and do this escape game again!!!

One of the best escape games we've done! . We have done about ten escape rooms now around Europe and this is definitely one of the best we have done!! We did the bank robbery room as a couple. It is brilliantly themed and has a really good flow. The clues are really clever. Whether you're a beginner or quite experienced at escape games I would definitely recommend you to book here! We only wish we had longer in Prague so we could try the other room!

Cool Harry Potter quest . We came here with my friends a week ago and it was fantastic! Very fun and entertaining. Harry Potter is like my childhood and playing the quest made me feel like I was really a little wizard fighting with the evil! I recommend everyone to come and play, believe me you won't regret it!! You get your own wand too!!

Escape from Harry’s Magic Room. We like quests, use to have them in Moscow.We found the quest "Escape from Harry’s Magic Room". It's great! super idea! It was in English (but we speak English:))) design is amazing. But what we liked the best is the last room where you need not only think, but "to play with associations". We have to use the administrator's hints twice! "Exit room Game Va-Bank" was great as well!!! Wish a big success to Questerland team! thank you!
Escape in Harry Potter style. If you like Harry Potter, it will definitely be a right choice for you. Also magician stick is needed!
Magical!!. We did the Harry Potter room and we were very impressed! We have done multiple rooms in the past and this one definitely stuck out! We highly recommend it

Excellent rooms. The Harry Potter room was great fun. The riddles were challenging, novel and lots of fun to solve. It's not a very difficult room, at least not for an experienced player, but still a good time.The design of both rooms, especially the bank robbery, was extraordinarily done. It's really what gets you engulfed in the scenario. Be it "magic wands" in the Potter room, or "lock picking" in the bank room - it really creates a special atmosphere.We had a little misunderstanding with the staff when booking a game, but they made up for it BIG TIME. They were very apologetic, let us play BOTH rooms for free, and we even left with a gift :). Customer service obviously means a lot to Questerland.
great fun. we have enjoyed the Bank rubbery well, had a lot of fun, and with 3 hints we were able to escape the room at 56 minutes. Looking forward to new upcoming rooms. Thanks

Best escape room in Prague!!. Had an amazing experience!!! I have been to many escape/trap rooms in Prague and around Europe and this was easily one of the best. Very elaborate and well thought out! I cannot wait to go back and do anther room!
Lots of fun. Got couple discount and had a really good time. The tasks given can be really tricky, but not impossible. Definitely worth a visit!
Great fun. I highly recommend doing this if you are in Prague! We had lots of fun and it really tests your brain.

Magic time :). That was the first time in an escape room, they explained very good what we had to expect and that we could ask for help at anytime.The rooms looked very nice, price was ok.But it was a little hard to find because it is behind a big brown door and the name is not written on it but on a hung up sign in like 2m height.

new to this type of entertainment. I was nicely surprised. The questerland escape game was entertaining. We were group of 4 people who were new to this type of things. We were pleasantly surprised by the level of enjoyment. The escape game kept our attention until the very last moment - finding the way out. So really as a one time thing I am happy to advise this activity. The services were great, accurate and the staff helpful. It took us approx. an hour and there was not a minute, in which were bored or so. Finding all types of clues and the way out was fun.

Great Game! . Thank you Questerland Crew for such a great day! We did both rooms and really enjoyed it! Especially the Magic Room was something new and special. I like the way how you guys used technology to make the puzzle kind of more interactiv. :)David gave good hints when we didn't know what to do next. You are absolutely cool!We would really recommand Questerland! And as soon as you open your new rooms, we'll come back! Thank you!
Brilliant. just a perfect game, perfect place and perfect support from staff. Thanks, we really enjoyed the game.

One of best escape games in Prague. I've already tried almost 10 escape games and this one (called Va-Bank) was really superb. The best thing about it is the atmosphere and the look. You feel like a real bank robber in a real bank, it looks simply amazing. I would recommend this game especially for beginners. For the experienced ones it may be a bit fast and simple. But even though you're an escape game specialist, you shoud try this one because of the feel of this game.

Absolutely brilliant activity for couples or friends. We wanted to try an escape game when we came to Prague and we really liked the wizarding theme quester land offered, so we thought we would give it a shot. When we got there a great guy named Omar, met us and quickly explained what we had to do and how the game worked. After this he locked us in a room, it was very interactive required you to look for clues and solve puzzles it was great fun and when we got stuck, Omar was there to give is a clue but not tell us everything.All in all it was a brilliant activity and I definitely recommend it to anyone who is in Prague with a spare hour. The best part was that they did a discount for couples, unlike many other escape games.

Escape from Harry’s Magic Room. we got a lot of fun playing there, my son 10 y.o. enjoyed, very unusual and interesting puzzles. We even had to ask for a hint.Generally, the atmosphere, electronic devices, magic sticks are fantastic....waiting for new quests from the team questreward!!!

Great fun. It was great fun! We had the Harry Potter room for we both love the movies and we were not disappointed at all. The game was beyond our expectations. Also it was not too easy but not impossible to solve. Thank you for that great game :)

First escape room. We did "escape from harry's room". First us it was it was a first experience with an escape room so can't compare with other rooms. Overall we liked the experience but we needed some hints to get to the end. Once you start looking in the wrong direction, it is hard to see the right path. But needing hints did not impact our enjoyment. Our twin daughters of 12 which do not speak czech or english did also enjoy it very much.The room is a bit outside the center of prague but we also visited the park nearby and ate very cheaply in the neighborhood. So it shows a different side of prague as well.

Escape from Harry`s Magic room. I'm here again, new quest! Harry Potter has exceeded all my expectations:)_!!!This is really cool! some puzzles are difficult, require not only logical thinking, but also associative thinking . Personally, I love it very much. The designer's work is brilliant, implementation of the idea - excellent!Electronic devices - wow!!! Puzzles are extremely interesting and I would like to note, some types of puzzles are absolutely new ideas. My congratulations to creative team of Questerland!

Excellent Sorcerer Experience. Very exciting and really nicely decorated escape room in the style of Harry Potter. Some of the riddles were quite hard, but it all made sense in the end. The riddles were really innovative and all went well with the sorcerer theme. And you get your own wand ;)

Family friendly -- our kids LOVED it <and we had a great time too!>. We decided to have our first escape room experience in Prague. After searching through the many possibilities we chose Questerland b/c of their wizarding themed escape room. Our kids are big Harry Potter fans and we thought that would seal the deal. There were only a couple of slots left for wizarding room, so we signed up and were promptly buzzed in about 10 minutes before our time slot. The staff were extremely courteous. They let us lock up our coats and gave us a sit down brief on how it worked. We have (2) boys, ages 10 and 12 and I was worried they might not enjoy the challenge of solving puzzles, riddles, etc. I couldn't have been more wrong! They had a blast. Although we haven't been to any escape rooms before, I was very impressed by the decorations and props that were part of the game. We had access to the hosts via a speaker in one of the rooms. They did a GREAT job of letting us work our way through the clues and only helping us if we seemed like we were stuck. Of course they also gave us the option to request no clues if that suited us better. :-) It was a wizarding theme and there are obviously copyright laws they must observe, so don't go in expecting to see Harry Potter's picture and Hogwarts castle,...but it was EXCELLENT if you like that theme. I think it's very appropriate for Potter fans. With a little help we managed to escape at the 54 minute point. Again, our first time w/escape rooms, but we had a great time, and more importantly...our kids had a great time. I highly recommend.

Harry Notter . I so wanted to love this attraction as I'm such a huge Harry Potter fan but I just couldn't. Before I start, I've got to credit the guys there for doing such a good job on the theme. If you've not done many escape games and you're not worried about the quality of the clues, and you're more interested in the overall theme of the game then this is definitely one to go and play! However, the clues and the whole interactive side of the game fell flat. We were told during our briefing that we could only use our wands on certain shaped, interactive areas within the room but this turned out to not be the case. The interactive side of things also meant we had to keep stopping and starting, waiting to watch videos etc. which wasn't ideal as we were against the clock. The game also involved us calling the guys working there when we needed clues, and although they were helpful, their level of spoken English wasn't good enough to be answering in-depth questions in timed conditions. It slowed us down and caused us a lot of confusion at times. The final flaw for me was the third room, which was so daunting it made it almost impossible to solve. There were almost too many red-herrings and too much to try and absorb in the last ten minutes of the game. I think that this game is trying to be too many things - it wouldn't be overly difficult if the interactive element was limited and obvious, but there's no indication as to how much you should rely on it and as a result rely heavily on the team there to give you clues, which end up becoming answers as they were so expert in the technological side of things. It feels like more of an interactive experience where the traditional escape game element is an afterthought and for me, that's not what I was looking for.

Awesome. Although it was my first experience with such a type of an activity I must say it was awesome. The puzzles are well thought out, unique and very well set up into the context of getting out of the safe. Every member of our team was crucial in solving at least one of the puzzles so we really felt like a team at the end. Looking forward to trying their other room. Highly recommended.

Very interesting evening. I have received as a gift for Christmas to join the quest game (Quest Va-Bank) in Questerland. It was my first experience with this kind of activity and I was really interested how it would be. I asked 4 my friends to go with me. And I would say we enjoyed it very well.When we arrived they explained us everything what was necessary for start. Finally we solved all the quests and we found the way out from the bank safe in the time limit. I can recommend it to the ones who have no experience with this kind of activity and who would like to start with it.
Harry Potter style escape room. What else could a diehard HP fan wish for. EXCELLENT. It really surpassed my expectations. Great execution, thoughtful tasks, magical atmosphere, very nice staff.

Questerland!! . Finally an amazing quest opened in Prague. Full of new technology combined with an interesting set of puzzles and mysteries, and all of this in a great interior. Puzzles are very untypical and there are a lot of new ones that involve a magic wand. There are a few puzzles that require some thought. I recommend all the quest lovers out there, as well as everyone else to come and play!
Harry Potter room. It was just awesome! Magic with wand like a wizzard <3 / Bylo to uzasne! Kouzlite hulkou jako carodej <3
New cool quest!. FUN! FUN! FUN!!!Cool electronic devices, smart puzzles, great atmosphere. We enjoyed so much.I recommend who loves questroom.
fun experience. pleasant stuff and enjoyable game. Next time we would prefer going in more than two people, even though it was fun in two already
Vabank. Excellent exit game! Very entertaining and with many effects. Convenient location in the centre of Prague.
super. . I had an amazing time at Questerland the other day! It was very fun yet it made me use my common sense and knowledge! One of the best quests I played yet!

Guaranteed fun and laughter. I highly recommend Questerland. I went with friends and we had an amazing time. You can go with family, friends, workmates and will bond with them throughout the game. It's a guaranteed unexpected twist to your night out or family holiday.
My first escape room. Escape room Va bank was exciting, well prepare and not so dificult. it wasy fisrt escape room and I really enjoyed it.
Very good escape game. Funny game, interesting and original puzzles, authentic atmosphere.Nice and helpful staff (reminder call one day before game).
Great fun !. This was a lot of fun to participate in. The logical puzzles combined with a fast phase quests is ideal for families, friends and couples.
The best. We have already played five different games, this was the best :). I recommend it. Tasks are not primitive, but they can all make it.
Amazing place . I had an amazing day today at questerland! It was a very fun experience that taught me and my friend some great team building skills. I'm glad I found them on fb. Thx Questerland!

EXCITING ESCAPE!. i was told about questerland by a close friend who had said she had the time of her life! she wasn't lying as i was about to find out for myself. i played the bank escape and i was truly amazed my the intelligence of the game! my team of friends and I finished in an outstanding 53 min! i was rather proud:) it satisfies all ages and i can't think of a better way to spend my afternoon! it challenges your imagination and logical thinking. i was very impressed to say the least. i have played a few quest games before but i have to say this was the best by far. i don't usually take the time to sit down and write a review, but i honestly believe this one deserves to be recognised.

1st quest at truly high level in Prague. We were surprised with the outstanding level of this quest. A cool theme and modern puzzles. All looks and feels so real. Just like you get inside a Hollywood movie. Unlike many others in Prague and Europe this quest is even to top quests we have visited. Be prepared for intellectual challenge as the time pressure mounts. We escaped just in the last moment. Come in a group for more fun.Thank you guys! Waiting for more quests from you.

Cool!. I've played the game, been so excited visiting there while switching my thoughts from a routing audit work (my job) to a very interesting quest. It's indeed taken my breath away! So, feel aleays young;) Take a chance! Cheers!
Quest. Great idea.The game is amazing I had a lot of impressions. Recomended to all who wants to have a good time and fun in Prague.

It's really cool!!! It' more than 5D reality.. We visited this quest with my colleagues and we felt like gangster. I can recomment this place for teambuilding. It will be super time for you. Fantastic puzzle game, cool electronic locks!!!!!!! I think it's a good idea to organize a birthday party for childs and friends:).

Amazing escape game!. We did Va-Bank thanks to recommendation of our friends and enjoyed it very much. This is not just solving puzzles, but the whole atmosphere of a real bank and lots of electronics helps to feel you as in a movie. And what a fantastic feeling when you solve the puzzle and the door opens! The puzzles are challenging and not boring. The staff is excellent and the location is very convenient in a beautiful Prague area.I would recommend it for small group of friends or families with teens – they will love it.
Excellent Adventure!. Fantastic. Really inventive puzzles and full of surprises. Excellent design of the room and the staff were wonderful.

The best escape game in Prague. Before Questerland I have visited 3 or 4 escape games in Prague so I was sure Questerland wouldn't surprise me. But it was so excellent and interesting, with a lot of quests, perfect technologies and so on. Even the door we get to the room through is super cool :) quest is not easy, but also not hard, so we were able to get out in 46 min. without any help and hint.

Amazing!. Frankly speaking, my life will never be the same after attending this quest. It's truly life changing experience leading to enormous amounts of positive emotions! Lots of attention paid to details and interiors, so you can easily transfer your consciousness to every plot introduced in this quests!Highly recommended!

new up and coming. Loved this game, very clean rooms and not the easiest questions tot figure out. The guys where very friendly and tried to find a solution for the minor technical problems in a fun way. This is a real new addition for experienced and new players.

I recommend. What a great time! A group of us (4 people) went to the new game Va-Bank. We were greeted warmly immediately upon arriving. Check-in was a breeze! Our room master was great. Quest was challenging but so fun!!! A lot of motion and electronic puzzles! From the customer service and staff to the game itself - all were fantastic. Plus, we escaped with only 2 minute to spare. Next time in Prague I hope we’ll visit next game in this location.
The very interesting exit game in Prague. It was the best impression of playing escape game in Prague! We played with my family. Va-Bank adventure!

Haunted House Team Building. We went as a team building and we loved it! It was our second time (we previously passed the Hacker's Nest, also higly recommended!!!) and the atmosphere was really well prepared. It's scary and really gets you into the story, but don't let this delay you or you won't finish it! It's complicated and challenging, so be prepared to think deeply. The price might seem high to some, but it's definitely worth it and they have put a lot of work and thought onto it.

Emperor's Secret. We booked the Emperor's Secret escape room as a gap filler whilst on a city break. Between the four of us we'd only done one before and we thought this one was excellent. The clues are pitched at a good level and we needed very few hints to complete it in 40 minutes. The theme and setting were really well done and we were impressed with the way the tasks linked together. It was well worth the money and useful to be able to book online. If we had time we would have definitely done another room. Thanks The Chamber!

Hacker's Nest. I've played 8 escape games before this one and this game is quite alright. The setting is really nice, some puzzles are interesting but the game is linear and that is a huge minus for me. Being linear makes the game easier and there was even a moment when we literally had to just sit and wait. The stuff was really friendly and chatty.

Best exit game in Prague. We have recently visited newly open exit game Haunted House. This game has unique and very scary atmosphere! Horror style and all puzzles works perfectly together. Even if the difficulty of this game is harder then other games what we played before, we really enjoy it so much!Highly recommended to everyone who loves exit games!!!
Amaizing escape room. One of the best escape rooms I have been in!!!Went there with my girlfriend and two other friends, The room was very hard and challenging.Enjoyed every moment.

This was great fun! . I bought this escape game as a birthday surprise for my boyfriend, and we both liked it very much! We did mysterious office. It was his first time in escape room, and my second time, and this room was not too hard, but still offered lots of challenges. We managed to get out exactly in 60mins. I can definitely recommend the chamber! We had a lot of fun and the staff was very nice and helpful!

Amazing, Exhilarating, very well done. During my trip to Prague i visited both the medieval dungeon and the emperors secret both were amazing but i would have to say that the medieval dungeon was the best it was extremely well done with very few actual hints more nudges in the right direction and the people running the game were very friendly but also very goo at hyping up the game causing one of a group to freak but in a good way

First Time for everything. It was a great Experience with really friendly hosts that Are there to guide and Help you all the way if u happen to get stuck. It gets your Blood and adrenaline pumping even though u know its not real!! I would recommend it to everyone

Fun and challenging activity. Fun and challenging activity, We've enjoyed it a lot!! We can recommended it to everyone who loves escapes rooms in virtual/Real rooms this one really makes you think out of the box.

Best locked room ever. Our group of four, who have done multiple locked rooms among us, found this group and their hackers nest (apparently one of their older verions) was the best locked room we've done, including those in Canada, US, and Germany. Wow! Truly amazing room and company, we loved every second, super complex, high high production value, and amazing staff who are so friendly (Richard and Anna, thank you!). Can't rate this group high enough, wish we had time to do more rooms when we were in Prague.

So much fun . I went there with my two sons it was so fun and challenging.. First time.. It can be a family game or a group of friends.. Some of The puzzles wows just waiting for some surprise .. I recommend it for everyone specially families

Charles IV - The Chamber Escaper. Excellent experience and one of the best escapers I have participated on. We have visited this escaper by the end of September 2016 and set up a new record to 35:00 almost without any help from the organizer (Group of only one experienced player and 3 beginners). Despite of this fact, I would certainly not say that it was an easy job. The entire escaper was historically very authentic and I can imagine having similar few hundred centuries back. Also the premises and location offer very good experience. All tasks make perfect sense and it is clear that owner spent a lot of time and energy to design this escaper. Every details is carefully crafted and many riddles are newly designed. We almost did not stop for more than few minutes with exception of the very last task which was a little bit complicated due to outside circumstances. We would very highly recommend this escaper especially to groups with different ways of thinking and good communication skills. Also the personal was very nice and kind.
Thrilling!. Good, clean family entertainment that you can trust. We did not make it but the game host let us finish any way.

Great escape room!. My wife and I did the 'Mysterious Office' escape room and were struggling a little initially until we found out literally all of the props in the room were interactive. Once we got in the right mindset of unlocking the clues it was such a fun way to spend an hour and wished it went for longer. Highly recommended!
Very nice. We had a lot of fun there. Very challenging and for us it was one of the hardest escape rooms we ever tried ! Strongly recommend!
Great Fun!. Could not be more fun !Professionally built with engaged staff.Really well worth the price paid. Suiteble for all (except very young Children)

Excellent fun and very well designed room. We had an amazing time in the hackers nest room- the design of the game was excellent- I've been to games before where the decoration was lacking but this one really felt like you were in the hackers nest and to save the world was your mission! The puzzles were all logical/common sense so we didn't have to worry about knowing anything we didn't know. Really good escape game- would recommend to anyone looking for good fun and a challenge. Proud to say we saved the world with 7 seconds to spare!

The Treasure of King Charles IV. Great fun! We'd never tried an escape game before, and went mainly to get into the underground chamber! Had a great time figuring out the puzzles. We didn't finish quite in time, but there were only two of us - we're told that's not uncommon. No one was booked in the next time slot so we were allowed to continue working it out.

Hacker's Nest is Great. We successfully completed this room as a team of two and agree that it is a fantastically designed room with some truly original, imaginative puzzles and some of the coolest props I've seen in an escape room (the "computer door" you see in pictures is really amazing). It is also a very tough room - we used about 3 hints when we were completely stumped. The use of technology is really good as well, true to the hacker theme. Unfortunately some of the technology didn't perfectly work during our play through, but the game operator helped us through and it wasn't terribly distracting. There is also a pretty heavy reliance on padlocks with number codes - something I'd ideally like to see less of. Overall I would definitely recommend this room to people who have done a couple escape rooms before (it would NOT be a good room to do your first time) and are up for a challenge. The staff said this room has about a 20% success rate and is "one of the hardest in Prague." I've done about 7 rooms now and the originality in puzzles and production value make this one of the best and hardest.

Amazing experience. Both me and my partner had no previous experience with escape room games but found it to be brilliant fun. Staff was friendly and welcoming and gave us hints when we got stuck. They even gave us a little extra time so we could finish the game! We went for "the mysterious office" and can thoroughly recommend it. Overall the room and riddles were of a high quality! We will be back next time we are in Prague.
Positive impression!. It was amazing how a limited space - actually one room can keep you (and another 4 people!) busy, locked for one hour. :) It was interesting, fun, we had great time there.

Awesome time in the Emperor's room !. As a group of 7 we had hard time to find a room for all of us but this one just fit perfectly !It is said to be the hardest in town , so we were a little frighten that we would be so slow , as no one ever tried this kind of game!But team work can manage great things !Found the chest just in time thanks to the assistance of the girl in charge (very nice !) All my friends want to try others now !Great story, great tricks , great staff , in a nutshell great time !Go and see for yourself !Just make sure you picked the right adress , because they have different location !Enjoy

The Mysterious Office!. We were a team of three and it was our first escape game. We didn't finish in time but they were nice enough to let is complete it with some extra time. The staff are awesome and very communicative.The game itself was quite enjoyable and the history behind it is fascinating.

Must do activity while in Prague!. Visited Prague recently and was told I had to try an escape room, didn't really think it was for me but after the mysterious office I am hooked and want to try more!! This room was recommended as it was our first time playing an escape game and it was a perfect difficulty level; not too difficult and not too hard, as long as you get into the correct mindset. The staff were amazing gave us slight hints but stopped as soon as we said we no longer needed any help. Also loved the real life mystery that comes along with this room making it particularly unique.This room is a must try!!!
Enter the Fungeon. A "Point-and-Click Adventure" in real life. Amazing technical features, great ambiente and a helpful dungeon-master lead to an hour you shall never forget
Great Room!!!. i enjoyed it. wasnt easy. recommended to people who its not their first escape room! it was challenging and very fun
Good but not the best. The room was great although some solutions are already known from other, less recent rooms. To many lockers instead of logical puzzles.

Excellent leisure time. We haven´t done anything like this before, so it was pretty new for us. Details are everywhere, you can feel that these people love what they do and you enjoy it. Despite of failing our first time in Hacker´s challenge (definetely you need to think to solve the problems), we really loved it and try next day in Dungeon, what was even better experience (in this case succesfull for us). 100% recommended,
Escape. It was an amazing and very exciting game, we had a lot of fun :-) Everything was well organised. Totally recommend!

Great experience. It was our first time in an escape room and it was very exciting and entertaining for us. The staff was very nice and helpful. My wife and me will be back for the other rooms on our future prague trips.

An excellent exit room game!. We were 2 couples. For some of us it was the first exit game, others are quite experienced. The game is excellent, in a medieval cellar, and the beginning was absolutely unexpected!!! I will not write more, not to spoil it :) enjoy :)

Escape Game in Prague. This was a great exeperience. As a foreigners (French) everyone at the Chamber was really nice and helpful. They spoke perfect english and let us finish the game even after the authorized hour. The price are lower than in France and the quality of the intrigue and the decoration were really worth trying. I highly recommend this escape game !!

Our First escape game. This was our first escape game : The medieval room ..and to be honest it was quite quite difficult ( especially working as a family ..with many dominant attitudes from all adults and kids) but we eventually got over it with a little help from our overseer ( who was immensely helpful) We didnt complete the game within the hour ( 1hr 15mins) but that was because we lost an eyeball when it dropped behind the wall...Once the overseer found out what happened he nudged us along and completed the game. Think Crystal maze ...It was really good fun even though we picked one of the harder games ..and can not wait to try another escape game ... Highly recommend the Medieval room and would do it again..but i would try not to be strapped into a torture rack the next time

The best escape room I've been to. We did the medieval dungeon room, and of the 8 or so escape rooms I've done in various cities, it's by far been the best one. Very immersive experience, great puzzles, and also somewhat unique from the rooms I've done previously, in that teamwork is 100% required. The only sub-optimal thing was that "the table" was broken and so we did a slightly alternative room configuration. It was still great, but I wonder if it would have been even hard if it had been working properly.

Must visit when in Prague!. There are many escape room games around Europe and had the chance to try quite a few. I must say that The Chamber in Prague has been one of the best experiences ever. The detail put into the game, the way the rooms are designed and the story behind each game is excellent. Whether you are interested in playing the Mysterious Office or stuck in the Dungeon, each has a unique experience. The only thing to be prepared for is that you cannot pay by card, only cash which may be a slight surprise upon arrival.If you are looking for something fun to do in Prague besides sightseeing, give it a try, I am sure you will not be disappointed! My personal favorite is the Dungeon, it's great with a group of friends! Can't wait until more rooms are open!
Amazing. I have to say that I love escape game. I already have been on several escape game in Prague and in Budapest but this one was best.

Throghout experience. Without spoiling anything for anyone, i'll just say that we did room called "Medieval Dungeon" and it was really diverse room with different kinds of puzzles from easy to really challenging. Best escape room where i've been so far.

Adult entertainment. Finally a game which adults and children will both love. I had thought it would have been quite easy and thus had chosen the hardest offered game, in the first second I saw I had been wrong... we failed and permited WW3, sorry.

Awesome experience! . Did the Hacker's nest - it was pretty tough, but the hints were helpful without giving away too much! We (as a group of 3) solved it just in time. We had a great time - definitely recommend doing this on a rainy day in Prague!
Amazing fun- fully recommend. If u get a chance in Prague I fully recommend going to the chamber- it was a very enjoyable experience and the staff there were very friendly and helpful!

Our first, but definitely not our last!. This was our first escape game ever and we didn't really know what to expect. But it turned out to be great! The setup included a sequence of codes to be found, puzzles to be solved, and keys to be discovered. There were some nice surprises, and you have to think outside-the-box from time to time.We loved the experience so much that we decided to do more of these escape games in the near future.

Exceeded my expectations.....so much fun.. We booked the Mysterious Office for two hours in a row and devided our family into to groups to compete against each other. It was so exciting and much more challenging than I expected. I highly recommend trying this. We had so much fun, the staff was so friendly and nice and the whole thing was a great experience to our family.

Great way to spend an hour!. This is the third escape room for my family but was the first for my nephew who was visiting. We did the Mysterious Office and room was challenging. There were several new "puzzles" that we had never seen before. We loved the background story and felt like we got our moneys worth. The employees were very friendly and helpful when we needed clues. I would recommend it to anyone, we had a blast!!
Perfect!. We went 5 friends to the 'hacker nest'. Maybe the best I ever did and for a good price. The room is very electronic, sophisticated and Nicely decorated.

A brilliant mystery!. Cleverly constructed and well thought out experience, The Chamber in Prague is absolutly worth a visit! Together with 3 friends In July 2016 I tried out the puzzels of "The Mysterious Office". Surpisingly catchy this challenge instictivly put us all in an "all out detective mode". It was a great teambuilding rush solving each problem to unlock new ones! I also really enjoyed the authentic feeling created by the overall estetics and storytelling of the gamemakers and great staff. Would love to return and try out all of the different rooms!

An absolute challenge!!. This was my 4th escape game that I have played and by far the most challenging. The employees kept to their word and gave as few tips as possible. To be honest, it was late at night so I lost interest but my son and his girlfriend dug in and saved the world! I appreciate the fact that you can book through their Facebook page or on their website. The times that they are open is very convenient and there is a pub across the street to relax and wait for you turn! They are very prompt and have you briefed and inside the room in no time at all! I would highly recommend this company for any escape games!!

Awesome first time experience. My friend and I completed our first escape room at The Chamber (MYSTERIOUS OFFICE). It was an awesome experience! The host was great, offering us hints at appropriate times. Great mix of visual, logic & mathematical puzzles. Easy online bookings and a photo loaded to FB at the end. Highly recommended.

Great way to get the neurons firing in the morning.. This was our group's third escape room and one of my favorites. Only criticism was that the room was very warm since the weather in Prague has been warm. Good puzzles and a few fun differences from others. Staff member was friendly and helpful.

Fantastic experience. We were looking for something different to experience in Prague and decided to have a go at an escape game. Looked at reviews in Trip Advisor and decided on The Chamber. We booked online for the same day and found our way easily. We had never played this game before so after the initial explanation we were put in the room. It was quite hard being our first time but so much fun. The girl working there was great and we would highly recommend this experience and will be looking for another place to play the game in other cities. We had a fantastic time!!!
Great Game. Excellent Game. Great Flow. We are experienced gamers with over 70 games all around the world. This is a great one. Give it a try. You will love it.
Great game with backstory!. A very nice game! Great environment but a bit confusing with all the non-game-padlocks. But great staff and easy to find.

They know how to make your brain work. We had an amazing time yesterday at the Chamber with a group of colleagues trying to solve the puzzles. It was a great team-building, as we could co-operate and communicate to each other outside of work area and scope. Both rooms: Mysterious office and Hacker's nest are done in a way that it makes you think, makes you more and more curious and is done in a way that you forget about the outer world. The arrangement of the team was very professional: reservation made online with a following email confirmation, they spoke perfect English and were very helpful and welcoming.Thank you, guys! We had fun!

The coolest game ever. The Chamber in Prague is a really nice, unique concept. The reali-life escape game is not so easy but that makes it even greater. We found it very amusing and it's full of new surprises! It's THE BEST! Thanks The Chamber, for an awesome hour.

Fun and challenging room. We played the office and there were a few challenging puzzles and a few quirky puzzles, but with a bit of help, a bit of luck and good team work we conquered them all. The first room for us was more challenging than the 2nd room, but they let us finish since there wasn't a booking immediately after.Would certainly come back and try the hackers nest next time we're in Prague!

Surprisingly good and catchy. We came as a team of 7 members (teambuilding) and played the game Mysterious Office. It was actually the first escape game for all of us and we found it really surprisingly sophisticated. We have spent great time there and we are looking forward to play the other games. Thank you and wish all the best in the future!

One of the best things you should do in Prague - not only on rainy days. The Chamber is a textbook example of an escape game. It is situated in the old jewish part of Prague only 15 minutes to walk from the Charles Bridge. It was my second escape game so I thought it could be boring for me but far from it - I would recommend this game also to people who had done dozens of escape games before. WHY?1. a true story?!after making the reservation only which was quite easy we've reached The Chamber at a sunny afternoon. Standing in front of the house you don't count with an escape room behind these walls because the house looks like a normal dwelling house. Inside the two friendly girls have told us the history about these rooms and how it comes to open an escape game there. It has been a normal appartment before and some decades ago a grim man had lived there. Nobody talked to him and some of the neighbours were scared of him because they didn't know what he was doing inside his walls. To find it out was our challenge, so let's start.2. The Mysterious OfficeWe entered the office. The race against the time has started. The level of difficulty is 80% what means that The Chamber also have some other rooms which are a bit harder. But as we were 5 persons who didn't have experience in Escape Games exept me, we've chosen this one. It is awesome if you find the solution of one task and take the next, step by step we neard us our destination. But then ... (experience yourself :)3. RecapAll in one we didn't managed it in 60 minutes. But we get the chance to end the game which was very nice. So after 70 minutes I think we've finally had the solution and the answer of the question what the old man who was a doctor had done inside his appartment. 10 Euros for 1 hour of great tension, happiness if it goes further and team spirit. I would say: it is worth it. So do not hesitate to book it. Have fun!

Great Fun. A group of 4 of us played our first escape game here, we asked for the easiest room and it was challenging but a lot of fun.The staff were very informative and helpful throughout the duration of the escape. I'd highly recommend it to anyone

Fantastic experience! . One of the group booked this experience for 9 of us. One half did the traditional escape room and my half did the hacker's room in which we had to save the world! Managed it with minutes to spare and saved the world. Highly recommend it folks!

1 year Eacape Room Anniversary....what a way to celebrate!. It was almost 1 year to the day that I played my first escape room in Berlin. The Room, is perhaps one best escape rooms in the world or at least on 2 continents. It was perhaps fitting that I should celebrate by playing a couple of rooms at The Chamber. The Chamber is within walking distance of the old town in the Jewish quarter. It's opposite a cool South American bar that does excellent cocktails. There is a flag flying above the door. We were greeted by a very enthusiastic host who took us a waiting area. She explained the rules of escape rooms very and clearly talked us through the back story. We played the mysterious office first, a classic escape room that didn't fail to deliver on all the key measures. Coherent, well thought out puzzles that tested logic and brain power, the room itself placed a high premium on attention to detail, and the a number of a wow factor that left you satisfied in the victory of escape. This is an above average game and certainly would be a good introduction to any novice. You may have noticed that escape rooms are popping up all over the place, lots of prison breaks, bank heists, virus outbreaks and secret agent mysteries. This half term I tried to book unusual rooms and that is certainly what you get with Hackers Nest. It is not just something different, it is something very special. The Hackers Nest is able to perfectly blend, high tech room design, logical puzzles and a high volume of wow factors that leave you desperate to play again. The level of detail will astound you and make many other rooms just look weak. I'm not giving anything away by saying take a moment to study the door. It is the escape room equivalent of the Iron Throne. If you play one room in Prague, then play this one. If you are in Prague in the next few weeks you will get the chance to visit the new games the Chamber is opening. I will return next year hopefully to play them too.

Well built escape room with very good puzzles. Having played 30+ escape rooms I would like to say that this was a very well designed room. The puzzles were logical and fun to solve. They fit well into the theme, and the atmosphere of the room was very well designed! I played it with friends who had never done an escape room before and they loved it just as much as I did.

Staff was super friendly. The "mysterious office" room was fun as hell, lots of good surprises. Though what really made the experience was the staff. They joked with us, told an awesome back story, and even let us play 20 minutes over the time limit. Highly recommended!

Nice time at the chamber. We had a great evening and made it out just in time. It was the 2nd time I visited an escape game, so maybe for the more experienced it will be a lot easier, but still I think you will still enjoy the tasks you are given

Hacker's nest. Very sophisticated escape game, one of the best we've been to so far. For advanced players only, not suitable for beginners. Very low percentage of plain locks, some very original ideas and effects we haven't seen before. Staff was very helpful and professional, overall very good value for money.

Mysterious office. Really outstanding experience – the storyline is great, room just takes you back to the beginning of 20th century by every small detail, puzzles are extremely clever and fun and mostly – the atmosphere is just unbeatable! It was just amazing to feel chills on my neck as we digged deeper to the story. Can’t wait to challenge the Hacker this week and what more, I can’t wait for the new rooms that are supposed to be opened! My favorite place!
so so. "the hacker" room is not as good as expected. it's hard, not because the riddles were sophisticated, but because they weren't fluent and clear

Not easy, but a lot of fun. This was the fifth escape room my friends and I have done, and all of us found it the most challenging. However this was a good thing, and we felt it added to the fun.We decided to do the Hacker's Escape game on our first night in Prague. It made a great alternative to a night out and was easy to locate, close by the old town square. The man who welcomed us to the game was friendly and obviously very passionate about his job. To say anything about the game itself would risk spoiling the enjoyment. However, there were some very clever twists which incorporated the street the building was on and involved computers and hi-tech gadgetry.Highly recommended.

2 great rooms. Last year we visited the first room, and it wad amazing. This year we decided to play at the second room - hacker nest, and it was even better!!Recommended for experienced players (we played over 20+ rooms, and it was hard), but I believe the Chamber team will help to beginners too!!
The riddle. Great riddles, aweome stashes, cool creepy story. Go there and solve it. And remember don ´t rush, enjoy it, hour is enough. Or isn´t? ;)
Scape games. Excelent experience!!! My sons really enjoyed it. I think they should add a little bit more of time for that especific game but it is enjoyable anyway
Cool!!. Was really fun. First time in an escape room. We didn't get out in one hour. Think we resolve 8 from 10 enigma...
Hacker's Nest. This was our first time ever doing something like this. It was so much fun and really detailed. This is a must do!

Good fun but Hackers Nest a bit too challenging for a team of 2. Now I had never participated in a room escape before and we booked here to do the Hackers Nest but it was just me and a friend. Perhaps I missed it on the website but I don't think it made clear that this room was definitely not for beginners. We had a brilliant reception from the lady who was very polite and welcoming. It took me a little while to get the hang of the game and we had a problem with one part of the game which didn't quite work properly. The room is amazing and really quite good fun but I think it is too challenging for a smaller group unless you are looking for a challenge.

One of the best "Escape Games" we have done so far!. We love Escape Games and played a couple of them in Berlin and around the world, but The Chamber really raised the bar for future games. The booking process is very easy on their homepage and we had a hearty welcome when we arrived. The staff is very friendly, gives a great introduction (5-10 minutes) into the background story and the "rules" of the game and all of the member we met speak English perfectly, which makes the game suitable for tourists as well. We visited the "Mysterious Office"-room first and we were so blown away that we booked the second room"Hacker's Nest" immediately after we arrived at home. Both of them are so detailed and atmospherically well designed that you are immersed in the story from the first second on. The puzzles and riddles are clever designed and unique, but can be solved without hints in the timeframe of 60 minutes. All in all, a great Escape Game that I can totally recommend. So check them out and have an exciting and entertaining time like we did! 5 Stars and more!
amazing. first escape game in my life, and looking forward to next one! :-) I recommend this to everybody / super zážitek určitě všem doporučuju!

A stressful excitement!. It was our first time in these kind of escape/puzzle room and the only room available was "The Hacker's Nest": boy what an adventure!I don't want to spoil any fun so I will just say that the enigmas and the puzzles were very interesting to solve, the environment was very realistic, we really thought we were in the flat of a hacker, with many computer books on hacking, some erotic magazines and superheroes posters as well as his plan to destroy the world pinned on the walls. Even if we failed to finish it on time (1 hour), we had a lot of fun!I would not recommend this game/this level for children under 15 years old, you may not need to do any complicated calculus but at least you need a logic that someone under 15 years lacks.We are ready for the next challenge!
perfect. The chamber was very interesting, riddles were nicely connected. Everything went smoothly. I recommend this escape room.

Fun game, but we needed more time!. This was our first time at an escape room. over all the room ("mysterious office") was very smart and challenging. we needed more time at the end, and it's a shame that it wasn't suggested to us. could have been much more fun. nevertheless, it was a great experience. :)

Awesome and fun experience!. We went as 2 couples first to the Mysterious Room and the Hacker's Nest on the following day. Both rooms were very fun and challenging, the Hacker's Nest even more challenging!I highly recommend to try it, we all had immense fun, it doesn't take long (~ hour) and is close by to the main tourist area.

What a great family experience. This was our family's first escape game. It was so exciting and amazing. The staff there are so helpful and great. Want to go back and do the next one. Would definitely go back. Thanks.
