A real challenge!. So far the most difficult escape game I've tried. We only did that in two people, but not sure if more persons would be helpful. Very nicely made room and really challenging fun! Also nice and helpful staff. Thanks!

the mysterious office and the hackers nest. We were a groupe of girls ( once 6 and once 5). We did both rooms and had a great time. The mysterious office is much easier than the hackers nest. You should start with the mysterious office and if you had no problems with that one, you can move on to the hackers nest.

Amazing Staff, Great Fun. Highly recommend this. Was visiting Prague with my parents and a family friend (they're all a bit older - getting close to senior age). Although it was the first escape game for all of us, we loved the experience. The staff was extremely helpful, friendly and patient with us novices. If it's your first time do try out the "Mysterious Office" which we are told is quite a bit easier than the "Hacker Room" which is the other room. We found it overall very well thought out and planned.

Greatest escape-game ever ever ever! :) <3. I played the "hacker's nest". Before I visited "The chamber" I got some experiences at six other escape games and I really have to say that this game was the best I've ever played! „smile“-EmoticonThe crew was really friendly and they speak very well English! I would recommend to listen to their hints, too. Otherwise it isn't possible to make it out!One thing you have to take in account: the game is really hard to escape in 60 minutes for two people. Maybe you have to choose 4 people for your team.I can't wait for the others rooms. See us next year!!!! I'm really excited for the haunted house room!

Great fun. A great way to spend some time with friends!!! Lovely staff and good room, we didn't complete sadly, done a few and I think if anything it could have been a little easier, lots of combinations we ran out of time. Great fun all the same, go and spend some fun time with your family and friends.
Company Team Bulding. It was great location! super organization!!! Really can recommend to others. You will enjoy this place!
Great escape. The room was prepared with precision, fun and really entertaining tasks. You have to be quick and focused, use help whenever you get stock and enjoy the game.

Fun activity!. Cost about €40 for two adults. Managed to escape the room - thanks to a few hints from the staff and them giving us an extra ten minutes! Its quiet hard to get started but once you get going its great fun. The clues are difficult enough to be challenging but easy enough to solve if you just think. Staff were lovely and told us all about the history of the building. There are some true element the story of the room - it was a little bit creepy which added to the fun and excitement. I would definitely recommend it - we had so much fun!

The chamber exit game, Prague. I visited the Chamber Exit Game on the 08th of February 2016. It was my first experience of escape room game, and I must say that I liked it. Apart from the typical challenges posed by the game (gathering clues, finding the codes to the locks etc.) that room had a feature that I consider unique. The story has been basedin on rumours about a pre-war inhibitant of that very flat. The decorations, featuring old postcards and prints, were more than appropriate for that purpose. Our guide, Monika Grzelak, has been helpful when it was needed, and - what's even more important - patient enough to wait before giving additional piece of information. All in all, it has been a pleasant experience.

Perfect to spice up your stay in Prague. We were so excited about the mysterious office that we jumped right into the next game of the hacker's nest. Games are available in English and Czech. The staff was very polite and had a great English. The games were designed intelligently, not predictable or repetitive. In a group of 3 we thought we had the perfect group size - everyone got involved and we stayed effective ;) finished both games in time!After admiring the beautiful city, the good food and breathtaking historic sites, this spiced up our visit to Prague!

Hackers nest. the game could have more interesting (manual) riddles (majority of them is just code searching). The concept is 80% of the time 1 riddle at 1 time, so in a groups of more people usually only 1-2 people are solving something and the rest is just watching...

Fantastic!!! 😀. Absolutely brilliant experience, was great how they set all the rooms out, challenges were fantastic. The staff are so friendly and also give you little hints (needed trust) recommend to everyone

very interesting but so tough !!!. This second experience with the Chamber was very exciting, and it pleased a lot our small group.We decided to let as much as possible the teenagers of the group, and that was a success.Anyway, most of the enigmas were too difficult to be solved in time, and it is important to come entirely opened with all senses and ways of considering the problems.I'll recommend this experience to all my friends visiting Prague.

Disappointed by silly mistakes. Very well developed multi room escape room. We did the hackers nest and it had some excellent puzzles and technology, especially in the second part. It is not like any escape room I have done before. It is quite a tricky escape room and not for beginners. What we feel let the room down was poor maintenance. Part of the puzzle on the window was very warn down and made us think it was not part of the puzzle. Also there was a card in the drawer which was suppose to have a number on it. The owner had failed to write the number on it and therefore made our escape impossible. The owners did however give us some money off. Bit disappointed.

So much fun!. Towards the end of our trip (and with the incoming of snow) my boyfriend and I decided to try out a couple of Prague's escape rooms after having completed a handful at home and we were not disappointed! The chamber was probably the best one we have played! We opted for the 'Hacker' room as we are fairly experienced players and wanted something a little more modern in comparison to the other rooms we usually do. The room itself was fantastic, slightly different from other rooms in the sense you don't actually have to escape but is by far the most thoughtfully constructed and every minute detail considered - we were both really impressed.We needed an extra couple of minutes to escape and the lovely girl on reception gave us a couple of extra minutes and she said we were so close to completing the game! I would suggest you do this room if you're in a group of 3/4/5 or an experienced couple otherwise, it might take you a while to get going and get your head around the clues! Fantastic hour spent in Prague!
Fun fun. really great game, had excellent time! bit tricky but that's the whole point of it! We went as a group of friends from college, and everyone enjoyed it. Great price also
First timers . First time playing an escape game and this was brilliant! Can't wait to book another one! Will definitely be recommending to all my friends and family.

Very good experience. From the outside it looks like a normal building, because it kinda is. But once you come inside the flat you'll realised it is really not. They managed to take us back to the XIXth century. Solving the mistery was one of the greatest experieces we lived in Prague. It was not only an original idea but also a well executed one. We would love to go again someday and try out a different puzzle!

It was absolutely amazing experience!. My first ESCAPE GAME! Wau...I'm sure I will return. :) Every detail is thought out. There are a lot of surprises and things that you would not expect.The main thing is to use common sense. :)
מומלץ בחום. היינו בחדר הקל, היה יחסית קל אבל יצירתי וכיף. חויה נחמדה ביותר.We took the easier room' ', it was just the correct difficulty level for us.Very nice experience.
Very good!. It was our first escape game and it was very interesting. The 2 bosses there are very friendly and help us when needed. I recommand!

Hacker's nest. We went 6 adults - friends. The Game was funny, clever, logic and of a high standard, even the technical details. For most of us it was out first experience with an "escape room" and we were amazed and we want to do it again. We really look forward for new rooms to open and we will be definitely back :)

Wicked. We have played several escape games in Prague and this is certainly at the top of the list. It was exciting, fun, and a big adrenaline rush. But it's not for the faint of heart - This one is quite difficult.

Great teambuilding. We really had a great time and lot of fun. The game is well organized and time is running sooo fast. I also appreciated that both employees of The Chamber speak English (fluently).

Hackers Nest. Almost one year later, I have been there again! My expectations were tremendous, because I´ve been mysterious office and in 8 eight other games in Prague. Let say that after Hacker I know who is the king of EXIT games in Prague. It is definitely guys from the Chamber, because these games are really cool, entertaining and full of brilliant ideas - no doubt! I cannt wait for theirs new games which should be launched soon and too, I want to appreciate the effort of creators in building so fantastic games.

Nicely done. This was my second escape room experience. It wasn´t that amazing as the first one (Iron curtain) but still I enjoyed it pretty much. We were a group of 6 people and it was a bit of mess, so I would recommend to go there in a smaller group.

A real challenge!. First of all: the guys were very friendly - booking, payment and other formalities went without a problem.About the room: The Hacker's Nest!There were only two of us, my girlfriend and I, we have done six escape room now and this was the first one that we didn't escape from! To be fair, the guys did warn us that the room is very tricky and rather long - there are about 20 difficult puzzles to solve. We had four left at the end, which were shown to us after our time ran out. It is possible to buy an extra 15 minutes, but unfortunately we had no Czech currency left, leaving Prague directly afterwards.I like that this room and the story behind it was pretty modern. A nice change from Soviet bunkers and World War 2 prisons etc. This means that there were puzzles which are more modern too. I can't say more without saying too much. I probably wouldn't recommend this particular room to other groups of two, unless you just want a huge challenge. We did, so didn't mind not finishing it.The Chamber offer other rooms that are not so complicated, for a higher chance of success.If you are in Prague and like this sort of thing, definitely check it out!

Te Chamber. We were in the chamber just two, but it was very cool! Really interesting quest. Looks like organizers think about every detail. They have another room there, would like to visit it as well.
Great fun. First escape game for us. I've only ever played the games on my phone but this was great. Good teamwork and challenging. Great fun all round. If I was in town longer I would return

Anxious for their new escape games. We have visited both games of THE CHAMBER and this is the top notch quality without any doubts. For the beginner I definatelly recommend The Misterious Room, if you dare and you are experienced enough, go for the Hacker. We have spoken with the operators and the company plans to open the new games (hopefully soon) so me and my escape game gang we cannot wait to see and try them soon! The Chamber keeps the best quality and standard in this sector in Prague so this attraction is highly recommended!
Best one we've done!. We have done many escape rooms across the world but this one was by far the best!So much fun and we managed to escape with a minute to spare :)
Tajemna komnata/Secret Chamber. Perfect way how to spend your time. We were fully interested In the game and the Secret. At the end a real surprise was waiting for us.

Great for teambuilding . We visited The Chamber today (january), and was very pleased. We devided into two groups, one of which tried "The Mystery Office", and the other "Hacker's Nest". I was a part of the group in the latter room. The hosts were very friendly, spoke english well, and made sure we understood all the rules and premises for the game. Since it was our first time in an "Escape room", and our group had a more advanced room, we agreed to get help if they though we were stuck and needed it. We got help several times, but still solved most of it alone, and had a blast. I would highly recommend this for small business trips, such as teambuilding! I will return again next time im in Prague, and try one of the new rooms they are opening.
Genius . We were two couples. It was our first time in this kind of room. They planed really smart puzzles. We had great time although we didn't finish in time.

Simply Perfect . I didn't know that this escaping games existing in real. I found this on tripadvisor and it is great fun. We tried the "office" and did it within the set hour. The girls at the desk where very cool, they help where helpful by giving hints, using a walky talky. So if you like puzzles and playing detective: try it. It is worth every cent.

Very Fun, fair prices. I went here in december and the staff were very friendly. I was surprised by how cheap the whole experience was especially considering that we booked this the same day we did it. It was very challenging, but the staff gave us hints when necessary. That being said they did not give hints if we didn't want them. I would recommend this to anyone in the prague area looking for some innocent fun

Awesome experience. This was our first escape game experience - and we loved it! The staff was really friendly and welcoming, and the game itself was such a nice experience for all of us (2 adults + boys aged 11 + 14). We could all contribute to solve the tasks and the room felt authentic and clever 'built'. We don't have anything to compare it with - but it definently made us want to try this again… it's 'addictive' : )

Best escape room game in Prague!. Our family of four had such a great time playing The Mysterious Office game at The Chamber! We needed two clues to ensure we were on track, but it was the perfect level of difficulty. We made it out right at our hour time limit. We have played an escape game here in Prague but we enjoyed this one the most. The chamber is in an excellent location and we would highly recommend this for a fun activity here in Prague!

Great fun ! . Thoroughly enjoyed our trip to the Chamber. We did the Hacker room and it was superb fun and very exciting and challenging. We had just a bit of help to get us to the end in time. Staff were excellent with a good briefing and occasional subtle hints while doing the game. Could not recommend it enough for a group of friends or family.

Lots of fun. It was my first time playing a puzzle room and it was a lot of fun. It made you use your brain and think outside the box. We managed to complete it with lots of hints but they were enough to make it so you had to work it out yourself. We came at night and was unsure where the entrance was as its not well signed and it's our first time in the area but it's on the corner with a small plaque beside the door where you need to ring the bell. It's good for team building or just having a bit of fun which gets quite competitive as you're racing against the clock. Would definitely recommend.

Greatest modern adventure in Prague. We wanted to have a special Christmas holiday in Prague and the team from the Chamber helped us to achieve it. Great fun, great atmosphere, something worth the money. Workout for the brain and all the senses. Great value for money. We will hapilly go again to try the new coming rooms.

Fun for the whole family. The Chamber was a terrific Escape Room company. We completed the Mysterious Room game which was a classic design and required team strategy. Our group had two members who had completed multiple Escape Rooms around Europe and four members who were entering an Escape Room for the first time. We all had a great time working through this room and we are looking forward to seeing The Chamber's in the new year.

Allot of fun. This was my first escape rom, so I did not know what to expect, but I sure loved it! It was challinging and not alway intuitive, but we got though it with some helpfull hits. I will be doing this again!
Amazing!. First time at an escape room. Did the mystery room. And this place passed all expectations. Be prepared to be surprised...Highly recommended.

The Chamber - awesome experience. Have been in The Chamber for the first time. Very nice people, all well explained and the game was simply brilliant. Pity I could not stay longer and try other rooms The Chamber offers.

Heart pumping, brain draining, exhilarating!. Did the Hecker's Nest, and I was literally on my toes throughout the session. The puzzles were challenging, involving logic, lateral thinking and creativity. And just when you think it's over, there are more surprises! Several of the puzzles, I thought, were not very intuitive and so required help from the administrator. This game is really, really difficult, with more than a dozen locks to unlock and so the two of us couldn't finish in time.Thank you, The Chamber, for making this one of the highlights of our time in Prague.

Awesome fun!. I got a voucher from my friend as a birthday present and boy, can I tell you, one of the best birthday gifts I ever got! It was loads of fun, we went in a group of four and chose Hacker's nest. It was challenging but we made it more or less in the time limit. The guy who guided us through the game was great, very nice and it can be seen that he likes doing his job. If you ever find yourself in Prague and you're looking for something interesting to do, this is the thing for you.
cool. fun, interesting, good story of the chamber and good guidance. it was the first time i played and i will play again for sure :)
Hard and challenging. I am rather experienced in playing escape room. This must be the hardest I played. I will not relate to the content ofcourse but there are many stages to solve. Go and have fun!

Game of Locks.... This was our first escape game so we did not know what to expect. The game itself was mostly about locks: searching for locks, keys and codes - but there was lots of variations of this theme and the game itself was never boring or too easy - or too hard, for what it's worth - and several times we were properly and thoroughly amazed.
So much fun!. Fantastic set up and although quite hard to solve within the hour with just two people, was a lot of fun. Would definitely recommend a visit!
HACKER'S NEST was really cool!. I can recommend the Hacker's nest game. It was really difficult but entertaining! We played it with work mates and it was really fun.

Great spent time and money!. I had few colleagues from all over the Europe and in a pretty wide age range so I needed to find something which will be interesting for everybody, there will not be a language problem (even all speak english, some of them are not so confident with it) and it will take not too long. Well, I couldn´t choose better! I have done more games in the past and this one is definitely one of the bests in Prague! One group did hacker´s nest and we DID save the world :) pretty quickly ;) the other group took a bit more than one hour to get out from the secret office. But we all met after the game and we were happy with it. RECOMMEND!! p.s. one small thing is that the staff is too nice and is giving hints pretty quickly and then you tend to ask them more..

Good fun!!. Went as a group of 5 to this escape room having never experienced an escape room before. We went for the Hackers Nest which was more of bomb defusal than an escape room. Very clever and tricky problems to work out. Friendly staff too, a little difficult to find...

Must do!. This was absolutely frustrating excellent fun. The puzzles were clever but not impossible although we did need a lot of help. We had never done escape room before so it felt really weird at the beginning but then you got into it. With tips from the front office (and a little bit of extra time!) we got out which we were told not everyone does. One tip, do not be put off by the location. It is in an un-obvious residential building (there is a doorbell labelled the Chamber) and the public hallway could use a tidy up but it is all fine, press on and the Chamber office and staff are very professional. I wish we were staying an extra day so we could do the other room!

Fantastic escape room. The first challenge is to find this place!! Make sure you go up to the door and then ring the bell at the top. It's situated in an old residential building but that adds to the charm of this place. We went for my daughters birthday and we had great fun. The staff are lovely and very accommodating. We managed to escape but had a couple of clues. Def give this place a go if you enjoy a challenge.
Excellent experience. A must for anyone who visits Prague. Located in the heart of the Old cityand close to all the attractions. We had a great time and surely will come back

The Chamber - excellent experience!. Very nice experience. We tried the "Hacker's nest", and had a lot of fun. It was a very difficult, since this was our first time with this type of game, but the "base control" was very helpful to guide us when we were stuck on a problem.Also, the two guys running the place were absulutely brilliant - helpful, enthusiastic and friendly.

Fun way to spend an hour in prague. Great escape room. We made it out within the hour (apparently). The clock was broken and the time between the 5 minutes remaining warning and the time we eventually got out was very long, so I think maybe they were just being nice!

Thrilling Experience Like No Other. Escaping the Mysterious Office was one of the most entertaining experiences I've had here in Prague. The Room has a great atmosphere. Room Masters were nice and helpful. I'm already craving for more so I'm definitely checking out Hacker and all the other upcoming games. Recommended!

Great fun! Looking forward to more challenges!. The Chamber is great fun for team building events, either in Czech or English. Would strongly recommend a visit as the staff is very nice and game rooms well prepared. Can't wait to see more challenges coming soon!

Great game with weird staff. We go to exit games qiute often so we can compare many rooms like that. The room itself was great but we were concerned about the staff. They tried to help us every single time we were solving any task... well why is it called the game about thinking when you get the help even if you dont ask for? When we kindly asked them not to help us until we ask for it they mabe got mad at us... After 60 minutes, when we had still some tasks to do (I understand that we paid 1 hour only, no complain about that), the very tall guy opened the door and just said us to go out. Just like that. NO explanations of the rest of the game, NO feedback questions or debriefing... just sent us out without simple word.. (well he begged for money of course). He was quite scary...I dont want to come back anymore. pitty, we wanted to try the hacker room too...

unbeateable. We have enjoyed one hour of adventure and we have managed to escape even though it was not easy at all. Just one thing..there should be some clarification regarding the mysterious person about which this is all about and some conclusion at the end of game.
Thanx very nice experience. Fun experience,interesting concept ,unfortunately we didn't manage to save the world , we hope you will do better :)

Hackers game was really good . We wwbt for the Hacker's escape game. It was really nice and the puzzles were in high standard. We didn't managed to finish it on time but the whole experience was really fun. If you find yourself in Prague and have a spare Hour or so.. Go for obe of the games

Great fun, nicely done!. We did the hacker-themed room and enjoyed it so much we came back for seconds the next day. The rooms are carefully planned and full of original ideas (some Escape Game chains tend to reuse their riddles across locations, so you may end up solving the same puzzles in Budapest that you already did in Prague) and are also very nicely done decoration- and ambience-wise. We agreed that this is was the best of the escape games we tried during our visit to Prague and would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Hi-tech experience. High level of technical effects and very smart equipment! Maybe too confusing objects in hackers room. We enjoyed this game although we had a technical problem with electricity but the staff gave us extra time. We recommended, one of the best in Prague.

this is a must when you visit prague. We randomly found this attraction when scanning trip advisor. Not the easiest places to find as its located in an apartment block with a small buzzer on the entrance. Don't be put off by this as it was an fantastic time spent here. You are given a briefing about the history of nutty old man that used to live here and then you enter a large room and then locked in. You are given a set time limit to search the room, find puzzles and clues and work them out to find the exit to the room. Its a cross between a challenge off the crystal maze and a police investigation. Highly recommended

Challenging!. One of the best escape game I ever played!We coudn't finish it because we were just 2 and it's pretty long. A team of 4 people is suggested in order to advance faster.I will definitely try the hacker room with my friends.

Perfect Birthday Present. We had a very good experience with my partner when visiting the Chamber. It is definitely a wonderful present for a Birthday or another event or just for fun. Now we plan our next visit to the Hackers room.

What a great experience!. My boyfriend and I decided to try an escape room during our time in Prague and found 'The Chamber' on tripadvisor. There was still one spot left at 18:00 for the 'Mysterious Office'. When we walked into the appartment where the rooms are we were welcomed very nicely. Because it was our first escape room ever they explained the concept to us and as soon as the room was ready we were lead into it and inside they told us the story behind the mysterious Office. We made it through the whole game with some help but it was just such a great experience. We really loved it and talked about it for the rest of the evening. When we come back to Prague we will definitely try to escape of one of the other rooms ;). Thanks for the great time!

Brain teaser. Me and the wife visited here for our first escape game. We had initially booked into the hackers nest and we advised the mysterious office would be better for us because of the small team and it being our first time playing one of these games.We had alot of fun and the puzzles we challenging (we had more than a little help to get into the swing of how the game worked) and the atmosphere and back story was really authentic and immersive.Would recommend that you try this place out if you are thinking of trying your hand at an escape game.
Fun and challenging!. Went there for my first escape game with my girlfriend, we definetely had a good time and we will come back for sure!

An extraordinary experience!. We were there last week, without having a reservation but they still gave us a room right away! we were 4 people at 'the office' room, and it was really fun and exciting, every detail was well planed and we felt almost like in a movie. The guide was also very nice and helpful.
Had a great time!. It was great fun for the three of us (two adults and a 8 yr old), first time doing this in real life and we really enjoyed it! Highly recommend it!

Nice escape quest in Prague. We have played in the room about hacker story. Our team included two people with large escape-the-room experience.Nice quest, good ambience. Unfortunately it is really hard for the team of two persons: to much things to do. Puzzles are not really hard, but it is too much of them. That's why we have failed.This game was well-adoptet for English. And also during the game you need to be in touch with operator, he will give you special information you need to solve some puzzles.Recommend to visit.

Great effort put into this room!. We chose the hackers room because the other room was full. Was a bit worried that some IT knowledge would be needed, but it's just logic with computer stuff as props, so anyone can do it! Probably wouldn't have chosen this room if the other was free, but so glad we did it! One of the top three escape rooms I have ever done (done around 7-10 in Budapest, Prague and London)!We were only two ppl, paid 1000 CZK, bring cash, nearest ATM is 5-10min away.
The two levels better than anyone in Prague. Believe me that I speak from experience. We have done a little over twenty rooms here in Prague. And these guys really know what they're doing.
escape game. Our first attempt and very entertaining. We plan to visit The Chamber again :)We look forward to the next room and lots of fun with puzzles
A great challenge. A very well thought out escape room, which was challenging without being overwhelming. Highly recommended.

Brilliant morning out! . Having walked around a few of the other games we decided to go to the chamber and couldnt have been happier! We only originally booked one game but on completetion we went straight into the other! Really good activity to do for all ages and abilities!!

What a Great Time...Highly Recommend for all Ages. We spent 3 days in Prague. I had read about these "escape games" here on tripadvisor. We are both in our late 50's, but our daughter and nephews and nieces play these types of games on the computer. They are hidden object, puzzle games. My husband and I have played them a little. So, the premise here is that you do a game in real life. The Chamber has 2 rooms...we did the easier one called the Mysterious Office. That being said this wasn't easy..it was fun and challenging. The Chamber was only a short walk from our hotel near the Old Town Square. If you are traveling with teenagers or young adults, and you've gone to a bunch of museums and churches....take a break and do this. Total time will be about an hour and a half....very doable and still see all the Prague sites. We stopped by one morning (they open at 10). We did not have a reservation, but they had an opening. Annie was very helpful and explained the whole process. We go in...we have an hour...she watches us the whole time and offers hints if we get stuck (via walkee talkee). I won't give anything away, but there are lots of surprises and we took 1 hour 20 minutes...but we are not skilled at these, so we were happy. The room decor was cool and all set in the late 1800's. It was 1000 crown or about $40 for the game. That is total, not per person. Afterwards, we did the 5 minute walk to the square rewarded ourselves with beer and wine. Go, you will love it!

The most amazing escape room. I have been to 5 rooms in my life and this was the most amazing one. They have taken it to the next level and it was really challenging. This is a must experience for everyone who is visit prague. It worth the money and the team is really kind and helpful. Thank you very much for this great and amazing experience!!!
Fantastic!. Super, awesome! Great quest, mind blowing! Absolutely funny! The host is very kind and helpful (just in case). Thank you for the experience! Must to do
Exciting room!. We had a great time, the room is very exciting and a little difficult. It is great for couples and group of friends

So much fun!. I went in a group of 6 people - none of which have ever done anything like this before. From the moment we got there, the lady at reception which a really great host and set the scene well. The escape game was brilliant and such a fun way to spend an hour. We got out in under the hour and only had 1 clue. I would recommend this to everyone and once we left we all wanted to go and do another one. Thanks for looking after us so well

Awesome Mysterious Office. I went to try the Mysterious Office with my boyfriend. It was our first -time experience with escape games and we both loved it.The staff was unbelievably nice, explained everything we needed to know and gave us an intro to the game. We managed to complete the game with a little help and some additional time. I loved the decoration of the room and was totally immersed in finding the clues and solving puzzles. Location of the Mysterious Office (it is situated in the beautiful spot in the old-town part of Prague) is a big plus and made the story behind the room even more exciting. We are definitely coming back for the Hacker’s nest!

Guys. This is awesome.. Great atmosphere, just the right level of difficulty. 60 min werent enough for us but you can buy extra minutes for next to nothing. We did the doctor's room, and were so hyped when we finished it that we wanted to do the second room (the hacker room) right away but it wasnt ready. I really recomment it!!Also our guide was great and really helpful when needed ;)Just remember to place an order in advance

AWESOME!!!!!. We tried Hacker's Nest last week and it was an awesome escape game AGAIN! Me and my friends visited the Secret Office last year during our Bachelorette party and it was one of the highlights of our trip to Prague. The Chamber Escape game is much more better than those we have in London. Great puzzles, total immersion into the story and wonderful staff! Thank you so much for a lifetime experience guys!
Great fun!. Fascinating structure, funny and challenging game, friendly people.I highly recommend it (in groups!)

Awesome atmosphere and good dynamic. The decoration and atmosphere within the premises of the Chamber are authentic. You will find yourselve immersed as soon as you will step inside the room and will feel the adrenaline build up while looking for an exit.
One of the highlight of our trip. Really great experience for a small group. English speaker friendly. Great balance of difficulty. Exceptionnal athmosphere of old Prague. Really friendly staff.

Really clever. I purposefully created an account just so that I could praise this Room Escape. I've done several of these throughout Europe, and this was definitely one of the best. Really clever concept and puzzles, not to mention genuine authenticity to the story. (You'll understand when you do it.) Do yourself a favor and go here if you have an hour to kill in Prague!

Absolutely Brilliant. I tried out both the original Chamber and the new Hacker escape room and for me both were totally 10/10. Puzzles are challenging, yet solvable so that the thrill of the whole game keeps going. And one of great things is that the place is located right in the very center of Prague, so you don't need to spend the whole day travelling to it.
Hackers Nest. Superb, if you like tech stuff you should not miss this escape room. Great location, great price and very friendly owner ;-)
Great first experience. I've never done an escape game before, but it was great fun - interesting puzzles and friendly staff. I would certainly recommend this to anyone who's never done this before
I loved it. I loved it very much, it was very nice and amazing. I suggest to everyone to visit the chamber and try it.

Hacker´s Nest - second room of these guys, highly recommended!. I have had the opportunity to try (as one of their first customer) their second room called Hacker´s Nest. The quest is much more difficult than the first one but the tricks and puzzles there are just amazing!!!! Now I really do not know, which room is better (whether The Mysterious Room or Hacker´s Nest) but I can confirm that these guys know how to make the ecape games thrilling and exciting! :)Thank you for than excellent show!!!!
Fun and excitement. The room is nicely prepared, the puzzles are difficult but logic (which is not the case in every escape room!).Very nice staff, stay was very pleasant!

Super experience. The host was very friendly, and the fact that part of the story is actually true made the game even more interesting ! I would recommend to anyone who like solving riddles, children and adults.

EPIC!. The best escape game i have ever scene .. the room is old like in the 80s it is very original to the game and there's a history behind it..Difficulty is hardcore!! Not for beginners. It's very original but lots of combinations and need at least 3 ppl who know the game to solve it in time limit.Took us 1:15 hour to get out of there. An amazimg experience. Very recommended.

Most difficult yet. This was our third escape room and the most difficult yet. Lots of padlocks and combinations to find in this one. We did it as a family of four (8 year old and 10 year old). We read that it might be scary for young children but ours weren't scared, although our youngest child might have been if it had been his first escape room. This wasn't our favourite room yet but it was the one that gave us the biggest sense of achievement. We were told that it was one of the most difficult in Prague with just a 40% success rate but we managed to get out - only with four minutes to spare though.

Crystal Maze revisited. We booked this before travelling, the first puzzle is finding the place as there is no significant signage, just a name on the flat number on the house. Once in a fun adventure began, the staff were friendly and enthusiastic and guided you through very well. The puzzles had a really good flow to them creating a really nice story.We were advised that if something doesn't move easily it shouldn't, this is basically true, but you do need to search well, as some elements might require a deeper look. The only negative was a couple of locks were a bit sticky, so it could appear that the right number was incorrect. Overall though, a great way to pass an hour. (There is also a lovely little bar/cafe opposite which is great for a pre/post game drink)

Great escape room. Me & my partner love escape rooms, so we searched for a few to try during our stay in Prague.We loved this room, it was our favourite of the trip, the puzzles were original and I would say it's more difficult than most. The decor was great and the back story added to the experience. The staff were really friendly too.This is the only room we have played without a clock showing the time left and I think we rushed the end as we thought we were out of time, when in fact we still had a couple of minutes left (we guessed one of the last clues, instead of working it out). So make sure you have a watch with you!

Nice theme and nice brain-twisters.. Compared to Prague's other escape games, The Chamber offers tasteful decor that helps the immersion. The puzzles are relatively difficult but feasible to hit within 1 hour even with 2 players. The reason for the non-perfect score is the service (not checking hints enough for red herrings left by the previous players and forgetting to turn on the light in the 2nd room once we entered it - sorry, but the excellence is in the detail).

First chamber room, booked another for the following night!. We booked this for a bit of variety on our city hopping trip, never having been to an escape room before and not sure what to expect. It was fantastic - if you enjoy logic puzzles and a bit of a mystery you will have a throughly enjoyable 60 minutes!The staff were very friendly and introduced us to the concept, giving us options on how much help he would offer us. We've since booked another Room game in Prague for the next day!

First escape room experience, definitely not the last. We had a very fun time here. It was our first time at attempting an escape room and it was challenging but extremely entertaining! well worth the money, will be returning if we come back to prague!
Amazing!. It's an amazing experience. I visited this place with my sister and a couple of friends. We had so much fun. Definitely must try!

Amazing place!. One of my first escape room, but also one of the best I' ve been to so far. Great atmosphere, full of innovative ideas.Morever I heard that the new room was about to open soon! I do must try it!

Best experience in a long time!. Me and my friends had an AMAZING time playing The Chamber. I´ve already visited three escape games in Prague but only this one was worth writing a review. The game is extremely well made. I was so excited hearing the story behind it. Staff is very helpful and professional. Thank you Tomas! It was very hot outside that day so we appreciated they offered water for free. They really do care about their customers. Puzzles and riddles are creative and soooo clever:-) I cannot wait to visit their other rooms! Highly recommended!!!! A+ A+ A+ A+ A+

Amazing. This was really amazing. I went there with my girlfriend, it was both our first time. Everyone is really Nice ! And no matter your level the staff will help you. We will definitly do other escape games back in paris, and I hope it will be as good!
Awesome. It was a lot of fun figuring everything out with a couple of friends. Definitely give it a try when you are in the neighbourhood!

Absolutely amazing ! . My boyfriend and I went there on a wednesday and can highly recommend the host as well as the game-setting to everyone interested in exit-room games.The level of difficulty is high, the riddles are creative and diversified, and the storyline fits into the perfectly decorated surroundings. We were absolutely amazed!
Buzzing. Great experience and goto escape room in case you are in Prague. It was our first time, we were with a group of 4 people. Thrilling experience overall.

Cool experience! Recommend!!!. Can only recommend this kind of entertainment. This room was first we tried in Prague and it was really cool!!!Unfortunatelly we didnt make it in 60 minutes, even using tips... :( But i think, that next room will be more sucessful, as now we know what to expect and what to do. Tha atmosphere in the room was really great, interier was done perfectly in each detail. If you want to make your brain work a little, go there, you will not regret!!!

great fun!!. The room is amazing! We had to take 6 clues and fortunately no one was coming after us so thomas gave us 29 extra minutes so we got to play this to the end. We are a couple and only have done 1 room before this one. Were pretty bad at this, but it doesn't matter, it's so much fun! The scene is perfect and truly recommend it to everyone!!

First time in Escape Room - Brilliant experience!. I had high expectations before my first Escape Room experience and I wasn't disappointed! We booked our tickets from their website in advance which is necessary in my opinion. The place was easy to find and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The experience all in all was great and well planned. We could even take photos afterwards. I recommend this especially for a group of friends or a family with teenagers.
Excellent!. This was the best experience during our stay in Prague! Very exciting and atmospheric. Our host was very enthusiastic which enhanced the experience. We really recommend this room!

Absolutely loved it.. Me and my three girlfriends visited yesterday and had an absolute blast. We had no idea what to expect having not done anything like this before but we couldn't recommend it more!!Thomas, the host, was so welcoming and friendly, explaining everything to us, asking how we would prefer to play in respect to hints and tips and explaining everything at the end and if we had any questions about any aspects. The game itself was really good, we only just managed to escape with 1 minute to spare (although we did ask for help via walky-talky at certain times!). It's really fun to work as a team and we found that it was a really good level of difficulty. Overall, a fantastic experience.

Couldn't recommend enough!. Not only was Thomas the host the most welcome and informative host, the game itself was so fun! I went with my three friends, all of us 22, and we made it out with about a minute to spare (go us!!!!.... Can I put that on my CV?) ANYWAY we absolutely loved it, and more so because we finished, but even if we hadn't the whole theme of the game was really clever in itself and beautifully executed. Thank you so much! As the title says: could not recommend enough!!!!!!

AWESOME EXPERIENCE. We had so much fun playing The Chamber escape game! The puzzles are very smart and challenging. We enjoyed every minute. Story behind is very interesting and surprising. We highly recommend!

Been there, done that. I will come AGAIN.. I was really curious about this new offline "gaming" and my sister and her boyfriend talked me into this adventure. I was not only satisfied, I was actually blown away by the experience. The time is running and you are still missing an important key or clue to open some secret doors. Adrenaline all the way. SPOILER: The Chamber guys are about to bring new chambers, soon! I have also tried some other providers of the escape games in Prague but the level of experience was a way below the one in The Chamber. See you again, The Chamber!
So much fun!. Was very skeptical about doing this. My adventurous family talked me into it. We all had a wonderful time trying to figure out the clues. I would do this again.

A nice break. Took my family of 5 to try The Chamber to give us a break from all the sight-seeing. This was our first Escape Room and it was very enjoyable.Two of the women in our group were a bit nervous upon arrival as it is located in just an apartment building, but Thomas quickly made them feel at ease. The room itself was very challenging and we'll organized. We needed help three times to make it through in 68 minutes.I would highly recommend and will look for more of these as we travel.

Really good fun and a great experience!. The Chamber is awesome! really fun. You have an hour to find the key that allows you to leave, following clues and logic puzzles. Really well designed. The level of difficulty is perfectly set, not impossible but not easy by any means. We managed it in 58:02. You have a walkie talkie, and the people in charge are watching you from cameras and can give you hints and help if you need it.

The top fun activity right in the center of Prague. For me it was the third escape room I visited and by far the best. The puzzles kept us thinking and discussing even after we left. Staff was nice and willing to help. We were very satisfied.

Perfection. Only few things can beat the feeling of solving a challenging puzzle, that's why I can't get enough of these escape rooms. And I thing that of all the rooms I visited, this one should be on everyone's to-do-list. Me and my friends loved it.
One of the best I've seen. Great welcoming staff, thrilling atmosphere, mind-heating puzzles, not far from the city centre. I can do nothing but recommend this one.

Very well designed. On my vacation in prague I wanted to try some escape game with my gf and I must say that I don't regret any penny given for this one. Awesome setting and puzzles and everything. I can only recommend.

Amazing!. I'm traveling in a group of 7 people, which is the most people they've ever had, and it worked out fine. The guy at the front desk was really nice, he answered all our questions ( since this is our first time ) and it worked for us. We have 4 kids in our group, they loved it, and since we are going to Budapest next, we got a recommendation from the receptionist. It's not easy, and it's not hard, it's just challenging. We were ecstatic when we made it out with four minutes to spare. It's only like 50 euros, really cheap, and totally worth that price. I'd do it again in a heartbeat!

Just awesome. As a lover of puzzles in videogames I was really excited to try this one out along with 2 other pals. It was third escape game for me already and also the best one so far. Staff was nice and the location is also a plus as it is not far from the center.
The first escape room experience. The game room and the staff were great. I had quite high expectations but we had even more fun figuring out the problem! I recommend this sinsierly!

Great game!. Our group has all together six people and only two of has had tried this sort of game before. It was my first time so can't compare it to other similar games. This game is very well built. We got so many "a haa!"- experiences and all of the clues finally made perfect sense. It was very entertaining and fun for us. It was also bit scary and surprising. This game was in English at least for us. You can manage this game with very simple English. When you understand instructions given and can count to ten you will be perfectly safe :) :)  Ok, I can't help but brag that our group solved all the puzzles and get out in 40 minutes with only one clue <3 hahaa :D Man who worked there was also adorable and funny :)
the best escape game in Prague, without any doubts. excellent atmosphere, nice puzzles, real and classy environment, trained staff. In Prague simply the best IMHO.

Awesome and creative!. What an awesome escape room! It was so clever and fun!! A must- do in Prague. Well priced and so much fun. Loved the guy who checked us in and created the room. He seemed to be genuinely passionate and happy about the room and escape rooms in general. I've never done an escape room before and I will certainly do another now that I know how fun they are!! The chamber sets the bar high

Outstanding. By far the best escape game I've been to! Fantastic theme, authentic atmosphere and utmost professional staff. Puzzles were great, but it was mainly the atmosphere that made the difference!!! I have never felt this excited before :-) (I was even scared at one point). Bit difficult, but totally worth it.

Wow oh wow. What an adrenalin rush. A MUST in Prague!. The Chamber was the first escape room we played, and it was ridiculously, fantastically good. I cannot emphasize enough how fun it was, by far THE highlight of our weekend @ Prague, and that says a whole lot. We were that blown away that we changed our plans and made room for another escape room, on the day of our flight home!Thomas, who gave us instructions via Walky Talky, was the nicest and coolest guy. He gave us much needed clues in such a manner that we still were banging our heads against the wall and figuring stuff out on our own. He had a way of kindly helping us, while savoring the experience of a challenge. He was remarkable. The Chamber is challenging, meticulously created, provides a crazy adrenalin rush, and a very memorable experience. I kid you not- you must do it. Not should. MUST.

Great experience!. It was our first time playing an escape game and it was great!! All the small details and riddles made the game very realistic and exiting. We had a lot of fun and we would recommend it to everyone who loves to be in a small adventure!

Great place!. It's my third escape room I've been in.I went with a friebd who's a first timer.The riddles were awesome, challenging and creative.The place was very easy to find and the price was fair. By the way - we escaped within 52 min!!

Great Amazing. This was the first time I had ever visited a puzzle room so was a bit dubious about it when my partner booked it, but what an inspired choice he made (his brownie points went up big time). Right from the very start of the time in the room it was engaging and surprising. It is very well thought out and put together and I have to say that the time raced by without even being noticed. It is brilliant, fabulous, engaging and fun and just when you think you have cracked it and you have the key in your little paws, there's an unexpected twist, but no giving the game away. It is a wonderful experience that should not be missed. Love every second of it.

The best hour spent in a long time!. Friends of mine invited me to this adventure and my first reaction was rather sceptical...I have to say that I've never been more wrong in my life. It was the best hour of pure fun, teamwork and excitement I had in a long, long time! I cannot even count how many different emotions I felt during that one hour - curiosity, enthusiasm, thrill, joy, impatience, astonishment...If you ever have the chance to do this, DO IT.

bomb-dot-com :-). I´m a huge escape games fan. I have visited over dozen all around Europe and this one is definitely one of the best. I really liked the interior and puzzles but what I enjoyed the most was the element of surprise at the end...go there and you will not regret! Worth every penny:-)

Amazing!. The chamber experience was an hour well spent. We had so much fun not only in the room itself but also hours after we finnished it when we discussed it with friends. The chamber is well-thought-out and have many unexpected twists what makes it even more fun. Can't wait for next room to be opened.
Amazing. If you are looking for an amazing adventure with your friends there is no better choice than The Chamber. It`s offers both fun and excitement.

Astonishing fun in the centre of Prague. This was the first time I tried escape game...We spent a really good time in The Chamber with my friends! Brilliant idea, brilliant plot, easy-to-find location in the centre of Prague, kind stuff and magical atmosphere. Recommended!

Challenging!. I had a great time there! It was really funny and challenging for me and my friends. You can test your skills and ability to work under a time pressure because you must make it till 60 minutes. The chamber has its own story to explore :-) I can definitely recomend it to people who like extraordinary fun and challenges.

Nice time spent. This was my first experience with escape games and The Chamber have set off my hunger for them. I think that The Chamber is suitable for beginners as much as for experienced players. It offers great way how to spend time with your friends. It is also good "probe" to your own mind, because you will see directly and immediately your skills and mistakes in the process problem solving.I'm recommending The Chamber to everyone with playful mind.

Great experience!. It was our first experience with escape game and from the first moment we were really excited. It is a great way of teambuilding activity proving your analytical and logical thinking. I can't wait till the second room is opened.

Absolutely awesome!. If you want to spend some quality time with your friends or family,this is the right place to go.You have 60 minutes to get out of this room..sadly we didn't make it out on time but we've had so much fun.If you like challenges and puzzles you must go there and try it..big surprise waits for you at the end!

Extraordinary experience. If you are kind of person who likes to challenges, I am pretty sure that you are on the right place. I used to love playing adventure games on PC, than I´ve recognized that there is Escape games which are real, for real :). So when I had a first chance to try it, I was impressed...The Chamber is awesome...You will find yourself in very stylish office of unnamed traveller where you will have to solve many puzzles, brain teasers and find your way out...and so explore dark secret of the Chamber :))On one hand there´s really nice staff on the other hand the interior is very credible and sophisticated...So if you like challenging, brain teasers and good fun with your friends, you must go there!
